text: Super hôtel très bien situé, personnel très accueillant et agréable. Chambre spacieuse et propre. Rien à redire. 6 nuits parfaites. Très bon petit déjeuner compris et varié. Bref à recommander niveau qualité prix

title: Calidad /precio aceptable
text: La estancia que tuvimos mi familia y yo fue de 7 días. De la habitación un poco pequeña para 3 personas al tener que compartir cama es un poco incómodo, pero bien. La limpieza buena, la atención también, lo único que mejoraría es el desayuno, depende de la hora hay poco espacio, me faltó un poco de variedad, cantidad de sobra, pero falta fruta, en general, por el precio y su situación es una buena opción

title: Perfect location, good value, small room
text: As with most hotels that I've stayed at in New York, my room was small but not really an issue as I was staying on my own. The bonus for me was the location ‐ just 2 blocks from Grand Central made it easy to get around NYC. The walls seemed quite thin, on occasions I could hear voices or the TV in adjoining rooms, but it was very feint and not an issue. I slept well every night on a very comfy bed. Overall, I'd be happy stay there again.

title: Gerne wieder
text:
Perfekte Lage, wenn man aus dem Hotel kommt, kann man schon Grand Central sehen. 2 Bushaltestellen im Umkreis von 200 Metern. Zu Fuß zum Time Square in bummeligen 20 Minuten. Sehr nettes Personal!
Sehr guter Kaffee und Saft zum Frühstück. USA typisches Plastikgeschirr...
Zimmer sehr sauber!

title: Preis Leistungs Verhältnis sehr gut
text:
Kleines Hotel mit guter Lage 2 Minuten zum Grand Central. Frühstück war in Ordnung und ausreichend. 
Personal ist freundlich und hilfsbereit. 
W lan funktioniert sehr gut im 14 Stock.
Wir würden, wegen dem Preis Leistungs Verhältnis, wiederkommen.

title: Really good!
text: The staff is fantastic, very helpful and kind. Perfect location, good to stay in Midtown, close to everything. The rooms and breakfast are ok, and the had really good coffee! Could absolutely recommend!

title: Perfect for us!
text: Staying near Grand Central was a great location for us with plenty of food options nearby. The room was clean, staff was friendly, and being on a high floor gave us a quiet night of sleep which is rare for NYC. Would definitely stay here again!

title: 舒適的商務飯店
text: 飯店非常舒適.可以使用App check in 選房 也可以用app開門 相當方便.早餐項目不是很多 但是也夠吃了.因為靠近聯合國 周圍都是各個國家的領事館.相當安全.走路5分鐘就可以到中央車站.地理位置也算相當方便.

title: Great break
text: Hotel close to Times Square. Comfortable hotel,.Quiet despite being on main road. Breakfast included. Sometimes had to wait because dining room quite small. Didn’t have the need to speak to reception staff but concierge was helpful and friendly. Free wi fi in room and tea and coffee free in reception. A basic clean comfortable hotel.

title: Great location
text: This hotel is one block from Grand Central Station which provides easy access to anywhere in Manhattan. It is on 43rd and 2nd very close to the UN. They have noon check out.  We stay here each time we visit the city.

title: Strongly recommended
text: V central to midtown but on a quietish side street. Little street noise at night. Good sized room w large bathroom. Super friendly and smiley staff. Breakfast was ok but no treat (we headed to different diners nearby). Would return.

title: NYC Birthday Treat
text: We stayed at The Manhattan Inn Grand Central. Our room was wonderful with a view of the Chrysler building. The staff were very attentive and we had a good laugh with them. Breakfast was lovely if not rather busy! Girly recommended.

title: Good accomodation.
text:
The place is good, near the cyti centrum.
The staff was very kind when we had an accident with my girlfriend's ear rings. Pedro aranged it very soon . Ashley and Pedro.  Thanks! 

Ildikó and József from Hungary was hier.

title: Bom hotel com excelente localização.
text: Bom hotel, categoria 3 estrelas. Localização excelente, perto da Grand Central de onde se pega metrô para toda Nova York e trem para outros destinos. Fornece café da manhã que atende bem a finalidade. O espaço do café fica pequeno quando o hotel está cheio, principalmente nos fds. Pessoal da recepção muito simpático e atencioso. Quarto de tamanho ok, porém com carpete.

title: Impeccabile
text: Posizione molto buona vicina alla metro Grand Central, camera pulita e confortevole, personale accogliente e disponibile. Buona la colazione inclusa nel prezzo (molto varia la parte salata, un Po meno quella dolce... aggiungerei qualche cornetto/torta in piu )

title: Excelente hotel!
text: Hotel excelente, bem localizado, novo, atendimento cordial, seguro e com um dos melhores preços que encontrei! Muito próximo a Grand Central. Oferece café e chocolate quente no lobby 24 hrs de forma gratuita! Me hospedaria novamente com certeza!

title: Peaceful and ideal location
text: We stayed for 4 nights and it proved to be a great choice. The staff were all great, the room was on the first floor (2nd in American hotels) and faced inwards so it was really quiet. Having been to New York before, I’ve found sleeping difficult due to the level of noise but none of that here. The room had two double beds so mum and I were able to have one each. Having breakfast included was great, even though we only had cereals and toast it set us up for the day and meant our budget stretched that bit further. There was plenty of  things to choose from. Slightly concerned about the amount of single use plastic used at breakfast but that’s only a minor complaint. The hotel is perfectly situated for exploring all the main sights and we were able to walk to most places although we did clock up 50 miles in 4 days!  I’d have no hesitation recommending this hotel, it was really good value.

title: Bien situé
text: hôtel très bien situé avec gare et bus a proximité ,, grande chambre ménage fait tous les jours ,seul petit souci le pt déjeuner pas de place quand vous arrivez a certaines heures,personnel aimable ,bouteille d'eau a volonté a l'accueil

title: For NYC it was Very Good
text: A side from the location which is a bit too east for my liking it was very close to Grand Central so getting on the subway is very easy.  The rooms are small but to be expected for NYC however they are clean and have everything you require.  Staff is excellent and ready to help.  Breakfast was good and our group of 6 always found a table for all of us.  Overall, it was very good and I truly like Hampton Inns but if anything I would have preferred it closer to 7th Ave.

title: Average
text:
Rooms are pretty small, breakfast is help yourself on paper plates with plastic forks - bad, - reception team and housekeeping great and  Food was pretty poor, but location near Grand Central is good!

Wont be rushing back!

title: Location Location Locaation
text: Best home base for exploring Manhattan and Burroughs beyond.  Walking distance from Rockefeller Center and all things midtown. . Easy access to Grand Central Station and all subways. Neighborhood restaurants abound.Great customer friendly staff.

title: Good quality/price/location
text:
Location was fantastic, just a couple of blocks between the UN and the Chrysler building.
Room was decent size. Noise isolation was alright. Bed was comfy and we slept good.
Only one small mirror in the toilet, which was quite unusual. I think another bigger mirror should be placed on the wall near the bed.
Complimentary breakfast was a bit limited but OK. Not many healthy options, but then again, this is the USA. Coffee was good and I liked the oatmeal.
There are only two elevators for 21 floors. There was sometimes a line to get up/down depending on the time (especially around breakfast time 07:00 to 10:00). Fortunately we were on the 4th floor so the elevator didn't have to stop very often when we took it. Just keep that in consideration.
Staff were generally friendly and polite.
I would definitely recommend this hotel for value/price/location.

title: Clean and nice but small rooms
text: It was a nice hotel with a decent location, but the rooms were really small. The breakfast was nothing special, but if you just want something quick to fill you up.  I think it was a good hotel not great

title: Super location
text: Small standard rooms but it is a old hotel, re done in Hampton style.   Staff very helpful, breakfast- Thing were cold IE: the oatmeal, eggs, meat.   Security was excellent and it is a short walk, block and half to Grand Central trains.  Get the green line to go to battery park, easy or up town to the Met.

title: amazing holiday
text: we went on our honeymoon it was a great hotel it was bed n breakfast which was great we had a nice room hotel clean n tidy would definitly go back 2 that hotel it was right in the middle in time square which was perfect luved new york

title: Value for money
text: My friend and I stayed 3 nights this past weekend at this moderately priced hotel.  The location is excellent as it is close to both the train station, Newark Airport Bus drop-off and pickup point and within walking distance of Broadway and subway stations.  The staff was friendly and most helpful.  Our room was clean and everything in it worked well. Despite being there on a busy weekend, our room was very quiet as it faced the back of the building.  Highly recommended.

title: NY Weekend
text:
Fantastisk personal,  så trevliga och hjälpsamma..  Rummen är jätte fina, inte jättestora men för att sova är det kanon..  Sängarna var sköna!  Inte många ställen man får frukost men det får man här, villet är så skönt!  Frukosten var helt ok..  Ligger vid Grand Central och Chrysler building vilket är väldigt centralt!  
Love this Hotel! Great staff that was so friendly and helpful..  Hotel breakfast was good, the rooms small but so nice hey u just sleep there So its perfect!  Realy a Hotel in the center..

title: Great location and wonderful staff
text:
I chose this hotel for our first-ever visit to NYC. It turned out great. The staff was so friendly and helpful. Amarica, the front desk night shift supervisor, even left cookies and a sweet note in our room to celebrate my husband’s birthday! 

The room was small compared to what we Midwesterners are accustomed to, but it was clean, and the bed was very comfortable. We were on a high floor in the corner. Our room was so dark and quiet that we accidentally slept until 9:00 one morning...unheard of for us!

The best feature is the location. It’s just blocks to Grand Central so it’s very easy to get around the City. 

We will be back!

title: Vraiment super
text:
La localisation est parfaite à juste 4min à pieds de la gare grand central. Le personnel est super gentil et accueillant. Nous sommes arrivés le jour de l'anniversaire de mon conjoint et des gâteaux et ballons lui ont été offerts. C'était vraiment gentil. Le personnel est vraiment aux petits soins. Notre chambre était super bien très très très propre. La chambre a été faite tous les jours et toujours super bien. Le petit déjeuner était très bien beaucoup de choix, c'était bon et varié. Il y a une machine à gaufre c'était agréable tous les jours le parfum de la pâte change. Des bouteilles d'eaux sont disponibles à l'accueil gratuitement il faut demander. Du thé et café sont offerts toute la journée super appréciable. 

On a adoré notre séjour.

title: Great hotel stay for a great price
text: My first stay at the Hampton Inn Manhattan Grand Central Hotel and I was pleasantly surprised. Rooms were clean and cozy and super quiet too. Had a good night’s sleep during my stay. Looking forward to visiting again.

title: Prof.
text: Everything was walking distance. Loved 24/7 coffee/tea in the lobby. Room was a bit small and crowded but clean and comfortable. What you need for a short stay. The inly problem in Manhattan is transportation, too much traffic if you take a cab, better walk.

title: TOP
text:
La situation de l’hôtel est parfaite, à une centaine de mètres de la Station Grand Central , d'où vous pouvez rejoindre tous les attractions de la ville, tout en étant dans une rue moins passante, et donc moins bruyante.
Le personnel est sympa et serviable, et le petit déjeuner copieux

title: Very handy location for public transport
text: We were happy with this hotel choice and it "grew on me"--we had a very comfortable and convenient stay in NYC. There are loads of reviews to let people work out what this hotel offers. My main comment is that my impressions improved over our six night stay and we'd be happy to stay there again. I think there overall there was not much to complain about.

title: Great Stay
text: My boyfriend and I had an amazing stay here. Location is perfect. Rooms are rather old but very clean and neat! Front desk was so helpful and nice the entire time we were there. The only thing that we really disliked was the plastic cutlery at breakfast because of how much waste it generates. Other than that I would highly recommend.

title: Underwhelming and disappointing
text:
Just returned from our 2nd trip to NY and first time at this hotel. We decided to book away from Times Square as it is generally cheaper, which this place is, but beware - don't be tricked into booking here if you are going because of the breakfast! 

Pros:
Location - very easy to get to Grand Central, lots of places nearby etc.
Off of 2nd ave so very little street traffic in front of hotel, so definitely quieter.  

Staff - friendly, booked us a town car for our return to the airport which was great. Check in was smooth. 

Cons:
The breakfast - So small, so slow. It is offered from 6-10 and we were downstairs between 7-715 each morning, so getting up earlier does not solve the problems. There are not enough seats for 21 floors of people, the actual breakfast area is so small you can't fit more than 5 people in the area at a time so their is a giant line that snakes around. 

Elevators - 21 floors and 2 elevators and one always didn't work! Ask for a lower floor that way you can take the stairs. No need to be higher up as their is no view or street traffic. 

We booked this hotel thinking we would save a few dollars being outside times squares AND saving on breakfast. But sadly we were VERY disappointed that the breakfast was too small, too busy, and we had to end up buying breakfast 2 out of 3 morning's because it's not worth waiting 30 minutes for not only a seat, but food. Treat this hotel as no breakfast offering because chances are you won't ever get it. I personally don't want to have to fight through and stress on my vacation for something that is supposed to add value.

title: Great Value - Great Location
text:
No frills good place to stay. Nice people working, good value, great location in Midtown and very easy check-in process through use of the Hilton App. 

Also they have toothpaste and basic items available in case you forget.

title: Overall great value
text: All the staff were extra friendly and helpful. Rooms were clean. Close to Grand Central and subway stations. Breakfast selection was good, however not enough toasters, waffle makers etc and not enough seating. They need one of those restaurant style toasting machines that is constantly rotating. This was a bottleneck and created unnecessary lines. Still overall great value.

title: Great stay!
text: Have stayed here several times and would highly recommend.  Great location.  Staff was pleasant and efficient.  Rooms were clean and neat.   A great location in Midtown on a quiet street.  Would recommend and would stay again myself.

title: excellent except for night time security guard
text: night time security guard treated me like I was trespassing. otherwise, everything else exceeded my expectations. the location is great being so close to grand central. the check in staff was so courteous and professional. they need to school the security guard on tone and manner. when having breakfast, he sat down at my table and when I said Hi, he rolled his eyes and continued eating.

title: Perfecto
text:
Somos una familia de 4 miembros, la pareja y dos hijas de 15 y 18 años, y hemos pasado una semana alojados en el hotel en nuestro viaje de vacaciones a NYC. 
La ubicación del hotel es perfecta, a solo 5 min de la Estación Grand Central y por tanto con excelente comunicación en metro, pero también a 10-15 min de Times Square, 5 av, y los lugares mas relevantes de Midtown. 
El hotel perfecto, en limpieza, servicios y personal siempre muy atento a nuestras necesidades. 
Ha sido un gran acierto haber elegido este hotel, y repetiríamos sin dudarlo.

title: Have stayed several times
text: Thoroughly enjoyed this time again here. Location is great - not on a main busy street so a bit quieter than some other places I’ve stayed before. Great friendly staff. Clean. Walkability score is high!

title: Bon rapport qualité prix
text:
Très bien situé pour un séjour à Manhattan, les chambres sont simples mais correct et excellente pour récupérer le personnel est très cordial.
Une petite remarque, il manque un mini bar dans la chambre pour ce typer d’hôtel néanmoins je vous recommande cet endroit

title: Five days in NYC
text:
- small room
- very poor breakfast
- facilities with unpleasant smell
- poor reception
- Good location
- Very friendly and efficient staff
- Thanks for the location and staff, from the front desk staff to the bar and cleaning staff.

title: Business Trip
text: Ashley was fantastic! Made me feel welcome and was extremely helpful. Room was nice and perfect for what I needed. Quiet and accessible to what I needed in mid-town. Breakfast was simple.  Thank you, Ashley!

title: Ottima location!!!
text:
Abbiamo soggiornato 5 notti per visitare per la seconda volta Manhattan e dintorni. Hotel della catena Hilton, camere pulitissime e con spazio adeguato. Ottima vista dal 21’ piano! Tutto il personale super gentile e disponibile. Prezzo con pernottamento e prima colazione (discreta ma sufficiente per iniziare la giornata) adeguato, anzi anche conveniente per i prezzi di Manhattan!!
Posizione strategica!
Consigliato!!

title: Great location!
text: This location is fantastic and walking distance to anything you would want.  The Front Desk associates were the highlight of my stay.  Very friendly, warm and inviting.  I've stayed at other hotels in NYC and the front desk had little to no customer service skills.  Not these ladies!  Will stay here the next time I am in the City

title: 1er semana del US Open
text: Cerca de Grand Central Station pero suficientemente alejado del bullicio de Av 42 y Lexington. Uno de los pocos con desayuno incluido, aunque el espacio para desayunar es pequeño. Espacio con café o té de cortesía las 24 horas. Cafetera en la habitación. Excelente limpieza de la habitacion. Un poco incómoda la puerta corrediza del baño.

title: Excellent stay!
text:
My family and I stayed at this little gem of a hotel for 10 days while we settled our daughter in college. 
Besides the obvious advantages of its fabulous location, what made our stay so enjoyable were the staff, who were so professional and helpful and went above and beyond to make us comfortable. I have to make particular mention of Ashleigh and Amarica. Many thanks. 
The rooms are spotlessly maintained and the breakfast more than adequate most enjoyable. The serving staff were friendly and happy oblige. 
I will happily go here again and would highly recommend it to others.

title: Great
text: Friendly stuff, especially Consuelo , she made my stressfull mornings better, because always she was kind and smiling !!! Good food, good rest, quiet and Close to the most important places to visit!i Felt safe and everybody was very kind. U cand call a cab from the reception

title: Excelente
text: A localização do hotel é excelente, atendimento cortês, café da manhã delicioso, com diversas variedades de alimentos e acomodações limpas. Indico com certeza o hotel e, caso volte a NY, ficarei novamente hospedada nele.

title: Viaggio agosto 2019
text:
posizione centrale vicino a Gran Central. Ottimo rapporto qualità/prezzo. Colazione inclusa difficile da trovare a New York.
Camere ampie e ottima pulizia.Wii FI  gratuito. Personale cordiale e efficiente

title: DELUSO
text:
Basso rapporto qualità/prezzo
Sono rimasto ESTREMAMENTE deluso. Se si Esclude la posizione OTTIMA e STRATEGICA nel cuore di Manhattan...
Armadio praticamente INESISTENTE 
Frigo MANCANTE
Stanza PICCOLISSIMA

title: Doctor
text:
Stanze ampie,silenziose pulizia e colazione inclusa, abbastanza varia.
Posizione centrale vicino a Gran Central comoda per gli spostamenti in centro città e fuori. Personale cordiale e disponibile per ogni necessità.

title: Good hotel, good price
text:
The hotel is clean, the room is not big, but is enough for a couple. The staff is courteous and able to help.
The included breakfast is a little busy, but it’s Ok.
The location is near the Grand Central Terminal.
I suggest a lower level room, because the elevator is busy sometimes.

title: Great Hotel, wonderful staff, & great complimentary breakfast
text: Everything was amazing. The room was clean & spaces to be in NYC. They have tables outside in the front of the hotel to sit & relax. The staff was amazing. My only gripe was my card was charged hours bebefo we arrived. Not a huge issue, but would have like to know that was going to be done a head of time. Everything was great!!!

title: Bon hotel bien situé
text:
Bon hotel, bien situé à Manhattan et proche de la gare Grand Central.
Le petit-déjeuner est copieux et assez diversifié.
Les chambres sont spacieuses et les lits (2 queen bed) sont confortables.
Je recommande cet hotel.

title: Garanzia di qualità
text:
Qualità prezzo imbattibile, 15 min a piedi da Times Square, dietro il palazzo dell' ONU, vicinissima a Grand Central e all'imbarco dei traghetti. Stanze pulite, bagno comodo. Internet veloce e colazione ben fornita seppur non troppo. Fitness center carino, comodo e pulito. 
Un ottimo soggiorno

title: Great stay!
text: Awesome staff. Nice breakfast. Pillows too thin for me and a mini fridge in the room would make it 10/10. Good location for most things we needed to do. Seriously friendly staff - cleaning to breakfast to front desk.

title: très bon hôtel très bien situé.
text:
j'avais pris une chambre familiale (2lit queen)Nous étions 4 moi, ma femme, et mes 2 filles 15 et 22ans. elle était très spacieuse, la literie confortable. Le petit déjeuner était copieux. l'hotel est très bien situé, à 2mn de grand central station(4 lignes de métro) à pied. 
Nous sommes venue en train de l'aéroport de Newark(21H) et reparti vers Newark quelque jours plus tard, il nous a fallu 1H30 porte à porte dans les 2 cas et encore c'est parceque c'était la première fois que nous utilisions ce mode de transport, 
Le personnel de l'hotel était très sympathique et serviable.
En conclusion, je recommande.

title: Wonderful Hotel and very friendly staff! We really liked this location.
text: Clean room and well kept during our four night stay. Short Walk  to Grand Central Station, and Untied Nations Building. Good complimentary breakfast. A;; of the staff that we encountered where courteous and helpful

title: Excellent Hotel
text: Excellent location and very friendly and helpful staff - especially the ladies at Reception. Very good breakfast and clean / tidy rooms. Walking distance to Grand Central station and Times Square. Would definitely use the hotel again and highly recommend to others.

title: Wonderful Hampton Inn, as usual
text: Booked our room 30 minutes before arriving— our flight out of LGA got cancelled so we called a nearby Hampton’s Inn. They were booked but were also so helpful in booking a room at the Hampton Inn nearby Grand Central. Checking in was done in 2 minutes, our room was perfectly clean, and so spacious! Breakfast stately early and didn’t end too early either (6-10). Loved staying near the subway and having such a friendly staff. $140 is about as high as I will go for a room, so that’s the top of my budget, but a great value for the location! Will be back again!!

title: Hôtel au top
text:
Hôtel très bien situé près du métro et de la gare Grand Central.
Au pied du Chrysler Building et tout à côté de l’ONU.
Chambres de taille moyenne, mais très fonctionnelle et très propres. 
Le petit déjeuner est top : de bons produits frais et on peut faire nos gaufres ... les enfants adorent. 
Très bon rapport qualité/prix.... rare dans Manhattan un hôtel de ce standing qui offre le petit déjeuner. 
Personnel très agréable. 
Au pied de l’immeuble, il y a une agence de location de voiture Avis ..... nous avons loué une voiture pour 58 dollars 
Je recommande vivement cet hôtel, et j’y retournerai 😉

title: Très bruyant.
text:
Chambre très bruyante. Il n'y a pas de double vitrage et les bruits provenant de la rue sont insupportables.
La climatisation doit être couper tellement elle fait un bruit de réacteur.
Dans l'ensemble la chambre est correcte et propre.

title: Excellent location and value!
text: Lobby staff was super friendly and accommodated both an early check in and late check out at no cost, based on availability.  Clean rooms, affordable price, and excellent location near Grand Central Station.  The breakfast had a great variety, including hot items, like bacon, eggs, and waffles!

title: Altamente recomendable
text:
Hemos estado alojados 8 días y todo ha estado muy bien. La ubicación espectacular, el personal del hotel bastante eficiente y dispuesto a ayudar, el desayuno (gratuito) por encima de lo esperado (aunque también es verdad que no esperábamos demasiado..), la habitación (para 4 personas) suficientemente amplia (teniendo en cuenta que hablamos de NY) y muy muy limpia.
Si pillas un buen precio (como nos ha pasado a nosotros, 200€/noche en agosto) es genial. No podemos poner ni un “pero” a nuestra estancia. Sin duda, para recomendar.

title: Zentral gelegenes Hotel
text:
nur zu empfehlen
sehr freundliches und zuvorkommendes Personal 
Check-In war sogar vor 15 Uhr möglich
leckeres Frühstück - auch glutenfrei war kein Problem
beim Auschecken konnten wir unser Gepäck problemlos im Hotel lagern (in einem separaten abgesperrtem Raum)

title: Really friendly staff
text:
The decor is a little dated but clean. The hotel is a 6 minute walk from Grand Central station and about a 20 minute walk from Times Square. We really liked the location of this hotel as it was within walking distance of major attractions but in a quieter area of the city so after a long day sight seeing we could chill and relax.

The breakfast buffet had ample choice (fruit, cereal, hot option (daily variation of turkey sausage,bacon or sausage party then egg option and sometimes potato option) waffle maker, bagels, toast, yogurt and doughnuts. Juice, tea, hot chocolate and coffee also available at breakfast.

All staff were really friendly and made us feel like a valued customer.

Our stay at this hotel was problem free.

title: Great stay
text:
Hotel just two blocks from Grand Central station. Our room was on the 16th floor, big enough for the two of us. We slept very good, the bed is comfy and not a lot of noise from the streets. Available in the room for free: hair dryer, ironing equipment, safe, small coffee machine (coffee and cups too), various toiletries etc. 
Breakfast is free every day, from 7-10am. Bagels, toast, yogurt, fruit, cereals, waffles and ofcourse a hot breakfast like egg, sausages and wedgies. Everything very well organized.
One lower level from the reception is a fitness room, a computer room and a vending machine if you’re feeling thirsty or looking for some snacks. Also available: free tea and coffee all day in the dining area.

We found it very easy to get around by using a 7-day metrocard, which is only $33 dollars for unlimited use. If you like to explore the area by door, Times Square is about 15-20 min walk from the hotel and Central Park 25 min (walk along 5th avenue for nice shops and st Patrick Cathedral!).
Hope you will enjoy your stay just as much as we did!

title: Convenient location
text: This hotel is conveniently located near Grand Central Terminal. We had a room with 2 queen beds, not very spacious but ok for a family of 4 for a couple nights. Breakfast is included which is nice, but you may have to wait for a table. Sometimes there were queues for the elevator as well. Staff was friendly and helpful. I would stay again because I love the neighborhood.

title: Good stay
text: We stayed here in Aug 2019 for a family vacation. Really good location and super friendly staff. All hotels are overpriced in New York but you get a few the extras for no extra cost ( wifi, breakfast ). Would surely stay here again.

title: Comfortable and convenient
text: Great location. Nice and quiet away from the hustle and bustle.  Friendly staff. Had a few problems checking in, but that wasn’t indicative of the stay. Room was comfortable. We didn’t use the food service.

title: Exceptional staff
text: The decor was outdated.  Hotel needs updated carpet and brighter wallpaper. Everything is brown. The front desk staff were very friendly and accommodating. Housekeeping was excellent and cheerful. Food service was very good. They worked hard to keep up and were pleasant. Quality of the food was above average. Location in NYC requires a bit of walking to get anywhere noteworthy. It’s a small hotel, but management has to be good to have that outstanding of a staff.

title: A great stay in the ideal location
text:
A great stay from the minute we checked in to when we left. The best thing about the hotel is the top location, a few minutes walk to fifth avenue and Times Square. Grand Central station is also very close by which helps.

Breakfast was nice and varied and helped start the day well and the always available tea, coffee, hot chocolate and cookies meant that we always felt refreshed.

The rooms were small and a tight fit for 4 people but this was not unexpected. The bathrooms were tiny and the showers not great but manageable for a few nights. The décor needs updating really but again it’s fine for a few nights and the beds are comfortable which is the main thing.

Easy to get Ubers outside the front door if needed and lots of shops nearby to eat, drink or buy stuff. A couple of 24-hour pharmacies nearby helped as well.
Overall a great base from which to explore New York and I’d be happy to stay there again.

title: We booked because of the breakfast.
text:
When searching the internet for somewhere to stay in Manhattan we noticed the free breakfast included in the price here. After reading the glowing reviews we booked a four night stay in May.

So pleased we did. As everyone says, the wonderful staff are a credit to the hotel. 

The location is ideal. We've stayed opposite Maddison Square Garden before and it was very noisy. It was so peaceful here, internally as well as externally.

Although the room is small,the bed was comfortable and the bathroom was well thought out.  Good shower, hairdryer & the bonus of a little night light.

There was free bottles of water on reception if you wanted it. Also water dispensers with lemon or cucumber added if you preferred a cup of that. On an evening we often helped ourselves to a hot chocolate & cookie which were also available for free. Nice little touches. 

But it was the breakfasts that made the difference. The pound is weak against the dollar at the minute, so too save money to spend on sight seeing because we didn't have to buy breakfast really helped. There was plenty of choice of hot & cold things to eat, frequently replenished. Although the room isn't big we never had a problem finding somewhere to sit (Family of four adults ).

We would definitely recommend this hotel as a great base.

Thank you to all the staff who made our stay pleasurable.

title: Wedding Dress Shopping
text:
We had a room with two full size beds and there were 3 of us staying in the room. The room was spacious enough and the room was clean and nice, nothing fancy but modern. The only thing missing was a little refrigerator which would have been great to store cold water. 
We would definitely stay here again next time we go to NY.

title: Super emplacement et hotel
text:
Séjour avec nos 2 filles nous avons donc loué une chambre quadruple. Chambre un peu vieillotte maïs franchement très suffisante.
Petit déjeuner bien.
Cookies pour le goûter supers bons et très agréable d’avoir un petit quelque chose à manger en rentrant d’une longue balade !! Ainsi que les boissons fraîches et café...
Emplacement fabuleux car proche de la 5ème avenue et au calme.
A recommander +++

title: Buona scelta
text:
A pochi passi dalla Grand Central Station, l’hotel Hampton Inn offre una buona sistemazione in una buona posizione per la visita di Manhattan. Le stanze sono abbastanza grandi, con aria condizionata, televisione, cassa forte, asse e ferro da stiro. Il bagno comprende la vasca con doccia e anche l’ asciuga capelli. Non c’è microonde o frigorifero, almeno non c’era nella nostra stanza. 
La colazione, offerta nella saletta al piano terra, è abbastanza varia e abbondante.
Il personale è molto gentile e disponibile, soprattutto le signore dell’area colazioni.
La struttura non è modernissima ma tutto sommato ben tenuta.
Insomma, un’ottima scelta per una sistemazione a buon prezzo e in buona posizione.
Wi-Fi gratuito disponibile.

title: Bueno
text: Es un hotel tres estrellas en la que está muy bien la relación precio-calidad.Sirven un desayuno en el que incluyen cafe , te, jugos, cereales, leche, huevos, salchichas, papas, tostadas, dulces, quesos y manteca, Algo de donnuts y bagels. wafles.

title: Great location
text: Great location.  Room is small and clean, but we were hardly in it.  I didn't go down, but heard from my partner the free breakfast is kinda of a zoo.  The elevators during that time were very slow.  Not sure if they hand out bottled water all the time, but I think setting up a refillable water bottle station would save on costs and the environment.  Comfortable king size bed.

title: Hampton inn Manhattan Grand Central
text:
The service was good service, staff was very friendly and helpful. The room was very confortable, but there was a lot of noise ; we could hear everything from the other rooms or the hallway.
The Hampton inn Manhattan Grand Central is very well situated in Manhattan, we could do almost anything we wanted by walk.

title: Go Early for Breakfast
text: Great location and an 8 block walk to Broadway theaters. Friendly and patient staff. We found our room on 2nd floor to be small and because of this couldn’t get a cot. Breakfast was very good and goes from 6-10 am. Parking next door was $47 for 24hrs. Valet got our bags early so we could explore Times Sq before Aladdin began.

title: overall good
text: The rooms were small but clean. Super friendly helpful staff. Close to grand central subway station. Competitive price with other hotels. Good free breakfast but limited seating space. They had free bottles of water which was handy when we were leaving out to sight see.

title: Great experience
text: Great hotel at a great price. Very good location, close to Grand Central. Pleasantly surprised with the variety and quality of the breakfast. AC worked well, too bad I couldn't shift the fan upwards. Would be happy to return

title: Buena experiencia
text:
Mi experiencia en este hotel fue muy buena, personal dispuesto y amable, habitaciones limpias y cómodas, desayuno variado y una excelente ubicación ( a unos pasos de la estación del metro) o caminando a muchas de las principales atracciones.
No es barato para la sencillez del hotel pero Nueva York es caro por lo que considero que si lo vale
Definitivamente si volvería a este hotel

title: EXCELLENT ADVENTURE!
text: We stayed here July 13-16 2019.  The girls at the front desk were an absolute delight to deal with.  We arrived a few hours before check in so we had to store our luggage and they could not have been more friendly and helpful.  Dashanda was especially wonderful.  Her bubbly personality, big smile and funny demeanor were a welcome joy especially when returning from a long hot afternoon of exploring the city.  The hotel itself was very very clean and well taken care of.  We found our room a little humid at times but that's to be expected when the weather is that hot. Housekeeping left us extra shampoo and conditioner as requested. Good breakfast, good location and the freshly baked cookies were a nice touch.

title: Perfekt beliggenhed
text:
Perfekt beliggenhed på Manhatten i gåafstand til det meste.
Gode senge og fin morgenmad. Personalet var meget venlige og imødekommende. Ikke det store luksus, men alt i alt et rigtig godt hotel til prisen.

title: Manhattan Move Week
text: The location was great for us as we were moving our son from Queens to Manhattan. The hotel is close to Grand Central which means easy access to subways.  It's small (as you would expect tucked in behind Pfizer on 43rd street) and rooms are small, but very comfortable.  The best part is the staff.  They are very friendly and helpful.

title: Basic Property with Loads of Benefits
text:
If the Hampton Inn near Grand Central had been located anywhere but where it stands now, it would be a 3-star property. 

The lobby is quite non-descript and small. The hotel itself is clean, but very pedestrian looking. Certainly nothing like the 'swankier' properties in Manhattan; not even close.

Having said that, it was a great place to: 

A) Keep your dollars in your wallet and use them elsewhere in Manhattan. 

B) Get a decent full breakfast in the morning and save multiple dollars there (especially if you have a family).

C) Allow your feet to get a much-needed rest because Grand Central is so close and you can go anywhere from there. My wife and I are walkers, but not when it's so hot and muggy. 

All in all, the Hampton Inn is superfluously convenient. 

Also, the front desk is wonderfully friendly and accessible, especially Imelda. 

The breakfast room is clean and well-run, albeit crowded at times, and if you need anything, seek out Nancy: She will take good care of your breakfast needs. 

5-star property? No. 

5-star stay? Yes.

title: Excellent location in New York
text: Very pleased with the hotel, clean rooms and bathroom. Handy to have a safe in the room and the nighlight in the bathroom was a good idea. Breakfast was great with plenty of options. Staff were very helpful. Great location in midtown, only minutes away from Grand Central Location.

title: Great location, excellent, friendly customer service
text:
Stayed 5 nights in June/July. 
Check-in was smooth & friendly.
Bed was very comfortable for us & we liked the large shower.
Room was fine for us. (Would look a lot better though if the curtains were changed or removed - looks like they'd shrunk in laundry, lining was longer & base of curtains crumpled). 
Free breakfast was great with a variety of cereal, breads, waffles, fruit, yoghurt & cooked eggs, bacon, sausage, etc. Dining staff were friendly & helpful.
There was always cold water in the foyer  with orange , lemon  or cucumber in it - this was really apprecuated in the hot  week we were there. Location so close to Grand Central worked perfectly for us this time.
Would definitely like visit again.

title: Una recepcionista y un seguridad muy poco profesionales.
text:
Comenzaré comentando lo positivo, que en general es casi todo. La ubicación perfecta. La habitación que nos dan está bien, limpia, de climatización ideal. El desayuno es escaso pero también está bien en general.
El personal del buffet es amable y educado, como la chica de la recepción que nos atiende al llegar.
El problema viene en el señor que se supone que es seguridad pero se dedica a mirarnos cada noche cada vez que volvemos como si fuésemos delincuentes. Y para colmo se pone delante de la puerta de ascensor a mirarnos mientras se cierra. Por no hablar de una recepcionista de color que al hacer el check-out que no solo no saluda, sino que tampoco contesta al saludo, y como no la entiendo muy bien a la primera, me repite lo mismo subiendo el tono y de malas formas, es una borde y una impertinente que solo es simpática si la entiendes a la primera y ella te entiende a ti a la primera. Desde luego no sé como gente como el matón ese que tienen por seguridad y la recepcionista pueden estar en esos puestos de trabajo cara al público.
Si alguna vez vuelvo, nunca más dirigirme a ellos.

title: Amazing Hotel
text: We stayed in this hotel for 3 days and they welcomed us very warmly. The room was small, but it was very clean. Thank you to the housekeeping staff, especially the housekeeping manager Ms. Saloua Merzguioui for their wonderful service. The security in the hotel was fantastic considering how scary it can get in New York at night. The hotel even had a coffee and tea station all day long. Overall we had an amazing stay and next time I am in New York I will definitely stay here.

title: New York Girls trip
text: We had a blast! Hotel staff were super friendly and made the stay even more enjoyable.  We would have liked a fridge in our room, but there wasn’t one available.  Warm cookies at the front desk made up for that :)

title: Überraschend gut !
text:
Es ist nicht neu, aber gepflegt 
Es ist ein B&B mit amerikanischem Plastik-Frühstück, aber immerhin frischen Früchten und persönlichem Service 
Kostenlose Wasserflaschen am Empfang 24h 
Die Lage ist top
Für New Yorker Verhältnisse quasi eine Top-Adresse, mit gutem Preis-Wert Verhältnis & nur wenige Meter von Grand Central entfernt

title: immersion midtown
text: hôtel superbement placé, à 5 min à pied de la ligne de métro L grand central. Petit déj gratuit plus que correct, lit king size dans les chambres,propreté au top ainsi que le service(notamment réservation d'un taxi pour le retour+consigne bagage--->excellent pour profiter de la dernière journée du voyage). Bref ,séjour parfait,on y retournera les yeux fermés.

title: good location, friendly staff
text: Very polite and friendly staff. Complimentary water on a hot days was great!. Breakfast was very tasty. Good location. Beds were comfortable and room was clean. Horrible view tho.  Spend all days out so not that important.

title: Przytulny hotel w bardzo dobrej lokalizacji
text: Pokój mały ale komfortowy, łazienka z dużym prysznicem. Bardzo blisko stacji Grand Central. Hotel oferuje bezpłatne śniadania w formie bufetu. Dodatkowym atutem jest to, że hotel oferuje bezpłatną wodę butelkowaną, która szczególnie przydaje się w letnie, upalne dni w NYC.

title: Great location and exceptionally friendly
text: Hotels in New York can be a ripoff and too costly to consider.  For a NY hotel, we found the Hampton Inn to be reasonably priced. It is not a fancy hotel and rooms were small, but it is clean and the staff were really helpful. Breakfast was plain buffet style but adequate. We would stay again. Recommended.

title: Great location near Grand Central Station
text: Great stay, the breakfast area is a little small, but expected since NYC doesn't have much space due to the size of the city etc.. it was nice to be able to leave our bags while sightseeing at the hotel before check-in, they tagged them and we were also pleasantly surprised after we checked-out to hold them as well as we toured the city, and be able to come back to pick them up at a reasonable timeframe.

title: Excellent hotel dans le centre de NYC
text:
Excellente localisation au niveau de Midtown NY, près de l’ONU et près de la station de Grand Central avec le métro : parfait pour rayonner dans la ville. Nombreuses options pour diner en take away autour de l’hotel.
Chambre bien équipée, avec la clim, et super literie :)
Petit déj buffet continental inclus (attention: pic d’affluence de 9h à 10h).
Je recommande vraiment cet hotel et j’y retournerais assurément si je reviens à New York.

title: Increíble
text:
Es con diferencia el
Mejor alojamiento que os podéis coger en new York, con desayuno habitaciones nuevas y personal de 10, increíble opción, nada que ver con otros hoteles, el transfer coincidimos con gente que iba a otros y cuando vieron la habitación... fliparon

title: Would definitely return!
text:
I just stayed at Hampton Inn Grand Central for 5 nights and loved everything about this hotel. Every single staff I encountered was friendly and helpful. The room was clean with a comfy bed and everything else you would need. The buffet breakfast was great and a definite plus! The location was perfect and close to tons of restaurants and sites. 
I would absolutely stay here again if I return to NYC and will recommend:)

title: Excelente localização
text: O hotel nos atendeu muito bem! Ótima localização (apenas 2 quadras da Grand Central Station). O café da manhã tem varias opções de comidas e frutas. Os funcionários são atenciosos. Ficamos muito satisfeitos!

title: Lovely break.
text: Stayed hear, 24th June to 30th june. The staff at this hotel were great they were very friendly and very helpful and the hotel itself was great there was plenty of choose from for breakfast and it was plentiful.this hotel is situated near the United Nations building, and close to the grand central station, And if you like walking you can walk 42nd st down to time square it will take about half hour with plenty to see on your way.if you are looking for a quiet friendly comfortable hotel then the Hampton Inn grand central is 100% for you.

title: Très contente de cet hôtel
text: Nous avons aimé l emplacement à côté de la gare et le confort de cet hôtel. La literie est très bonne. Le petit déjeuner était très bon également. Nous reviendrons dans cet hôtel pour un prochain sejour.

title: great location and nice room
text: This is a great hotel in a great location. It is a small hotel right in the heart of Manhattan. It is clean and offers the standard continental breakfast. Nothing special but is it ever? The price is average for Manhattan but it allows you to walk everywhere. If you want to be close to the action, this is the place to stay just know that you will pay for the privilege. It is NYC all the way.

title: family oriented hotel - nice
text:
It is  not easy to choose a hotel in Manhattan  - and after spending 3 nights here I will most certainly return. The location is great - near the subway and main avenues where you can find something to see and eat. The big bonus was the breakfast which was perfect for us and there were great choices. Also must add that we constantly were given bottles of water and reminded to drink - usually along side fresh chocalate chip cookies and warm drinks that were in the lobby!
My only problem that the two double bed room that we chose was too tight for three adults - there just wasnt room to open all suitcases and we found it a little awkward...
the staff was nice and helpful - and my son used the gym early mornings - so that was great as well.

title: Good Base
text:
This is a good base within easy walking distance of all the midtown attractions.  There is not a lot of passing traffic, so it is quieter that other hotels I have stayed in when in New York previously.
Staff at the reception were quick, friendly, and helpful.
The rooms although not big were of a decent size, and were comfortable.
There is also a business centre, with desk top computers, and a printer, and a reasonable gym for those who require the use of them.
There is also The opportunity to have breakfast at the hotel, the staff were really helpful, and the food was good, setting/us up for the day.  They also supplied bags with fruit, cereal bars, water, and flavouring if you wanted them, which staff would make up, or you could collect them from the reception counter.
All in all a good base for the week.

title: Excellent Service! Nice Place! I recommend!
text:
I can't recommend this as a place to stay in NYC enough. From the moment we walked in the staff was extremely welcoming and acted excited to see us. The woman waiting on us even called the manager out to meet us. We told then we were there for World Pride and My B-day. 

We were gone all day long and when we came back they had put a Happy Birthday greeting on our door and left a muffin and come cookies for us. I was blown away! We didn't expect that. 

The rooms are small like New York but very nicely decorated and clean. I've had much worse rooms and hallways at more expensive high end brands. Good water pressure. 

Free breakfast that isn't just bagels and doughnuts. Eggs, sausage, waffle bar etc etc. Really good and great to save on one meal in NYC! They stocked it quickly and dealt well with a crazy breakfast crowd. 

They had some free water with lemon in it in the lobby most times and even cookies at night. 

When we needed something like extra towels we had them immediately. So fast we didn't know they were at the door. LOL

When we left for World Pride in our crazy makeup and costumes they took our pics and were excited for us. 

They had a few tables and chairs outside (not in the pics here) which were great to relax in. We ate breakfast there most mornings to avoid the crazy breakfast people.

Conveniently located to Grand Central station with easy transfers all all locations like Times Square etc. It was nice after being in crowds and crazy NYC to be a little off the beaten path in some peace and quiet. (the rooms are soundproof too. We heard nothing!)

I can't think of any negatives. Overall service was incredible. 

We will be back!

title: parfait !
text:
Un hotel très agréable et bien situé, à quelques dizaines de mètres de Grand Central.
Une propreté plus que satisfaisante.
Un personnel agréable, souriant et disponible.
wifi impec.
Le petit dejeuner est top !
Je n'ai aucun point négatif sur cet hotel.

title: Sistemazione super okay!
text:
Scrivo a nome dei miei genitori che per il loro anniversario di matrimonio hanno soggiornato in questo hotel. 
Il servizio e la gentilezza del personale è impeccabile, tutti si mostrano cortesi e gentili. Ti aiutano, ti danno consigli e sono davvero molto preparati. I miei genitori hanno trovato al loro arrivo un cestino pieno di frutta e snack con molti biglietti di "happy anniversary". Davvero deliziosi.
Rapporto qualità/prezzo giusto considerando che si trova a pochi minuti da Times Square e  dall'Empire State Building. La posizione è davvero strategica per girare questa meravigliosa città a piedi. 
La stanza era piccolina ma aveva tutti i tipi di comfort necessari. 
Gli unici consigli che vorrebbero lasciare sono:
1) la colazione potrebbe essere migliorata in termini di qualità e quantità. 
2) le camere dovrebbero essere insonorizzate molto in quanto si fa fatica (ma forse dipende dalla posizone della stanza) ad addormentarsi per i forti rumori provenienti la strada e per una torre evaporativa situata al palazzo di fronte. 
Per il resto tutto davvero super! Lo consigliamo vivamente!

title: Absolutely great
text:
Location was perfect. Attention of personel was great and breakfast almost a brunch. Front desk people (Erika and Ashley) always pending of us. English and Spanish speacking.
Very close to Grand Central.
Very clean bedroom and was cleaned every day.
Would visit this hotel again without any doubt.

title: Friendly, helpful staff, perfect location
text: We loved this unassuming, fairly small (by New York City standards) hotel. It is not overly fancy or stylish, just a perfect base for sleeping and chilling after a long day out in the city. The rooms are well equipped with very comfy beds and pillows. Furniture is a bit dated but perfectly reasonable for a 3 star hotel. Breakfast is included in the price, a bonus in expensive New York. We ate early most mornings and thoroughly enjoyed both the cooked and continental style breakfast, setting us up for the day. The staff are the highlight, however, and the reception staff in particular were welcoming and extremely helpful. They made our 2 daughters’ stay more special by organising balloons, cupcakes and handwritten note for both their birthdays (18 and 21st!). These touches made our stay and to top it all off we ordered a 6 seater taxi back to the airport through the hotel. What arrived for us was a white limo! This may well have been a coincidence and nothing to do with the hotel but it rounded off a fantastic holiday perfectly. We couldn’t stop laughing on the way to the airport. I’d highly recommend this hotel for a quiet location, bang in the middle of Manhattan with great service.

title: Just perfect
text:
Location of the hotel was amazing , being right in the centre of everything in Manhattan
Everything is within walking distance.
The price of the room for that location is pretty decent.
The room had all the amenities that I could need.
But the best thing about the hotel has to be Dashanda, the front desk staff who always had a warm smile on her face while welcoming the guests. She was very helpful in giving tips with her guidance to where to go , how to go, when to go. 
Thanks alot Dash ❤

title: Great stay!
text: Very close to Grand Central which is great for easy subway access. Very friendly staff. Clean hotel and room! Breakfast wasn’t the best, but I’m not generally a fan of hotel breakfast. Coffee was good though, so I can’t complain! Also, the rooms are very small, but that’s to be expected in New York! Would defiantly stay again!

title: Great place to stay
text: The hotel was great. Staff were nice and friendly. Breakfast was great. Very clean bedroom and was cleaned every day. It was a great location and was walking distance to grand central. You can leave your bags etc on the day you are leav

title: Girlfriend trip to NYC
text: Hampton was as expected, clean, comfortable and safe. Front desk assistant Dash was very helpful and fun. She welcomed us every time we came back from sightseeing. She helped us with a luggage scale so we could rearrange the weight in our luggage before we got to the airport.

title: Long weekend in NYC
text: The hotel staff was very friendly and professional  They always made it a point to remember our names.  The breakfast was plentiful and loved the cookies they had at the front desk every evening.  Great location, just minutes from Grand Central Station that made it easy to get around the city.  Walking distance to tourist spots but far from crowds.  I would definitely stay in this location again.

title: Hampton Inn Manhattan Grand Central
text: The rooms in this hotel are very small compared to other Hampton Inns. It is a reasonable value for New York City. It is conveniently located near Grand Central Station. Staff were very friendly and helpful.

title: Met my expectations
text: Hotel is in a very convenient location. It’s a 5 minute walk to Grand Central Station. Staff are very friendly. Room is a bit tiny but that’s expected because of the hotel’s location. Overall, I enjoyed my stay. My only complaint is that the breakfast area is a bit too small for the amount of people staying at the hotel.

title: Centralt beliggende hotel, søde og hjælpsomme ansatte.
text:
Centralt beliggende hotel, søde og hjælpsomme ansatte.
Fin morgenmad, altid mulighed for at tage en kop kaffe, the og varm cacao. 
Lille kontor med PC'er i kælderen, med tilknyttet printer, hvor det var muligt at printe boading pass ud. 
Mulighed for at opbevaring af bagage efter check out.

title: Good price for a hotel in Manhattan
text: The hotel was just average.  No frills but it was clean and the employees were very nice and helpful.  Good price for staying in Manhattan.  Rooms dark and in need of renovation.  Beds were comfortable.  The wait for the elevators was horrible though.  Breakfast was so-so.  Would stay here again if not just for the price.

title: The staff at the hotel are what makes it great.
text:
The negatives: Basic facilities, bedroom extremely dark. Can't understand the plastic cutlery and paper plates from an environmental point. 
The positives: location is fantastic, really great price for New York. The biggest plus with this hotel is the team. From checkin to check our every person we met were smiling, courteous and couldn't do enough to make our visit enjoyable. The receptionist who checked us in was the same girl that checked us out. She is a credit to the hotel( loved her singing) even though basic I would have no hesitation recommending and would definitely stay there again. Thank you

title: Soggiorno piacevole
text:
L’hotel si trova vicino a Grand Central Terminal, quindi è comodo per spostarsi con la metro o per visitare il centro di Manhattan a piedi. Consiglio di vivere la città a piedi. La nostra camera era piccola ma accogliente, la notte abbiamo dormito senza problemi, non sentivamo i rumori della strada (eravamo al 12esimo piano). La colazione è nella media, ci sono yogurt, cereali, pane e brioches, marmellate, frutta (mele e banane) c’è anche una parte salata. Interessante sono le due macchine per fare i waffle. L’unico problema è che la sala per la colazione non è molto grande e dopo le 7.30 c’era molta gente.
Nel complesso lo consigliamo per il buon rapporto qualità prezzo, rispetto agli altri hotel a New York.

title: Great hotel for business and pleasure!
text:
We were in town for a trade show and stayed for some fun.
Its close to Grand Central and convenient to the convention center and theater district.

Staff is friendly and helpful -especially Erica Green, Sales Coordinator.

Rooms are celan and beds are comfortable.

Breakfast area is clean and keep well stocked.

We've been there several times and its been consistent.

title: Lindo hotel
text: Personal muy amable, hablan bastante español, bien predispuestos. Ubicación ideal. Desayuno normal, habitación limpia y bastante espaciosa para relación precio calidad. La cama King de acuerdo a lo prometido

title: NELLA MEDIA
text:
Ho soggiornato in questo hotel per cinque notti assieme alla mia famiglia.
La posizione è buona, nella midtown di Manhattan, a circa cinque minuti a piedi dal palazzo delle Nazioni Unite e dalla Grand Central Station.
Per il resto direi che l'hotel è " Nella Media " sia come disponibilità del personale, come pulizie e colazione.
L'unica cosa che non è " Nella Media " è il prezzo che mi sembra un po' elevato per la qualità dei servizi offerti, ma è risaputo che Manhattan sia un po' cara in tutto,
non solo nel prezzo degli hotel

title: Descubriendo Nueva York desde la tranquila calle E 43
text: Me gustó la localización del hotel, su sencillez y el trato correcto y cordial, el desayuno incluido, la invitación a café y galletas por la tarde, y la tranquilidad de la habitación. Se llegaba rápido al metro, Estación 42, en Grand Central. Muy recomendable.

title: Great value and service
text: Friendly staff and clean, quiet rooms and free breakfast in Manhattan! What a find and just a few blocks from Grand Central Station. Near United Nations too. Staff was very helpful and knowledgeable. Would definitely stay here again

title: Nice lil place in the heart of Midtown
text: A great lil hotel in the heart of Midtown with great amenities and comfortable clean rooms. Stayed three nights and would definitely go back. Staff was friendly and helpful - answered questions and volunteered information. Cookies were delicious!

title: Fun times
text: Excellent staff, great location. Breakfast was fine. Maid staff forgot to restock a few things but overall great hotel. Very friendly helpful front desk clerks and a nice patio area out front that we enjoyed in the evening.

title: Good city base
text: Picked this hotel randomly as it was the best value at the time on booking sites. It’s basic but has everything needed as a base to see the city. It’s also one of the closest hotels to the UN headquarters. Rooms are clean and showers hot. Breakfast had a good selection. Location is about a 3 min walk to Grand Central so it’s easy to get to and get anywhere. Staff very friendly and helpful. I’d stay again.

title: Viaje de trabajo
text: Excelente servicio,muy central para conocer las atracciones de Ny puedes caminar a la gran manzana y al time square,muy buen servicio a la habitación y desayuno incluido,la recepcionista muy amable y en general el servicio del hotel muy atento.

title: Great stay
text: Very convenient,  super friendly staff, very clean.  Would stay here again.  Hampton breakfast was good. Right down the street from grand central and green lune subway.  Beds very comfortable. Also close to subway stop

title: Très satisfait
text: C'est un très bon établissement, Super acceuil, les gens sont très gentil. L'hôtel est très propre et très bien situé dans Manhattan. Très bon rapport qualité prix. Nous sommes très satisfait des services et des lieux. Nous le recommandons tres fortement.

title: Great service and helpful staff
text:
Stayed there last week and was pleasantly surprised by the excellent service, very helpful and friendly staff, and constantly attentive to everyone’s needs. 
Definitely will recommend to others in the future!

title: Parfait!
text:
Excellent rapport qualité/prix pour Manhattan. Bon accueil, bon petit-déjeuner, beaucoup de choix. Nous y reviendrons certainement lors de notre prochain séjour à New York. 
À recommander sans hésiter !

title: Would stay again
text:
Great service...Bryant and the rest of the front of the house staff were incredibly helpful and so pleasant. The breakfast was great, nice location, with most of the must-see places within 5 or 10 minute Uber ride. We had 3 people in a room with 2 full size beds, so it was a little tight, but the facility is nicely appointed. 
Recommend...

title: 4 night stay in NYC
text: We arrived at the hotel after a long journey. Cookies and a bottle of water were a nice touch at check in. We were given our key but with no instruction as to how to get to our room. When we asked we were told which floor like we should have known! Our room was nice and clean and had a city view. Breakfast was simple but ok. The waffle machine was brilliant! The location of the hotel was great, far enough away from the noise of Times Square but near enough to walk to most attractions. Also very near a subway for getting around. I would recommend to anyone visiting NYC.

title: Great NYC hotel
text: I have stayed at over 10 NYC hotels in the past and this turned out to be my favorite.  It is not super fancy but it is clean and in a great location.  The staff was also excellent and friendly.  Highly recommend.

title: Bien placé
text: Hôtel très bien placé à quelques blocs de tomes square. C est la 2eme fois que je m y rends. Toujours les mêmes remarques.... 2 ascenseurs pour une quinzaine d étages, salle de petit déj trop petite, trop chaud dans les chambres. Mais le personnel est très sympa. Bon séjour

title: East marvelous location
text: Entering the hotel, you encounter young staff with a great optimistic attitude. In our experience, a young lady name Dashanda Cheatham, a girl who should grow fast in the hotel business for her knowledge, efficiency, and social skills. Our room in floor 17 was small, but with everything you need, from a perfect modern bathroom to a comfortable queen bed.  Our view was a sufficient site of New York City. The breakfast room we could say is a small space for the number of people starting the day. The morning meal has the necessary to start a day. Do not miss to eat at Patsy's Pizzeria right on the corner on 2nd Ave, a must!

title: Top choice in Manhattan
text: This hotel is situated out of the chaos of Times Square near to Grand Central . Rooms are lovely and clean with the rooms being slightly larger than usual for Manhattan . Breakfast included with the rate which is rare for New York. All major sights within walking distance and good eateries nearby. Staff go above and beyond , friendly and courteous . If your looking for somewhere clean and friendly this is the place for you.

title: 4 nights stay
text:
We stayed at the hotel beginning of may in a superior double room city view.
We enjoyed our stay, the room was clean and well served. Good breackfast.
We appreciated the courtesy of the staff.
Daniele

title: room
text: When I booked I was to receive a room with a view of Manhattan. Well, If you consider a small window with skyscraper across the street a "view", be honest and upfront with your customers. Your website paints a 1000 words, leaving the customer with a lasting impression.

title: Great location, even better service!
text: I'm local to Long Island but was spending the night in NYC with my 5 year old after "Take Your Kid To Work Day". He was soo excited to spend a night in the city and see all the sights. The staff at Hampton Inn really went above and beyond to make our stay a memorable one. The Manager Emilda (sp?) checked us in and when she heard my little guy talking about seeing the "big buildings" out of his room window, she put us up on a top floor overlooking 43rd street. It's the little things like this that made our stay so wonderful. For her to go out of her way to find him a room she knew would have a nice view for him was really sweet. My little guy just sat in the window for about an hour eating his snacks when we first went up. He couldn't get over the view :) The hotel is within walking distance to everything (around 1 mile to Time Square which was about a 20 minute walk with my 5 year old) and if too tired to walk, only about a $7-$8 ride share home. Fast forward to the next morning, we made it down just in time for the free breakfast! The attendant that cleans up the breakfast area and restocks the food saw my little guy and just came on over to say and offer to make him a hot chocolate. Again, something as a parent that you find soo sweet for someone to do for your little one. He had a big ol' smile while she went to the back to warm him up some milk instead of hot water. Then as we're heading up, the little guy wanted to have some cereal in bed (as a special treat) so we were juggling carrying two bowls of cereal with two little containers of milk. So again the attendant came over and went to the back and got us a tray so we could bring everything up without spilling it. Having worked in the service industry through my teen's and 20's and now spending my last 10+ years in sales, I recognize the effort. And the Hampton Inn crew went above and beyond to ensure every little detail of our quick 1 night stay was as memorable and enjoyable as can be. Kudos to you all, you made one 5 year old feel like one super special little guy last week :)

title: Fantastic hotel and great staff!
text: This hotel is top-notch!   Great location and price point.   Breakfast included means more time to enjoy the city and time with friends or family.   Would not hesitate to book this hotel for a future stay.  Thanks Erika!

title: Helpful staff
text: Good location that is convenient for public transportation. Great front desk services - Erika helped us store luggage and recovered a passport! Delicious cookies and decent breakfast. Room is a bit small if you have several suitcases. Wi-Fi is good.

title: Mas de lo que esperaba
text:
Es un hotel pequeño, un poco perdido entre rascacielos. Esta en una cuadra tranquila, entre 2ª  y 3ª Avenida, a media cuadra del Chrysler Building. Facil acceso caminando a Gran Central (menos de 2  cuadras), algunas cuadras de Time Square y 5ª Avenida. A pasos de una gran estación de Metro que comunica con todo. 
El personal es muy amable, el check in rápido y eficiente. Proveen botellas de agua mineral, tienen un servicio libre de bebidas calientes en la planta baja. La habitación es cómoda, bien amoblada, con un baño de buen tamaño, bañera incluida. Colchones, almohadas, sabanas y toallas de buena calidad. Cafetera en la habitación. El desayuno es básico, bien provisto y atendido por personas cálidas y amables.

title: Great customer service
text: This review is more about the customer service aspect at this hotel. I ran into a problem at this hotel involving a small item that went missing. I spoke to Lynn who was the manager on that day and explained what my concern was and without hesitation or argument she personally went to a store 5 blocks away and replaced the item at no charge. I appreciate the front counter staff who initially helped me and extra kudos to Lynn for going out of her way during her busy work day. We have stayed at Hampton properties before and will again. As for our stay, smaller rooms, decent breakfast buffet and overall good customer service. Good value for your money.

title: Habitaciones pequeñas,camas pequeñas y desayuno horroroso
text:
Habitaciones enanas con camas muy pequeñas para 3 adultos, decían que no existen camas más grandes que nos cambiaban a un de cama grande pero teníamos que dormir los 3 juntos...para el precio quede paga en España los hoteles les dan mil vueltas
Desayuno horrible, repetitivo y todo el platos y vasos cartón y sin servicio, solo reponían. Me pareció alucinante que pudiesen en Booking las críticas del desayuno como muy bueno , no puedo creermelo, fue uno de los motivos para evitar ese hotel. Desde luego no volvería y no lo recomiendo

title: Buona sistemazione
text: Lo staff è cordiale e simpatico, la posizione ottima per visitare la città; la struttura è un po' datata, la colazione discreta. Avremmo preferito una doccia con piatto, piuttosto che quella a raso per disabili che aveamo in camera. Ci siamo trovate abbastanza bene.

title: Family trip to NYC
text: Great trip to NYC .  Hampton was great and Dashanda was excellent.  I highly recommend this hotel for anyone that wants to be in midtown Manhattan that is close to everything. Go to Central Park and shop everywhere.

title: average
text: Excellent welcome and support by a very efficient and nice staff. Quick check-in and check-out. Sound advice. But, the room I stayed in - with a balcony - was average and in need of refreshing and possibly refurbishing. The carpet was quite old as well as most of the pieces of furniture. The hotel was calm and the noise from the street acceptable - I stayed on one of the highest floors. The location close to the UN was very convenient. Free wifi was also much appreciated.

title: Great place to stay near Great Central Station
text:
Great location.  Clean rooms.  Large rooms by Manhattan standards.
Very friendly and helpful staff.
Located near to Grand Central Station.  Easy transportation to anywhere in NYC from there on subway or train.

title: Die Lage ist der Hit
text: Die Lage des Hotels war grandios (direkt beim Chrysler Building, nur ein paar Gehinuten zum Hauptbahnhof). Das Frühstück (nach amerikanischem Maßstab) hat gepasst und uns zufrieden gestellt. Die Sauberkeit der Zimmer war ebenfalls hervorragend. Die Betten waren sehr bequem.

title: Very clean and friendly! Great place to stay!
text: We stayed here as a family of four, our room was really clean and cleaned each day.  The warm chocolate chip cookies when we arrived back after a long day trekking around New York were perfect! My teenage boys loved them. Very friendly and welcoming staff, the girls on reception and the lady who sorts the breakfasts! Perfect location for NYC! Great for families. Great place to stay!

title: Too many things to dislike...
text:
Okay, the location wasn't bad (tho extremely noisy - especially at night)...  But, the room was non-descript - bland decor and the mattress - awful.  (We were told it was bland new - it was so hard it felt like sleeping on concrete!)  The pillows were lumpy and hard as well.

The blinking fire light - very bright and annoying.  (We like a dark room.)

The free breakfast - nothing to write home about.  Eggs were pretty gross, potatoes cold.  There was variety, but...

We opted not to have the maid clean the room one day and we were left with 1 toilet paper roll - which was almost gone by the time we left.

The good news: the front desk was friendly and there was free water and cookies.

Maybe business people wouldn't care much, but for 'tourists'...

title: Very clean and friendly...
text:
Nice practical hotel with a great location. Thanks to housekeeping and Nora, the room was so clean and tidy. 

Rates are ok. Breakfast was sufficient and the hotel is very close to central activity which is a plus...

title: Excellent Hotel Services Near UN
text:
Excellent rooms. Great services and awesome breakfast. Being near the UN and New York Downtown, it was awesome getting value for money at Hampton Inn Manhattan Grand Central.
The front office staff were always on their A game, not to mention their supervisors who made sure that my stay was great!

title: Good value for money. Buena relación costo/beneficio.
text:
The hotel is a good value for money choice.  Rooms are clean and comfortable although some are small.  Breakfast is included in the rate, which is something unusual in NYC and if you do not have time for breakfast or are planning to skip lunch, you can take a complimentary bag with a bottle of water, an apple and a couple of additional items to take away.  The staff is very helpful and friendly.  The location is very good, two blocks away form Grand Central Station and about five blocks from 5th Avenue.

El hotel es una muy buena alternativa por su relación costo/beneficio. Las habitaciones son limpias y confortables aunque algunas son chicas. El desayuno está incluido en el precio, lo que es poco usual en NYC y si no se tiene tiempo para el desayuno, ofrece gratis una manzana, un agua y un par de otras cosas para llevar. El personal es muy servicial y atento. La ubicación es muy buena, a dos cuadras de Grand Central Station y a unas cinco de 5th Avenue.

title: Near UN HQ, good breakfast, nice staff
text:
Stayed for 8 days, and enjoyed my stay! Quite a long review because there's many aspect. 

Location & price: 
1) I was there for meeting at UN HQ, and this was one of the most reasonably priced hotel, with breakfast included. & It's just 5 mins walk there, so it's great. 

2) And don't fret, it's about 10 mins walk to fifth Avenue where you can shop till you drop. Plenty of eateries in walking distance. I kept going back to the 99cent pizza place nearby, cos it's convenient, cheap and taste decent! 

Breakfast & water: 
1) Breakfast was good! Cooked food: Egg (they make one type of egg per day, scrambled, omelette, cheese omelette, and it rotates), protein (sausage, breakfast patty, turkey links) and Carbs (potatoes or French toast). There's cereal and oats, bread, bagel and donut too. Oh and the cool thing is they have a waffle machine for you to DIY (I had it once only cos I felt that the batter was quite tasteless). Drinks wise, there's Milk, yogurt, juices, coffee, tea, hot chocolate! Fruits available too! 

2) if you are rushing, they have "happy bags", which contain breakfast-to-go! Very thoughtful of them. Monday to Friday, while stock last 

3) they have cookies every afternoon - evening, while stock last too! Flavor changes 
 
4) There's no bottled water in the room, but you can ask the reception for water (for free)! If you don't want to waste plastic bottles, you can refill water during breakfast time or head to the gym at Basement, there's a water dispenser there :) 

Service 
1) Most staff were very nice! Especially this short lady, I didn't get her name.. We reached early at 9am, she went ahead and check us in and even invited us to enjoy the breakfast! She was also smiley whenever I see her. But, of cos there were exception.. One or two of the receptionist wasn't very nice. Can't help but feel it was a racist thing as I saw that she was alot nicer to Caucasians. 

Others 
1) I think the building and furnishing are quite old? But everything was working, and kept clean. So no complains actually, just a remark! 

2) Only issue that I had was the lift. There's 2 lifts, and the building is 21 storey. I stayed at the highest level. One day, one was spoilt. Took really long to get up and down. Some days, they lock one lift for independent use (at the morning breakfast hour). Thought they could have done it off breakfast peak though. 

All in all, I highly recommend the stay!

title: Great location
text: It’s convenient to walk to all the good places in midtown. Free breakfast was a bonus. Clean room and bed. But thin walls. You can hear conversations and doors in adjacent rooms. Bring ear plugs and they work.

title: Fijne locatie
text: Fijn hotel, goed ontbijt en perfecte locatie om de stad te bezoeken. De kinderen sliepen bij ons op de kamer en er was geen lawaai van buiten of op de gang. Elke dag schone handdoeken. Prima service en bij vragen werd je vriendelijk geholpen. Koffie/thee/fruitwater de hele dag gratis toegankelijk.

title: Great location, quiet, clean, helpful staff
text:
My family (wife, two kids, age 12 and 14) stayed for a couple of nights over the Easter/Passover weekend.

We walked with our bags from Grand Central - less than 10 minutes walk. That section of 46th St was very quiet. The room (two double beds) was on the small side but was fine for us for the two nights.

The breakfast was decent with waffles, breads/pastries, cereal, yogurt, eggs/meat, and some fresh fruit. Of course with juice and coffee available. More than sufficient to get you going in the morning.

The fitness centre had treadmills and ellipticals and a standalone weight machine and free weights. Basic stuff but usable.

They also provided storage for our bags after our check-out at no cost.

Would definitely return.

title: Above & Beyond
text:
Recently in New York for a Bachelorette weekend and we had three rooms at the Hampton Inn Manhattan Grand Central. I could not be more pleased with the service we received - especially from Miss Stephanie! As I was the first person from our group to arrive at 7 am after a long flight from Honolulu, I was so grateful that not only one of our rooms was ready for me to check in and have a shower and a nap - but Stephanie had all three of our rooms ready to go! The staff were all so friendly and helpful. Also, going above and beyond to put posters on the outside of our doors to inform the other guests on our floor that there was a Bachelorette Party in progress.
Another added special touch were the red velvet cupcakes we found in one of our rooms....we thoroughly enjoyed them! Would definitely recommend this as your hotel of choice when visiting Manhattan!

title: Wonderful stay
text: Just writing to say what a great place this was to stay during a recent trip to New York.  Excellent location, close to Grand Central and very convenient for meetings in midtown.  What really made the stay so special was the welcoming, helpful staff at the hotel (warmest thanks to Stephanie, Erika and Dashanda in particular for making me feel at home and being willing to help with any questions I had, and for going above and beyond when I encountered some problems with flights).  Fresh, hot cookies in the lobby, cold water, coffee and tea at all times, and a great complimentary breakfast were greatly appreciated. Rooms aren't huge but are modern, clean and very well equipped. Nice fitness center in the basement too. Highly recommend this property!

title: NY trip with my daughter
text:
Nice room, good breakfast, good gym, and ABSOLUTELY GREAT AND FREANDLY PEOPLE WORKING HERE!
Tee/Coffee in the hotel lobby all day long.
And tasty cookies!
Absolutly in the middle of the city.

*****
Schönes Zimmer, gutes Frühstück, gutes Fitnessstudio aber vor allem SEHR NETTE UND FREUNDLICHE MITARBEITER. 

Sehr empfehlenswert!

title: They make you feel at home
text: I am in New York City at least once a month for business and for the past year this is been my hotel of choice.   While it is conveniently located and the rooms are clean and sized just fine for New York City it’s really the staff to bring you back time and time again.
