They are friendly and funny and remember you – I’ll keep coming back every time if I can

title: Cool hotel, great location
text: The hotel was cool, great location, helpful staff. Walking distance from Empire State building, Madison Square Garden and Avenue. Breakfast was also good enough! Water and cookies always available at the lobby.

title: hôtel a recommander
text:
emplacement parfait dans Time Square.Personnel très agréable et réactif.
Chambre propre avec lit king size.Petit déjeuner très copieux et varié.Boisson(café thé chocolat eau )proposé toute la journée à la réception + cookies tout chaud vers16 17H
Station métro à proximité.
Seul petit bémol,difficile de se connecter au wifi dans l'hôtel 
Je recommande cet hôtel et nous y reviendrons sans hésiter

title: Très bon emplacement
text:
Hôtel très bien placé. Literie top. Personnel très sympathique. Agréable d avoir une fontaine à eau et des cookie à la réception 
. Les bémols : trop chaud dans les chambres. Salle de petit-déjeuner trop petite,  pas assez de places assises  choix limité  2 ascenseurs trop limité pour le nombre de chambres. Pensez au recyclage !

title: friendly hotel with excellent location
text: I was in town for a conference and arranged a few rooms.  The staff - especially Erika - were very helpful and super friendly.  Rooms are great.  Price is right.  Location is near Grand Central and Public Library, Bryant Park and UN.  Loved it - thanks!

title: Great location
text: We had a great stay here. Staff was all friendly and very helpful. Breakfast was nice. Options for everyone and could always find a seat. Hotel was clean.  Room was pretty small for 2 adults and 2 kids but it worked. Great location. Walking distance to lots of sights.

title: Customer service is Wow factor
text:
My friends and I stayed here for a bachelorette. Previous to arrival one of the girls arriving from Australia flew in at 7am so I called ahead to see once she arrived if there was a room ready for her... they made sure her room was ready so she could rest before the rest of us arrived! 

As there was 9 of us and they knew we were here for a bach, (Stephanie and Deshanda) went out of their way to make sure we felt welcomed and had a great time.

They printed off signs for all our rooms that said bachelorette party in progress with little diamond rings, they even went out of their way to get us 9 amazingly delicious red velvet cupcakes and 2 bottles of non alcoholic sparking wine! 

Stephanie even came up to my room to help me decorate for our big night out Saturday as the rest of the girls were on a tour but returning shortly. 

The service was A1. All the personal touches really made us feel welcomed and special! 

Would recommend this hotel and amazing job to management on the staff you hire!!!

title: Great location good value for money
text: We stayed 2 nights with our teen boys whilst visiting New York. Great friendly staff. They had our room ready for an early 10.30 check in. Also held our bags til 5pm on day of check out. Easy walk from Grand Central and just 20 mins to theatres. Clean, comfy twin queen bed rooms. Boys liked making own waffles for breakfast. We recommend.

title: Good place
text: Away from the carnage of Times Square but a couple of blocks from Grand Central - this is a nice little no-frills hotel with easy access to everywhere. The room was a little tired, but perfectly comfortable with all the amenities you need. Breakfast buffet was functional - but there’s a couple of nice diners nearby if you want something else. Staff are excellent. Also worth adding they just finished a new UN-related mural outside - which I really liked. One thing I would suggest is you might want earplugs - the rooms are double-glazed, but you are in the city that never sleeps.

title: Friendliest Staff in New York City
text: I have traveled to New York City yearly for the last 20 years and I have never been more pleased with the value and service of my accommodations. Warm cookies waiting, ice water with lemon, clean room, decent size, good water pressure, good pillows, quiet, well stocked breakfast room but, most importantly the friendliest staff! With a special shout out to Erika at the front desk and the woman running the breakfast room. The location was perfect for transportation and .99 cent pizza! I will definitely stay here again.

title: Great Service and Staff
text:
We stayed here for on of the special UN days in March. It was an easy walk to the UN and to the Grand Central Metro. It is uphill from the station though (just a note for those carrying luggage) and slightly away from the more popular sections of the street.

The staff is great here. We had an issue at departure where we asked them to hold our bags in the back and kept having to come back to check them. They were very helpful and allowed us to do what we needed. The breakfast is varied and is a great spread. Many of the other hotels in the area charged extra for breakfast so this did add to the value.

title: Très bon hôtel
text:
Hôtel très bien situé et au calme, même avec vue sur ville. Très bonne literie avec lit king size. Grande douche et très propre. Pas de queue aux ascenseurs alors que nous étions au 20ème étage. Petit déjeuner correct. 
Proximité de grand central, idéal pr le métro. Petit bémol, personne ne parle français. 
Je recommande cet hôtel.

title: Attending CTAUN conference at UN
text:
Stephanie at the front desk was warm , welcoming and was generous with the chocolate chip cookies . 

Nancy and Michelle were so attentive too and I am now a cucumber water fan. 

The room was clean , comfortable and the staff was awesome . This is my second stay here and I will be back again next year !!!

title: EXCELLENT ACCOMMODATION
text: It's unlikely you can find a hotel in Midtown, Manhattan,  for less than $250/night and this Hampton Inn is no exception. However, it's very good value for money. The staff is unfailingly friendly and welcoming. Erika, especially is terrific! The breakfast buffet  is a bonus. It's not skimpy and it's vegetarian friendly. Rooms are comfortable and immaculate. Views are not sensational but you get plenty of light. And the location can't be beat for getting to museums and other attractions.

title: Excellent service hotel
text: We stayed at this Hampton Inn while on a business trip. The hotel itself is not super flashy, but the rooms are clean and comfortable. The best part of this hotel is the staff! The front desk staff are so kind. They go out of their way to make sure you have everything you need. The breakfast staff are also kind and make sure all the food is hot and plentiful. I totally recommend staying here if you're low key, want a clean place to sleep, and like friendly people.

title: SO IMPRESSED!
text: So impressed with this hotel! Affordable, friendly staff, comfy beds, yummy breakfast and great location! I definitely will come back to this hotel and highly recommend it! We traveled with a toddler and baby and it was so nice to stay there!

title: Great Budget Hotel
text: Staying at the Hampton was a great find for my quick trip up to NYC with friends (thanks Trip Advisor!) this weekend. Away from the heavy tourist areas, it's easy to get anywhere you'd like with lots of great restaurants nearby. One of the more spacious rooms I've stayed in in the city, far better than the Holiday Inn Express that's close to Times Square. Service was very friendly and welcoming, always greeted at the door when we came in and when we left. Free, hot breakfast with lots of options, rooms were clean, could have had more than one roll of toilet paper in the bathroom but other than that, great stay and would definitely choose it again!

title: Excelent service and location!
text: Great location, clean and excellent service!! Staff is friendly, bilingual and always willing to help. Walking distance to and from UN, Grand Central Terminal and Times Square. Breakfast is very good.

title: Excelente
text: Mi prima y yo nos hospedamos en este hotel y fue una experiencia altamente positiva. Esta muy bien ubicado: se puede llegar caminando a Times Square y la Estación Central. El precio es muy bueno. Es un ambiente tranquilo y todo esta prolijo y pulcro. Nuestra habitación tenía una estupenda vista a la ciudad especialmente de noche. La habitación y el baño eran muy cómodos. Muy buen desayuno, completo,  con distintas opciones y para distintos gustos. Durante el horario que se sirve el desayuno el personal esta constantemente atentos a que no falte nada y reponen lo que se va consumiendo.Como salimos muy temprano en un tour a Boston nos dieron un "desayuno para llevar" muy bueno. Las bebidas y "cookies" en el lobby muy bienvenidas. Pero lo mas destacado es la atención de todo el personal, en el área de desayuno, personal de mantenimiento y muy, muy especialmente en la recepción. Las muchachas estuvieron siempre dispuestas a ayudar, a tratar de salvar la barrera de la lengua, contestando preguntas, y sobre todo, en nuestro caso, solucionando nuestros problemas con el celular y wifi. Recomiendo este hotel sin dudarlo.

title: Clean and Quiet but close to Grand Central Station
text: Our stay here was fine. Our room was small but had the necessary furnishings. The staff was friendly and courteous. The breakfast was pretty typical of this brand. Traffic on this street is low so you need to go to the end of the block to easily get a taxi. There is a parking garage and car rental in the next building.

title: Great hotel!
text: This hotel is just a couple of blocks from Grand Central Terminal, making it very easy to sightsee in NYC.  Staff was very nice and responded quickly to any concerns.  Had great suggestions on where to eat and things to do in the city.  Breakfast was included and well-stocked, did sometimes get crowded at certain times but could usually find somewhere to sit.  Would definitely stay again if we are in NYC.

title: Breakfast I included in price
text: The room was fine good size. The location was a little further from Time Square than we thought so alot of walking was done, and finally breakfast was included in the price, although minimal  choice  and paper plates and cutlery, it got you  started in the mornings, also tea/coffee was on tap all the time

title: Great value. Great location.
text: Located 2 blocks from Grand Central, this is a great choice, especially when you seeking to stay within a reasonable budget but not sacrifice service, quality and extras. Warm and professional front desk staff. Breakfast included.

title: Cozy and cheap
text: The Hotel is in a good location of Manhattan. Brekfast was poor with only plastic dishes. Coffee almost undrincable. Quite overcrowded. Have to wait around 5 min each time for the elevator from the 21 floor.

title: Great hotel in great location
text: This is a very nice, clean hotel in a great location.  Walking distance to Grand Central Station and the United Nations.  Lower cost than other hotels in the area.  Very clean, helpful staff. Quiet rooms and larger rooms than most other hotels I've stayed in. Highly recommend.

title: Rooms are small, hotel is crowded and elevators are slow
text: A very cramped room complete with miniature ironing board to fit in the small wardrobe. Breakfast area is small and crowded, staff have trouble keeping items stocked. Elevators (2) take forever to arrive and you stop at every floor. Noisy rooms due to traffic and street noise. AC/heat is difficult to regulate.

title: Birthday Weekend in NYC
text:
The overall stay was mostly nice and the complimentary breakfast was quite good, But I had to switch rooms on my check-in day due to a smoky smell. I was offered a complimentary upgrade to a room on a higher floor with a balcony, which was a definite improvement.  The bathroom in this room also had a nicer design, including a shower with sliding glass doors instead of just a curtain like in my previous room.

There was also an issue with checkout on my last day.  I had requested a late checkout and was told I could leave at 1:30 instead of 12, but a confused member of the housekeeping staff came knocking on my door at 12:10 wondering why I was still there. Soon after, the front desk called and explained that they needed the room sooner, and asked if I’d be OK with a 1pm checkout instead, so I reluctantly agreed.  When I complained about this to a manager, she apologized and offered 5000 extra Hilton Honors points, so I was happy with the way it was resolved.

title: Amazing
text: I absolutely loved the people working there, especially Stephanie. She was very nice and very understanding and quickly became one of my friends during my quick trip. My room could've been better and there was a pipe burst which caused the elevators to stop

title: NYC
text: There was errant information pertaining parking fees applicable to this hotel. The web Site stated fees of $44.00 for 'off site' parking. Upon arrival, we were charged $72.00. Other than that, overall the stay was pleasant and in close proximity to the affair we had to attend.

title: Zentral gelegen, normaler Standard
text:
Das Hotel an sich war sauber und aufgeräumt. Wie üblich etwas eng, aber es gibt keinen Platz zu verschenken.
Die Zimmer waren sauber, ebenso das Bad und die Angestellen zuvorkommend.
Zentral gelegen, Nähe der Grand Central Station, Crysler Buidling etc.

title: No Elevators and more
text: Hotel gets worse every year. No elevators for 3 days due to water leak on 18 Thursday floor. Late check in as usual , staff not very helpful. Room never made up on our second day at 4:00 pm, we were always given excuses for problems, phone not working in room so staff had to be called, We stay here for convenience but never again unless our Hilton compensation comes through. HA HA !

title: Fabulous stay - highly recommend
text:
This is a superb mid-range, midtown hotel brilliantly located just two blocks from Grand Central. Most tourist attractions are within walking distance. 
Breakfast served every day from 6am until 10am and it’s good with lots of choice. 
Coffee, tea and hot chocolate available 24 hours. Freshly baked cookies also available from reception afternoon and evening. 
Rooms are big by NY standards and very clean. Comfortable bed, quality bed linen. We were on the 18th floor with views of the Chrysler Building.
Staff are friendly, approachable and very helpful. 
We stayed here for a week and it was “home” for that time. It’s not “designer” or “boutique” but is an unpretentious, welcoming sanctuary in the midst of this metropolis. We looked forward to returning here every evening after long days of sightseeing.
We can thoroughly recommend this hotel and would definitely go back.

title: Great stay
text: we arrived at the hotel after a long journey only to be told that there was no reservation in our name and the hotel was full.As you can imagine we were panicking were we were going to stay but Ashleigh told us to go and have a coffee and they would try and sort it.After about 30min she and another member of staff had sorted the problem which was caused by a 3rd party nothing to do with the hotel cancelling our booking to gain the Hilton Honors points but everything was sorted.The room was very good and very warm excellent this time of year,the breakfast was a bit limited compared to other Hampton inns I have stayed in but I still found things I liked,The staff serving breakfast were excellent most helpful.The hotel is in a good location close to grand central so handy for subway to get about.This stay was very enjoyable and next time I am in  nyc I will be back again.

title: Perfect in Everyway
text:
Room:
The room was perfect for what we wanted.
A nice big powerful shower.
The bed was really comfy
Plenty of space to put your clothes.
Tv worked and had most of the channels

Breakfast:
Very tasty, you can make your own waffles and it has enough things to put on to it.
Always had something eggy and sausage.
3 choices of cereal
Milk, Fruit Juice, Hot drinks.
Fruit & Yogurt 
Pretty much everything you could ask for.

Staff:
My experience with the staff started weeks before i flew to New York where i asked several questions and asked for advise.
I got a response to every email i sent and i want to say a special thanks to Ashley who sorted out so much for me before i had even got there.
Ashley you are amazing and went above and beyond your job role.
The other members of staff on the front desk were all very friendly and helped anyone who asked.

Hotel:
The hotel in my eyes is perfectly situated is very close to grand central, and only 30 mins walk from most attraction.

I can't recommend this hotel enough.

title: Mejor, imposible.
text:
Ha sido una experiencia única, nuestra primera vez en new york y la estancia insuperable, ya que por parte de todo el equipo están muy atentos para que no te falte de nada, todos los días reposición de utensilios de baño y cambio de toallas, la cama muy confortable,  el desayuno tipo buffet de 10. Y el personal fantástico por parte de todo el equipo.
Muchas gracias, la estancia ha sido otro punto positivo para querer volver a esta ciudad tan fantástica y evidentemente,  volveremos a este alojamiento.

title: Hotel de batalla para pasar estancias cortas
text: Hotel de calidad media-baja. Único punto a destacar es su buena ubicación, cercano a Grand Central, lo cual facilita mucho la visita a la ciudad. Habitaciones sencillas. El hotel necesita un lavado de cara general, tanto en el lobby como en los vestíbulos y habitaciones. Moqueta desgastada. Cama razonablemente cómoda y desayuno pasable.

title: Great staff, typical NYC hotel
text: I've stayed at this hotel several times over the last several years and the staff at the hotel is always very friendly and makes an effort to acknowledge you whether you're coming or going.  Rooms are typical Manhatten small, but not the point you need to step out of the way to open a door.  They offer Hilton members digital keys (open door with phone), free Wifi, breakfast buffet, coffee, and in the evening they usually have cookies and tea in the lobby.  Good central location in the city and about a 15-20 minute walk to the center of time square or broadway (you can walk it as fast as a car can get you through NYC traffic).  Lots of great resturant choices within a few blocks as well.

title: UN HOTEL EN NY QUE PARECE FAMILIAR
text:
Cada persona que trabaja en el Hampton, lo trata a uno como si fuera un viejo conocido y siempre están atentos a las necesidades del huésped.
Son muy atentos y se ocupan sinceramente de hacer que tu estadía sea placentera.

title: Great location and price
text: Great location, very close to Grand Central.  Nice to have a complimentary breakfast.  Staff is always very friendly and helpful.  Rooms were always clean when we came back to them.  Will definitely stay again!

title: Tres tres bien!
text:
Très bien situé a 400 m de Grand Central.
Pas loin de Time Square ...
Petit déjeuner très copieux (sucré/salé - gaufres, Yaourt, cereales, fruits, pommes de terre, omelette, viande.....)
Chambre propre. Nous avions 2 grands lits  dans la même chambre, c est pas très grand ... Mais on y était que pour dormir...)
Très calme 
Vue sur le Chrysler Building en sortant de l hotel 😊

title: Service at its best...
text:
During our stay last week, Michelle Martinez, the breakfast attendant, made our experience wonderful.  At breakfast, she observed that we were seeking a non-pork, protein option.  She quickly volunteered to make turkey sausages for us.  Each day, she looked for ways to make our breakfast a little more enjoyable.  Thank you, Hampton Inn, for training your staff to observe the needs of your guests and be empowered to go above and beyond the expected!

Finally, windows open for ventilation, which is wonderful when ceiling fans are not available and you want to be comfortable for sleeping!  Enjoy the fresh air!

We'll be back!

title: Great Stay!
text:
This hotel was great! It was inexpensive, very clean quiet (which is rare in NYC) and a two minute walk to Grand Central so super convenient. 

Room was a bit small compared to others in this Chain, however small rooms are to be expected in NYC. 

Complimentary breakfast was great (get there early for the full selection) and the staff was very helpful. Would definitely stay here again!

title: Enjoyed staying here a lot!
text: Loved breakfast with a lot of choices, free water & clean rooms. Near green, purple and silver metro lines. Can hold your bags in case you check out early! Great hospitality from staff. Recommend it a lot!

title: Perfect location for MSG on a budget
text: Boutique style rooms, not much storage or floor space, but clean and comfortable.  Bathrooms are roomy.  Staff are super friendly and excellent!  Location is perfect for MSG and Penn station access.  Free breakfast was tasty, food stations were clean even when the breakfast room was super busy and packed.

title: Bem localizado e bom custo benefício
text: Não tive o que reclamar do hotel. Quarto pequeno, mas confortável, café da manhã bom para hotel americano, bem localizado. O hotel oferece água gratuitamente basta pedir na recepcão. Gostei muito, voltaria a me hospedar nele e indico.

title: Ottimo hotel in ottima posizione
text: Hotel ottimo, con posizione perfetta, a pochi passi da Times Square e da Rockefeller center. Colazione ottima e abbondante e staff molto preparato gentile e disponibile. La fermata della metro è alla gran Central Station che dista circa 150mt. consigliato

title: The BEST Staff!!
text: We spent my birthday weekend in New York to go see the Lion King and stayed at the Hampton Inn. This was a great location with comfortable accommodations. We met Dashanda at the front desk and absolutely loved her! She was all smiles, pleasant, and very helpful (directions, food recommendations, adding a mini fridge to our room, etc.) during our stay! We went out prior to the show and came back to a festive door to our room and birthday treats!! When we checked out I was happy to see that she was there so I could hug her and thank her for all that she had done!

title: Amazing getaway
text: This hotel was great from the moment I stepped foot into my room. For being a Hampton Inn I was blown away with the great customer service I experienced. I will definitely stay here again when I come back into Manhattan. Thank you for a great stay!

title: Great staff, convenient location
text: We had an excellent experience at the Hampton Inn on East 43 near Grand Central station. The staff was amazing! Everyone with whom we interacted was helpful and friendly. The hotel was safe, clean, and convenient and we highly recommend this hotel on your next trip to Midtown NY.

title: Booking cancelation
text: Overall a good hotel to stay. Good location, friendly staff, clean and confortable. Breakfast was good but didn’t change a lot. The main reason why i’m giving it this rating it’s because of the hotel policy regarding credit card confirmations. I booked this hotel in May through Booking and it was free cancellation until 6th of December. The reservation mentioned that the hotel could verify the credit card just to make sure it was valid. I used a card that was valid until august and i didn’t know that i needed to update in the reservation. Imagine my surprise when i got to the hotel,  after a 9h flight from portugal and i was told that my reservation was cancelled and i didn’t have a room booked. When i asked why they told me that i didn’t updated the info of the card. I said that i wasn’t notificed that i needed to do that and asked when do they check that. The receptionist told me 3 to 5 days before. Immediatly i checked my email and there it was the email asking for a new credit card 3hours before my arrival and informing me that i had 2 hours to update otherwise my reservation would be cancelled. 2 hours after the email with the cancellation confirmation. I was on a flight with no internet connection so i was unable to update the info. After spending some time talking to Booking and the hotel they managed to put us in a smaller room with a king size bed for 3 people instead of the 2 queen size we booked but for the same price. Also because of this we lost the 10% refund from booking regarding a promo code we had. It was a very stressfull situation and a very unpleasant begining of holidays. The hotel should review the timings given to confirm the cards so this doesn’t happen again.

title: Visita en Familia
text:
Pienso que este hotel no merece estar tan bien calificado. Me base en esta calificación para escogerlo, la de 4.5 estrellas que tiene en TRIP ADVISOR, cuando en realidad es uno de 3 estrellas en el mundo hotelero. El servicio es bueno, eso no lo puedo negar, pero en general el hotel se siente barato y no de la mejor calidad. El desayuno es regular, tiene pocas opciones, (lo que se ve en la foto, cereales, lecha, jugo, waflera, y uno que otro pan). Espera un mejor desayuno, cuando la verdad estaba pagando uno de hotel de 3 estrellas. 
Las habitaciones son pequeñas, muy pequeñas. Viajabamos 4, teníamos una habitación con 2 camas dobles. Las camas estaban muy buenas, pero el espacio para caminar, para poner las maletas, y para sentarse era muy reducido (Tanto que no abría la puerta del baño.) Los pasillos en los pisos son pequeños también.
La ubicación es buena, queda a 5 minutos de grand central, y a 15 de Times Square. Es muy agradable caminar a Times Square caminando.
Quiero decir que mi experiencia fue satisfactoria, ya que es servicio fue muy bueno, pero la verdad no era lo que esperaba. Quede satisfecho por que no tuve inconvenientes, aún así, no volvería. Una calificación de 4.5 en TripAdvisor pone las expectativas un poco mas altas, y el hotel no las cumplió. 
Escribo esto para que personas como yo, que buscan siempre en Trip Advisor antes de comprar Hotel, no se equivoquen con las expectativas, y mas bien vayan esperando un hotel de 3 estrellas. 
El precio fue bastante alto, descarte opciones mas baratas por la calificación, pero en realidad creo que muchas habrían sido mejores que ese Hotel. Me arrepiento bastante de haberlo escogido. 
Gracias, y espero que les sirva de ayuda. Si tienen alguna pregunta no duden en escribirme.

title: Un hotel muy cálido y con un muy buena ubicación estratégica.
text: Quedamos muy satisfechos con nuestra estadía en el Hotel Hampton, hay muy buena predisposición de todo el personal para asistirte.  Me encanto que todos los espacios comunes estén muy cuidados, el sector del café y el gimnasio lo disfrute muchísimo! Mi agradecimiento a Ximena por estar pendiente siempre de cada detalle en el horario del desayuno, también un reconocimiento a Saule que a pesar de no hablar Español nos terminaba entendiendo y ayudando. Sin ninguna duda volvería al Hampton Inn.

title: Excelente hotel. Volveria sin dudarlo!!!
text: Excelente hotel. Todo su personal siempre bien predispuesto. Las chicas de recepcion, las chicas del desayuno y las chicas de limpieza muy amables y cordiales! Se valora que en el hotel haya empleados que hablen español. Muy buena ubicacion! Habitaciones confortables y limpias! Muy buen desayuno! Hotel 100% recomendble. Volveria sin dudarlo siempre!!! Gracias!!!

title: Ottima scelta
text: Hotel in piena midtown, molto vicino a Grand Central Station e con una passeggiata di 10/15 minuti o poco più, è possibile raggiungere tutti i posti nevralgici di centro città; camere comode, colazione gratuita abbondante (non così scontata negli hotel di New York), acqua, caffè e the disponibile 24h, personale molto cordiale con un ringraziamento speciale a Saule, della reception, per i preziosi consigli e per la simpatia; ottimo rapporto qualità/prezzo. Per quanto riguarda la nostra esperienza, non possiamo fare altro che consigliarlo.

title: Tranqüilidade, clareza no atendimento , a localização é excelente. Os itens no hotel são bastante praticos.
text: Não tive nenhuma dificuldade durante a minha estadia. O pessoal da recepção são muito prestativos e ajudam bastante, bem como os demais funcionários. Foram dias maravilhosos, pretendo retornar ao mesmo hotel.

title: Great Stay In NYC
text:
Fab location - great view of The Chrysler Building as soon as you leave the hotel, and a short walk to Grand Central Station.
Breakfast was delicious and the free coffee and delicious cookies are a welcome treat when you return to the hotel after a long day exploring this amazing city.
The rooms were basic but clean and comfortable.
What really makes the hotel so special, however, is the dedication, helpfulness and friendliness of ALL of the staff - from the cleaners, to the catering staff, and of course the reception staff. They were all amazing and made you feel so welcome.
It was our youngest sons birthday whilst staying at the hotel, and two of the staff brought him some sweets, balloons and a cup-cake to the room to enjoy. Such a nice touch!
We all definitely want to stay at this hotel again when we return to New York,

title: Excellent Stay in New York
text: Very Good location, near from Grand Central Station. Hotel Clean, very Good facilities, breakfast amazing and Fresh, comfort room, bathroom small bit  well Clean. Staff very friendly and helpfull, special mentions for Stephanie and Erika, recepcionist, so Glad to meet them, very helpfull. One of the best Hampton Inns. I Will be  back.

title: Excellent stay
text: First time staying at a Hampton in several years and the hotel exceeded my expectations. The hotel staff that we interacted with were very welcoming and friendly. The room we were given was spacious and clean with a view of the city. We are light sleepers and heard little to no street noise. For the price point, it was an excellent value.

title: Good location, very friendly and helpful staff, close to a lot
text: The hotel was easy to find walking from Grand Central. Once I got there, the staff was very friendly and accommodating. The room was clean and comfortable. The "city view" that I upgraded for was meh, so I would skip paying for the upgrade. The fitness room had some weights, several cardio machines, and a multi-exercise strength machine. It was small, but I was able to get a good workout.

title: Great hotel!!!
text: Simply saying this is great hotel located near center of Manhattan. Location is perfect to be in most interesting places of Manhatann by foot in 10-15 minutes. Just few crossings from Grand Central Station and 10 minutes walk to Times Square. Hotel facilities great, breakfast included, free coffeee 24hrs/day. The receptionists are helpfull and charming.

title: Great Hotel & Great Location
text: We love this hotel!  Service is amazing and the location is perfect.  It's just a few  blocks from Grand Central Station if you need public transportation, but this hotel is perfect for walking.  Times Square is less than a mile, Bryant Park is close, along with so much more.  The room is well appointed with two full beds, desk, dresser, and clothes closet.  The bathroom is small but adequate.  Rooms are kept very well cleaned and serviced.  Breakfast is amazing at this hotel, lots of choices and food is very fresh and kept well stocked.  Cookies are available at the front desk in the afternoon, and its so nice to return to your hotel and be told "Welcome Back".  The staff is amazing.  This was my second stay at this hotel, and I will be back.

title: Great hotel
text: My wife and me decided to celebrate our 20th wedding anniversary and my birthday at NYC. During check in, the receptionist asked about the reason for the stay and we told her. At the third day of the stay they surprised us. They decorated our room’s door with paper tags celebrating our anniversary, they also gifted us a “snacks and fruits” plate tray and a postcard with messages and  signed by all the staff. It was a lovely surprise and a great experience for us!!!

title: Génial
text:
Super hôtel très proche de Grand central ce qui permet d'accéder à tout Manhattan rapidement en métro express.

Chambre de taille correct pour New York.

Très bon petit déjeuner continental.

La salle du petit déjeuner est accessible en journée pour y manger ce que l'on apporte ou simplement se poser, jouer aux cartes..

Le personnel est très accueillant.

Des cookies maison sont à diposition à l'acceuil l'après midi. Egalement des bouteilles d'eau toute la journée il suffit de demander.

Wifi gratuit disponible à la réception et dans les chambres.

Un raport qualité prix au top pour New York.

title: Todo muy bien
text: Cuenta con muy buena ubicación el personal es muy amable, tiene desayuno incluido los cuartos están bien y la relación calidad precio me pareció justaLo recomiendo y si regresaría nuevamente. Muy buena opción en Nueva York

title: Geat Location with a Super Friendly Staff
text:
Stayed for 3 days this past weekend to attend a show being held at the Grand Hyatt hotel.  The property is a short 2 block walk from Grand Central Terminal and just a short subway ride from Penn Station.  Upon check-in we were greeted at the front desk by friendly staff, as we were each and every day and evening.  But in my book the stars were the brave men and women who staff the free breakfast room.  Friday and Sunday morning were busy, but nothing like the crowd on Saturday.  Nonetheless, Michell and the rest of the staff managed to not only keep up but sometimes stay ahead of everyone's requests.  And the hot coffee kept on coming!

The rooms are not the teeny-tiny size you find in many Manhattan properties and the pocket door for the bathroom is a big plus. Would definitely stay here again and would not hesitate to recommend this property to others.

title: Location
text: Excellent location 2 blocks from Grand Central Station, rooms are on the smaller side but still comfortable. Staff was outstanding at all times. Breakfast was varied, would suggest using real eggs, I believe these were powdered and fresh fruit bananas a little too ripe.

title: Excellent location
text: The hotel has a great location, walking distance to the UN headquarters, 5th Avenue, Chrysler building, Grand Central and many other landmarks. The room are well furnished, of a good size (for New York) and spotless clean. Decent breakfast. Overall an enjoyable stay.

title: Una joya en el centro de NY
text: Excelente hotel. Muy buena atención desde la recepción. Amplia habitación,  muy buena la limpieza.  Variado desayuno y un servicio de café y galletas disponible todo el día.  A metros de la Estación Central y de una gran variedad de comercios.

title: Hampton Inn - New York
text: Amazing hotel, staff are very friendly and welcoming. Amazing location. Bed was very comfortable. We didn’t have one problem thekughout our whole stay. Breakfast was always very nice, a lot of choice. Bed was so comfortable, the cleanliness was very good. We never had any issues and would definitely recommend.

title: Hidden Gem in NYC
text:
Came into NYC to see the play "Beautiful". We usually say on the West Side to be near the theaters. I took a chance and stayed at this hotel on the East Side and I was so glad I did.  We arrived at the hotel at 11:45AM and I thought no way they will let us check in yet. The front desk had the nicest people I have experienced in any hotel. They found a room right away and it was a great one. Room 1806 was close to the elevator but in a nice quiet corner. The king bed was super comfortable. We walked to the theater on West 43 St and it was a 10-15 minute walk. Nice and easy. Being on the East Side turned out to be very relaxing. No crowds and great restaurants that didn't have long wait times. 
The morning complimentary breakfast was really good. When we checked out, Erika at the front desk was like a new friend. The whole experience was great and I now have a new favorite NYC hotel. I will recommend this hotel to everyone I know.

title: Excellent customer service
text: We recently stayed at this hotel during a difficult time for our family, our husband and father in the hospital. The associates at the front desk were so kind and helpful. We really needed the TLC and they delivered. Ashley, Erica and Louis to name a few. In addition, for a NY hotel, you cannot go wrong here. Exceptionally clean premises, very comfortable rooms, location and price-- all very good!!

title: Lovely Stay
text: Location near Grand Central Station is excellent.  The staff was friendly and efficient.  The room was comfortable and clean.  We were celebrating our 30th anniversary and they made it special.  After returning to the hotel following a day of Christmas sights and shopping, we found our door covered with anniversary wishes.  The staff signed a greeting card, delivered balloons, fruit and chocolate and just made us feel special.  We would recommend this hotel and definitely stay there again.

title: Ottima soluzione per visitare NYC
text:
Positivo. La posizione, vicino a Grand Central Station, la comodità dei letti, la colazione inclusa nel prezzo, l'ampiezza della stanza e del bagno. 
Negativo.  Abbiamo trovato una bottiglia di vino vuota sul davanzale della finestra al nostro arrivo. Il primo giorno non hanno rifatto la stanza accampando la scusa che erano molto occupati...
In generale siamo rimasti soddisfatti e probabilmente  in futuro torneremo ancora, nonostante i due problemi sperimentati.

title: New York getaway
text: The Hampton was located in an area that was easily accessible to several of the cites we visited. The staff was friendly.  Check in was not that great, breakfast was just ok.  Our overall experience is 7

title: The customer service at this hotel is some of the best I've experienced!
text: The employees are fantastic.  Always asking how they can help you, offering complimentary water whenever you want it.  The workout facility and business center are clean and new.  You can tell the employees take pride in working here, Erika especially. I would HIGHLY recommend!  Erika

title: New Years family vacation
text: Excellent service in part by Erika, Enrique, Ximena and Nancy as their were outstanding and very helpful in taking care of our necessities. We really enjoyed our stay being our first time in New York City it was warm and welcoming. We definetely recommend this hotel.

title: מלון מעולה למנהטן ניו יורק
text:
אני רוצה לציין שהמלון היה טוב מאוד , ממוקם במקום מרכזי קרוב לפארק בריינט. קרוב לתחנה גרנד סנטרל 
הצוות התייחס בצורה טובה וחמימה אלינו, ארוחות הבוקר היו טובות מאוד ומגוונות, וכן רציתי לציין את מישל הטבחית שכל בוקר דאגה לי באופן אישי לשוקו חם עם חלב חם ,וכל מה שביקשתי מממנה קיבלתי מיד. כל צוות המלון היה מקסים ונתן הרגשה טובה ואני ממליצה בחום על המקום -מלון +ארוחת בוקר מה שבדרך כלל לא נהוג במנהטן ועוד במחיר מצוין למנהטן.

title: Great location for Grand Central access
text: This hotel was super convenient to Grand Central access! The staff was very cheerful, friendly and helpful. The breakfast and 24/7 coffee service was a plus (and a great moneysaver) even though it could get frustratingly hectic in the 7:30am & 9am hours; but, if the layout of the food was tweaked a bit I believe most of that could be alleviated.The facilities appeared clean and well maintained. Overall great value for the money & location. Would stay again! Just one small observation, it would be helpful if there were signs or literature providing info as to location of amenities such as ice, vending, etc.

title: Hotel con buena ubicación calidad-precio
text: Al lado de Grand Central Station y el Chrysler. El trato del personal fue inmejorable. Si volvemos a Nueva York, sin duda iremos a este hotel. El trato de Erika es impresionante, siempre con una sonrisa y atenta a nuestras peticiones

title: Muy buena opcion en NYC!
text: Muy buena ubicacion, excelente atencion de todo el personal, habitaciones algo pequeñas pero muy comodas, desayuno abundante y bastante variado, muy buena idea el agua y las cookies de cortesia, muchas gracias! volveremos!

title: There are many fancy hotels in NYC, but if you want a friendly one, stay here.
text: You see it in all of the reviews: the staff at this hotel are amazing.  Even at check-in, they made me feel like a "regular" and were genuinely friendly in greeting me every time I walked through the lobby.  If you are concerned about the NYC attitude, you won't find it on at this friendly hotel on a quiet side street in the heart of it all.

title: Happy Happy Happy :)
text:
This hotel is extraordinary,  wonderful staff  with a smiling gesture and professionalism. We stayed here for 8 nights during a busy season time of Christmas & New year, do you know! the service was spotless.***** Any hotel who provides such a great service during the peak season time, it's the best hotel all the time. Thank you team Hampton inn Manhattan Grand central, you guys are amazing.

We felt so comfortable from the time of check inn, apology for missing the name of the sales coordinator who checked us in, on 25/12/18 night, she was very helpful & a wonderful person :) please do mention her name in your reply so I can remember her name always. 

She did fantastic job, Christmas cookies were fab, daily breakfast was outstanding, we enjoyed everyday in morning, missing it and my special thanks to Michelle Martinez(BF attendant), all other staff at BF service, thanks to the guy who took well care of gym, I worked out daily and gym was perfectly fine, thank you housekeeping staff,  kitchen staff, all were really amazing smiling and friendly.

 The room i booked was a bit small for us as we were 2 adult and a child with 6 big bags but we got adjusted well in 24hrs, anyhow who comes to NY to stay in room, wifi was inconsistent but I never reported as it's a very minor thing for me, i was using unlimited data sim card, free local calling and sms from Tmobile which cost me 55$ and its  validity 21days. Location convenient, restaurant and deli nearby, complimentary free hot beverages 24hrs at hotel BF area, our favourite was hot chocolate,  Thanks HIMGC for this exclusive service.

We felt like a second home, very very satisfied with hotel amenities, facility and service. 

Thank you Elizabeth Ardiles(GM) for all the assistance you provided us before our arrival, Thank You Guest service Manager Imelda Castilla for confirming my Amazon packages before we arrived to NY and keeping them safely, Thank you Ashley Chamorro, Stephanie Apunte,Tiffany Logan, Dashanda Cheatham,  for great guest service. Sorry if I missed any one's name here.

My future stay in NY will be certainly at HIMGC! :) Best wishes and Wishing you all a very happy & Successful year 2019

P.S : I am not a paid guest reviewer,  it's the fact what we felt during our stay, we shared.  It's my first time to write such a long review about any hotel in my 10years travel history.

title: Ein tolles Hotel mit allem was man braucht.
text: Das Hotel ist sehr zu empfehlen.Top Lage, gutes Frühstück, tolles Personal.Immer top gereinigt und aufgeräumte Zimmer.Erstaunlich ruhige Nächte und genug Platz, für uns 4.Ich würde sofort nachmals dieses Hotel wählen.

title: One of the best Hampton Inns!
text: First I want to give a shout out to Ashleigh, Luis, Stephanie, and Erika for 5 star customer service. When we arrived we were greeted warmly and our room was clean and neat. The breakfast was great, fresh and kept clean. When we went to sight see they watched / stored our bags and gave us umbrellas to use because it was raining! This is a five star rating and a must stop when staying in the City!

title: Consigliatissimo!
text: Posizione più che ottima, personale sempre disponibile e gentile. Colazione abbondante, con thè e caffè sempre disponibili durante la giornata. Consigliatissimo! Se dovessi tornare a NYC di sicuro sarà il mio hotel.

title: Highly recommended
text: This is a great choice for its location and cost. Just a short stroll to Grand Central Station. The street is so quiet but you have some great restaurants within walking distance. Cost is great and the rooms are good too. Quiet and clean. Breakfast options are good, however the dining area is tiny so it's almost a fight in the morning to find somewhere to sit. Worse is the rudeness of people who forget their manners and think complimentary breakfast means free breakfast and act like pigs pushing people out the way to get food. It was a disgrace. We chose to get a simple bowl of cereal and cup of coffee and take it to our room. This was no fault of the hotel. The front desk were lovely. A special shout out to the staff on Christmas Eve - I asked if they had cookies my daughter could leave for Santa which they didn't, they said they would make some and I said no it wasn't necessary but they insisted and 20 minutes later delivered them to my room. Very thoughtful. Was nice to be greeted in the mornings or after a long day with a smile or an offer of a bottle of water. I would highly recommend this hotel and if I'm lucky enough to return to NYC, this is where I will stay.

title: Fabulous stay
text: I am so thrilled we chose this hotel as home base for our first ever visit to NYC. From the moment we walked in, Erika greeted us warmly and was there at the front desk always ready to help us throughout our stay. The hotel was in an ideal location for our needs. We  walked to Grand Central, Times Square, Broadway, Hell's Kitchen and more. I was concerned about noise, but our room was quiet, in addition to being clean and spacious enough. On our first night, we did experience a little trouble with the plumbing in the shower. However, a maintenance staff member was at our room immediately (it was 10pm) and fixed it quickly. For that I was grateful! Breakfast exceeded other Hamptons and similar hotels in that the service was outstanding. Food was refilled consistently and the space kept clean. I would not hesitate to return to this hotel or recommend it to friends.

title: Very friendly staff
text: THe location, staff and the rooms are all great. Very easy to go around in NY if you are staying here. Staff makes you feel welcome. The breakfast is good to give youa  good start for the day. Very close to places to eat.

title: Great for Business Travel
text: Very clean and comfortable accommodations.  Hotel is located convenient to Grand Central for easy access to all of Manhattan. Extremely friendly hotel staff who work hard to make your stay right.  Great value!

title: Pessimo staff...
text: L’hotel nel suo complesso è in una buona posizione vicino alla stazione Grand Central, snodo di diverse linee della metropolitana. È pulito, le camere sono vivibili, e il bagno è nuovo. Lo staff è stato maleducato, inefficiente e arrogante. Il giorno della partenza i nostri bagagli sono stati depositati nella sala colazione chiusa poi a chiave. Al momento del check out non si trovavano più le chiavi per recuperarli. Alla reception le due ragazze non sapevano dare spiegazioni, ma solo di aspettare pochi minuti, facendoci perdere almeno 30 minuti, col rischio di arrivare in ritardo in aeroporto, cosa che abbiamo evitato grazie alla guida dell’autista del servizio navetta privato. Con noi altri ospiti sono stati trattati con arroganza e menefreghismo. Un comportamento irrispettoso e inaccettabile nei confronti del  cliente. Purtroppo questo ha modificato la nostra opinione riguardo la struttura nel complesso

title: Dashant-hotel customer care front desk
text: Very nice person.  I was able to change room without a problem.  She offered options of payment for room and parking.  The room is very clean. I wish they had a mini fridge the room I stayed but next time.

title: Un buon hotel a Manhattan
text:
Abbiamo soggiornato in questo hotel nella settimana di Natale. Complessivamente molto buono, sicuramente un ottimo rapporto qualità/prezzo/posizione per gli standard di Manhattan.
L'hotel è situato in una posizione tranquilla, a 5 minuti a piedi dalla Grand Central (stazione metro più vicina) e da lì si raggiungono tranquillamente tutti i punti principali della città.
La stanza era pulita e confortevole seppur piccola, al ventesimo piano, con vista sul magnifico Chrysler Building.
Staff cordiale sempre sorridente; come già sottolineato da altri ospiti ogni giorno vengono fornite bottigliette d'acqua gratuite, oltre a snack e bevande calde.
La colazione è sicuramente un vantaggio, in quanto ti permette di risparmiare tempo per visitare la città sin dal primo mattino, seppur basica e abbastanza ripetitiva. Ovviamente nel periodo in cui siamo stati noi (molto affollato), scendendo nell'orario centrale non c'erano posti a sedere a sufficienza per tutti gli ospiti, quindi un paio di volte abbiamo dovuto portare in camera la colazione da consumare.
Nonostante ciò la nostra esperienza è stata molto positiva e consigliamo vivamente questa struttura.

title: Parfait
text:
Pour quelqu'un qui recherche un hôtel bon rapport/qualité/prix à NY (évidemment il ne faut pas comparer aux prix des hôtels en France...), et bien je pense vraiment que cet hôtel est une perle à NY. Chambre très propre, de taille idéale pour 2, salle de bain nickelle avec grande douche/wc et très propre également. Literie excellente. Wifi gratuite (rare pour un hôtel à NY!) et petit déjeuner entièrement gratuit également (encore plus rare à NY!!) et de plus excellent et à volonté! (sucré, salé, typiquement Américain, il y en a pour tous les goûts. Personnellement, on s'est ré-ga-lé tous les matins!!)

Emplacement idéal : 5 min à pieds de Grand Central, 15/20 de times square, 20 min de l'Empire state building, 25/30 min de central park (et en passant par la 5ème avenue on visite en mm temps! Vous passerez devant le Rockfeller center et la cathédrale St Patrick). La NY public library et Bryan Park sont à 10 min. De plus, largement de quoi se restaurer aux alentours de l'hôtel. Le Chrysler building est à 2 min et se voit de l'hôtel.

Bruit : emplacement de l'hôtel très calme, rue très calme, le top pour NY.

Si j'ai la chance de revenir à NY avec mon fils, c'est sans hésitation que je retournerai dans cet hôtel.

title: Super!
text: Clean, comfortable and friendly (thanks, Stephanie!). If you're not looking for luxury, large rooms or a prime location like Central Park or mid-midtown (42nd to 59th betw 5th and 7th), the value of this hotel cannot be overstated. Will definitely come back. Lawrence

title: Comodo e ben fornito
text: Situato nel quartiere di Midtown, a pochissimi passi dalle attrazioni principali della metropoli. Colazione al mattino ampia e tipica americana, con la possibilità di accedervi anche durante tutto l’arco della giornata. Camere mediamente grandi, dotate però di tutti i comfort; l’unica pecca purtroppo, sono stati i letti, che personalmente abbiamo trovato corti per due persone medio-alte, ma ammetto che possa essere stato un errore di colui che aveva prenotato!

title: Christmas with the family in NY
text: We had 3 rooms and stayed dec 22-26. We loved every minute of it. Breakfast staff were great.HK was great and FD was great. Cant remember all the names only Erica and Luis. They all helped make our short fam reunion a special one! Thanks

title: Christmas in New York
text: Family trip to New York for Christmas. First time visit and we thoroughly enjoyed every minute.The hotel staff were very helpful and answered any questions we had with enthusiasm and knowledge.Definitely will stay here again.

title: Tutto bene
text: Ottima zona, vicino alla metro, hotel pulito e personale gentilissimo, internet funziona e la colazione non è male, letto molto comodo, unico difetto era nella stanza colazioni che faceva abbastanza freddo

title: New Yorker Standard
text: Das Hotel liegt recht gut in Midtown zwei Blocks von Grand Central (Metro) entfernt. Die Zimmer sind gut und sauber jedoch entsprechend Kategorie ohne Minibar. Am Tag ist die Lärmbelastung (20. Etage) durch die auf den Dächern anliegender Häuser angebrachter Kühlaggregate enorm. In der Nacht werden diese gedrosselt und man kann bei offenem Fenster schlafen (eine Einstellung der Temperatur im Winter ist nicht möglich, ist jedoch mit 20 Grad okay). Die Dusche mit nur fester Kopfbrause ist gewöhnungsbedürftig. Soweit alles okay. Es sind eher mehrere kleine Dinge, die den Eindruck trüben. So kommt zum Beispiel zum Preis eine Sicherheitsgebühr von 25$ pro Tag dazu, welche beispielsweise auf booking.com nicht ausgewiesen wird. Insgesamt haben wir so dann für 7 Tage Aufenthalt über 1700,- $ mit Kreditkarte bezahlt. Für ein 3 Sterne Hotel mit Papptellern und Plastebesteck sowie mäßigem Frühstück ( hakt amerikanisch) ist das selbst in New York nicht sehr preiswert.  Trotz mehrfacher Anfrage war das Hotel nicht in der Lage dem Wunsch einer vorherigen Bezahlung mit einem anderen Zahlungsmittel als Kreditkarte in der Lage (wir wollten das Limit der Kreditkarte schonen). Bei normalen Limits muss man also wenigstens zwei Kreditkarten für eine New York Reise haben. Beim Checkin traten dann Probleme mit der Kreditkarte auf, da sie noch nicht initialisiert war. Man konnte uns hier nicht helfen und wurde eher unfreundlich, als wir mit mäßigem Englisch versuchten uns ein Telefonat mit der Bank zu ermöglichen. So musste ein teurer Roaming Anruf getätigt werden, zum Glück war der Service unserer Namk Sonntags erreichbar. Das Hotel genemigte uns aber zunächst nur den ersten Tag, den wir bar zahlen konnten, obwohl das unsere ungefähr 20. Buchung über booking.com war. Doch solche "Sicherheiten" intetessiert das Hotel nicht. Ein Anruf bei booking.com wurde ebenfalls abgelehnt. Insgesamt waren wir also relativ zufrieden, da wir unsere Probleme selbst klären konnten. Hilfe sollte man nicht erwarten.

title: Great hotel, great location
text: I chose this hotel because it was in the same block as the office I was visiting. My colleague had been here before and mentioned it was a good hotel, so we opted to stay here again. The staff was really helpful and friendly, the room was spotless, and the complimentary breakfast was good. Additionally, the hotel is in a great location in Manhattan and it's very easy to get to places like Rockefeller Center. I will definitely be staying here again.

title: Hotel con buena ubicación y relación calidad precio
text:
El hotel está al lado de Grand Central Station y tiene una ubicación muy buena. Es limpio y el personal es muy amable. Limpian todos los días la habitación. 
Las habitaciones tienen moqueta, cosa que no me gustó nada y el desayuno se sirve en platos y vasos de plástico.
Lo recomendaría por relación calidad - precio si no se es demasiado exigente. A nosotros nos vino genial.

title: Estadía perfecta
text: Debo decir que la estadía fue perfecta. El desayuno es muy completo, incluye frutas, café, chocolate, jugos y los waffles son deliciosos. Erika y Stephanie, son simplemente las mejores, nos recibieron muy bien y siempre siempre estuvieron atentas a nuestras peticiones. En realidad es pero regresar de nuevo. Un gran hotel y un gran servicio. Y sobretodo muy bien ubicado. A solo cuadra y media del Grand Central.

title: Buenísima estadía
text: Nos recibieron excelente, desayunamos apenas llegamos y siempre fueron muy amables. La ubicación es perfecta. Hay té y café 24hrs, se agradece en invierno. Las habitaciones cómodas. Siempre el personal muy simpáticos y dispuestos a ayudar.

title: Great location, excellent staff
text: Would highly recommend this hotel due to its location near Grand Central and also for its conscientious staff. We arrived early and the staff made it possible for us to get into a room much earlier than planned. Nancy is also the nicest.

title: Excellent!!!
text: Our experience was wonderful. The staff were amazing, breakfast was great and our room was extremely clean and well kept. This hotel was in a great location to many activities. The amenities were spot on.

title: Hampton Grand Central
text: Loved the location. Easy walk to Rockefeller, Grand Central, Bryant Park, Times Square. Great hot breakfast everyday.  Staff was very friendly and accomodating right down to the gentleman who brought us out fresh baked cookies. This is our 2nd stay at this hotel and we have been very happy with both stays.

title: Great stay!
text: Staff very helpful and friendly. We were able to get an early check in. Complimentary breakfast was delicious with lots of options. Breakfast staff went above and beyond. Room was clean and comfy. We would definitely stay here again!

title: First time in new york
text: Where do i start, reception staff are first class, alway greeting you when entering or leaving the building,  very happy, Stephanie,  only one we got the name of was very attentive,  as was the lady who booked out cab the night before check out. Housekeeping staff are great, room was always spotless,  eith a friendly note from the maid norma,. Breakfast was included each morning so cannot fault it, self service,  unlimited coffee 24 hours a day if you need it. Definitely looking forward to coming back in 2020, summer hopefully:)

title: Bad Feeling from the Start
text: This hotel didn't even have my reservation when I got there, after I made it through Booking.com, who never fails me, but blamed Booking.com for the mishap.I called Booking.com and verified that the reservation was called in, and the hotel neglected to enter it. It gets worse from there. The quality of the breakfast left much to be desired, noisy as guests were slamming doors early in the morning, the room was dismal and needed to be spruced up, and the bed comforter looked like it had never been washed. But the icing on the cake was the front desk's refusal to call me a cab, and telling me,  politely of course,  that I was on my own. Really? Shouldn't that be the one service a guest can depend on? I won't be back.

title: Hotel en buena Ubicación
text: Este hotel fue nuestra tercera parada de las vacaciones. Las chicas que mantiene limpio el área del desayuno siempre fueron amables. Las habitaciones super pequeña por es normal en NY. Pero esta falta de remodelación. Estuvimos 5 noches en la tercera tuvimos la mala experiencia de que nos levantará porque en el piso había alguien fumando y fueron 2 veces  por las habitaciones lo cual fue bien desagradable. EL SUPERVISOR DE SEGURIDAD la segunda vez que fue se disculpó. Pero es la primera vez que me ocurre en un hotel.  Nuestro chekout fue lo único bueno que se puede recordar Stephanie fue una super amable con nosotros. Es muy céntrico es lo mejor que tiene.

title: Excellent location and service
text: Its the perfect place to stay either pleasure or bussines. The location is perfect... not that noisy but very well conected to subway, food and stores. The staff is so nice. The breakfast is included. You need to visit this hotel. The perfect balance for price and quality.

title: A Real Treasure
text: This hotel, tucked in between Grand Central Terminal and the United Nations, is my "home base" for my frequent trips to the city.  The rooms are small but nicely apportioned and always clean.. The free hot breakfast is typical of all Hampton Inns, but the service sets it apart... these ladies are top-notch.  And the front desk staff are unbelievably good... Erika, Soule and Dashanda (not an exhaustive list!) all greet you warmly by name and ensure your stay is perfect.  For me, the location near Grand Central is perfect; from there, one can take the subway or the Metro North to explore this great city.

title: Great location, great service!
text: The staff here is fantastic, very welcoming and helpful. Room was comfortable and the included breakfast (cheese omelets, sausage, potatoes, oatmeal,  bagels, muffins, etc.) was a plus. Hotel is about a 3 short block walk to Grand Central, which is a sight in itself to see (architecture,  food hall, shops, etc.) and where you can easily get subways or metro north. I would definitely stay again.

title: Lovely hotel
text: The Hampton inn was great from start to finish. The location is actually quite quiet which made getting a peaceful night's sleep possible in the city that never sleeps! The location being Midtown near Tudor City, the United Nations Headquarters and Grand Central Station is just excellent and provides a lovely wander getting to know the area. Hampton Inns breakfasts were absolutely amazing, no expense spared. Bonuses included the excellent shower, comfy bed and ice machine. Honestly a pleasure and thank you for a delightful stay!

title: Wonderful Place To Stay!
text: I can’t say enough good things about the location and staff at this hotel. Withiin blocks of Grand Central Station, this hotel made it very easy to navigate the city. From the moment we walked in the door, the staff was friendly, professional and very accommodating. We arrived early and they were able to get us a room. The breakfast has a wide variety of hot and cold options, with the hot menu varying each day. Fresh baked cookies each afternoon were a nice bonus! Staff brought extra blankets and towels to our room within minutes. If you want a place to stay that truly makes your stay a wonderful experience, then choose the Hampton Inn at Grand Central and let the staff prove why they’re 5 star.

title: First New York Visit
text:
Stayed a week here for our first New York visit. I was just close enough to Times Square and Subway line it felt ideal to be close but yet not so much as to be in the middle of everything, The staff is what made the say that much more enjoyable. I cannot think of a another time where I have been made to feel as welcome. Erika set the standard from the get go and i was a great experience from beginning to end. 
The room was always cleaned and presentable when we got back from sightseeing.

title: Five Star Service in the Heart of Midtown
text: The three ingredients for a hotel's success are supposed to be location, location and location. Hampton Grand Central has all three, plus a fourth: great staff. Everyone we encountered, from the front desk to housekeeping to the breakfast area, was outgoing, friendly and helpful. Our room was handicapped accessible, which gave us a larger bathroom and perhaps some extra space in the room itself. But most importantly, a tub, with an array of grab bars. We didn't need the bars, but it was nice knowing they were there. And the room was very clean. We would definitely stay here again.

title: No me vuelven a ver el pelo
text:
Es con mucha, pero con mucha diferencia, la peor estancia en un "hotel" de toda mi vida. En una palabra; LAMENTABLE. Describo mi experiencia, el periplo comienza nada más llegar, después de todo el día metido en un avión llegas al "hotel" sobre las nueve de la noche y vas a tu habitación, pequeña, pero eso no es un problema en Manhattan, el problema es que en noviembre de 2018 (cuando escribo esta opinión) hay temperaturas en New York de menos seis grados centígrados y el aparato de aire acondicionado de la habitación que nos han dado expulsa aire frío, llamamos a recepción y nos dicen que cuando volvamos de cenar está arreglado, cosa que no fue así y volvemos a llamar, y es entonces cuando comienza el pésimo servicio de este "hotel". Nos mandan al "Jefe de Seguridad" que no tiene la menor idea de qué le pasa al aparato, pero lo que le pierde es la mala educación con la que nos trata, nos cambia de habitación a una planta superior a regañadientes y protestando, donde tampoco funciona el aire, nos mandan a la supervisora del hotel, y estamos probando el aparato casi una hora, el aire caliente no funciona. Nos cambian a una habitación de la planta veinte, donde parece que va algo mejor, y nos dicen que esa noche no nos la cobran para minimizar el enfado monumental que tenemos porque son las doce de la noche. Por cierto, el inodoro de la habitación venía con "regalito" porque al limpiar la habitación, supongo, no habían tirado de la cadena y habían hecho "aguas mayores", por decirlo finamente. La cosa no termina ahí, porque durante la noche siguiente, mi mujer y yo nos despertamos a las dos de la madrugada empapados en sudor e intentamos cortar el aire, y por supuesto el control de la pared no funciona y no se apaga, llamamos a recepción y nos mandan a un técnico que sí sabía lo que tenía entre manos y anula el control de la pared, y nos deja el control en el aparato directamente, la noche en vela. La climatización consiste en aire caliente y aire frío alternativamente, sin término medio, cosa que afecta y mucho en el desayuno que merece mención aparte.

El capítulo del desayuno es interesante, el "comedor" es minúsculo y con escasísimas mesas, las cuales están siempre sucias, si las quieres limpiar no busques líquido desinfectante en el dispensador porque no reponen, bueno no reponen ni el líquido, ni la leche, ni la fruta, ni los yogures, ni absolutamente nada de nada, te buscas la vida si es que encuentras una mesa libre, y esto en noviembre, como para ir en fechas de gran afluencia turística. A todo esto, en el "comedor", que es la prolongación del hall del "hotel", o te asas de calor o te congelas, porque la climatización es la misma que la de las habitaciones.

El cuarto día de "estancia" nos vamos de la habitación a las diez de la mañana y cuando volvemos a las nueve y media de la noche, la habitación está sin hacer, por lo que llamamos por enésima vez a recepción, donde no nos dan explicación alguna, nos ofrecen mandar a "alguien" a hacerla en ese momento y la persona que aparece es el mismo técnico que solucionó el problema del aire, por lo que no estimamos conveniente que sea él quien tenga que dar la cara por otro "error" del pésimo servicio de este "hotel", únicamente se llevó la basura e hicimos nosotros la habitación.

Pero es que la cosa no termina aquí, porque a falta de tres días para dejar el "hotel", se rompe uno de los dos ascensores, por supuesto, porque aquí está todo roto, y si dos ascensores son insuficientes para todos los huéspedes, pues uno...en fin. Estamos en el piso veinte y no hay manera de encontrar hueco en el ascensor porque está hasta arriba de gente, por lo que toca bajar veinte pisos andando para luego buscarse la vida en el desayuno, y más te vale reponer fuerzas porque hay que subir los veinte pisos andando, ya que en el ascensor es imposible entrar, ascensor que tuvo que ser operado manualmente por el "Jefe de Seguridad" porque al ser el único disponible no llega a los pisos superiores, ya que se dirige al más próximo si le vuelven a llamar, y es necesario parar piso por piso de forma manual para que todo el mundo pueda subir y bajar; surrealista. En tres días no fueron capaces de arreglarlo (adjunto foto que tomé al marcharme del "hotel").

Para la persona del "hotel" que vaya a contestarme pidiéndome disculpas por vigesimo novena vez, NO LAS ACEPTO, son ustedes expertos en echar a perder las vacaciones de personas que estamos todo el año trabajando para tener unos días de descanso y nos han arruinado parte de nuestro viaje. Si no he pedido una hoja de reclamaciones ha sido porque no vivo en Manhattan y no voy a poder continuar con el procedimiento de reclamación, y mi único consuelo es informar del pésimo servicio de su "hotel", que bien puede llamarse albergue, así que si alguien está leyendo esta opinión y le sirve de algo, que intente evitar este "hotel" por todos los medios si es que desea pasar sus vacaciones en paz. No pido un servicio de cinco estrellas, que evidentemente no las tiene, pero sí pido un mínimo de profesionalidad e interés en lo que se hace, como hacemos los demás en nuestros trabajos. Que me hayan descontado una noche no les ha servido para comprar mi opinión favorable en Tripadvisor, porque no vuelvo a este "hotel" en toda mi vida ni aunque me lo regalen.

Espero no volver a verles nunca más.

title: Otimo hotel
text: Hotel bem localizado a aproximadamente duas quadras da Grand Central e três quadras da Fifth Avenue. O quarto limpo e com bom tamanho, ótimo café da manhã e atendimento excelente. A relação custo/benefício é muito boa. Recomendo

title: 駅近便利でスタッフ最高
text:
グランドセントラル駅から徒歩でもすぐの距離にあり、これが一番評価出来る理由です。
しかもマンハッタン中心部にしては驚くような価格設定ではなく良心的でした。

スタッフの誰もが明るくて親切です。
早く到着したのですが、当然のように空いている部屋へチェックインさせてくれました。
また、チェックアウトの際も朝から出掛けていてギリギリ戻ってきたのですが、1時間くらい大丈夫だから慌てないでとの神対応。

ロビー奥にはコーヒーや紅茶がいつまでも飲めるようになっており、部屋に持ち帰って寛いでいました。

滞在期間中、ロビーでスタッフのエリカさんとステファニーさんと会う機会が多かったのですが、他のスタッフも含め、本当に親切で優しくて楽しい滞在になりました。

title: Excellent Staff!! We will be back for sure!!
text: We had a very enjoyable stay at this hotel.  I can’t say enough about about the friendliness and helpfulness of the staff!  Ashley and other front desk staff were very welcoming and patient with our every question.  They provided us with expert advice on traveling around the city, especially using the NYC subways.  The bellman, housekeeping, and food service staff were also efficient, courteous, and friendly.  Our room was extremely clean as was the lobby area.  We found the hotel to be very quiet, and the platter of cookies was always waiting for us when we returned!!  I will be definitely recommending this hotel to all my family and friends!

title: hotel prezzo/qualità buono
text: Essendo stato già altre 4/5 volte a New York, non necessitavo di un hotel a Time Square, quindi ho scelto un hotel nelle vicinanze.Discreto, con un buon prezzo e con prima colazione.Unico nota dolente è stata la rottura di uno dei due ascensori (stando al 15° piano era obbligatorio) . Purtroppo nei 3gg in cui sono stato in hotel, non sono riusciti a ripararlo e la mattina le attesa potevano durare anche 20 minuti per poter scendere e salire

title: Great staff! Clean and quiet
text: Recent visit to NYC to go to see Broadway shows. Visit NYC every year to go see shows. Searched for hotels and this had the best price for the weekend we were there. Stayed for 4 nights. The location is great - close to Grand Central Terminal, Bryant Park and Fifth Avenue. It was a little hike to see the shows, making it difficult to come back for a quick break in between. The room was clean, modern and quiet - definite upgrade from our usual location. Hotel rooms in NYC are very small and this was no exception but space was used efficiently. Staff was fantastic - very friendly and helpful. Breakfast and cookies were great! This is not offered at many hotels in the city. We had a wonderful stay and would definitely stay there again. Only complaint is not many options for late night food in the area.

title: Lovely hotel! Will be back!
text: Myself and my partner started here for a week over thanksgiving and were thoroughly impressed! Comfy bed, great shower and plenty of space to unpack etc! Breakfast was included and the bottles of water and cookies when required were a nice gesture. Hotel is within walking distance to grand central, fifth avenue etc! This was our 3rd time in the city and when we visit again in the future we will definitely stay here again! Special mention to the staff too who were so friendly and helpful! Would highly recommend!

title: Excelente hotel
text:
Súper recomendado, excelente servicio, ubicación (una cuadra y media de la estación central), confortable, agradable habitación y con todo lo necesario, aseada, desayuno excelente, sobre todo el personal en general siempre dispuesto a ayudar al huésped, hablan también en español.
Volvería a hospedarme en este hotel . Gracias

title: Excelente Hotel en Manhattan.
text: Excelente hotel, cuenta con un equipo de trabajo insuperable que te hacen sentir desde la llegada hasta la salida como si estuvieras en tu propia casa, el mejor desayuno, la mejor limpieza y el insuperable trato por parte de todos sus trabajadores

title: Séjour agréable!
text: Hôtel idéalement placé, chambre d’une bonne taille pour New York. Bonne literie. Chambre propre à part derrière les tables de nuits (poussière). Petit déjeuner top, cockies, thé et café disponible toute la journée. Deux bouteilles d’eau données à l’arrivé. Chambre à l’etage Préférable, nous étions au 15 ieme avec un petit balcon. Personnel serviable et gentil!                 Nous avons eu du mal à réglé le chauffage, porte du balcon qui laisse rentrer un peu d’air. Draps pas assez grand pour un lit de cette taille ce qui fait que pendant la nuit les draps glissent ainsi que la couette. Pendant la moitié du séjour un ascenseur sur les deux fonctionnait, attente interminable devant le seul ascenseur restant.

title: Great Staff, Great Location, Good Value
text: From the helpful front desk staff to Michelle, the breakfast attendant, to the housekeeping and maintenance staff, every staffer I interacted with was attentive, helpful and welcoming. Two short blocks and you're at Grand Central with subway access throughout the city. From the comfortable bed to the blackout curtains that really work to abundant hot water, the Hampton Inn Manhattan is a groovy value.

title: Smallish rooms but incredible staff
text: We stayed 6 nights over thanksgiving week and never felt more at home. The rooms are small which is to be expected in NYC, but they were very clean and everything worked. Daily hot breakfast was solid and saved us some money certainly. Highlight of our experience was how friendly and helpful the staff were to us and our kids. They always had a smile, offered us bottled water and fresh baked cookies each time, and were always happy to give us recommendations on things to do and how to get there. The location was a quick walk to Grand Central which could just about get you anywhere with a subway ticket. Definitely recommend the hotel and would be happy to return in the future.

title: An amazing stay in Hampton Inn
text: My stay at Hampton Inn United Nations was amazing. The location of the hotel is great, the accommodation is very confortable and the breakfast is good too. They have 2 waffle machines, many flavors of juices, donuts, yogurts, fruits and everyday they change all 3 hot menus (like eggs, bacon, potatoes etc). In my point of view what shines the most in the hotel is the quality of the service and the staff team, specially Ximena and Luis that were very kind with us. All the crew seems to be happy with your presence there and it feel so good :)

title: It's Like Being At Home
text:
I traveled by myself to see a preview of a documentary film I'm in.(To Kid or Not To Kid) From the moment I arrived, I was treated like family. It was almost too good to be true. Such a warm welcome. Such concern for me. Such good advice as to where I could go for  food and how to even call my Via for the first time.
My room was 2107. Terrific view! It''s small but totally fine. The bed was very comfortable. I would say that the lamp was too far from me to make it easy to shut before I fell asleep. That's not something to make you not stay. Another challenges my first day there. Spent a good part of the day with a friend and walking to see the Xmas tree that was being placed on that day. When I got back, my room wasn't cleaned! It was late afternoon. They said they would send someone immediately but I was exhausted and only needed new towels. I got them.
The darling people at the counter suggested whenever I left the room to tell the front desk when I needed that room cleaned. They clean the rooms of those checking out first.... assuming most people in NYC are out and about all day.
I forgot when I arrived....I was given a "Special Guest OF The Day sign on my door which gave me some chocolates, two extra water bottles and a lovely letter.
My room had some heat challenges. The wall thermostat wasn't working well. This happened on two separate days. I called and within a few minutes, they had an engineer come to fix it.
I read there was some people who complained about the two elevators and how long they waited. I never experienced that at all.
Their breakfast was the typical Hampton/Hilton with hot and cold choices. The make your own waffles was very popular! If I was to make any complaint, it would be their "robust" coffee. It was FAR from robust!
For anyone traveling to the NYC area, I would choose this hotel in a heartbeat. It's near enough to all the sights but far enough not to be in the middle of all the NYC drama.
When I come back for the next documentary I'm in "My SO Called Selfish Like", I'll stay here!
By the way, I was refunded some money for the inconvenience of not having my room cleaned that first day and the heat challenges..

title: Outstanding Service! Great staff! Clean!
text: The whole family stayed at this hotel for our NYC Trip. Since day one we were greeted by friendly and helpful staff. The hotel is clean, the breakfast is really good and prepared by a very nice lady by the name of Michelle (who also prepares some very yummy cookies). The front desk staff was very nice and treated us like family! Thank you Erica, Dashanda, and another very nice lady that I feel bad for forgetting her name! I would definitely book my stay with this hotel again!

title: Mid Town Oasis
text: The Hampton UN is a midtown treasure, steps from Central Station, the Chrysler Building, UN and much more.  Outstanding staff and service, impeccable rooms. A short distance by taxi to La Guardi.  Home away from home.

title: Exceptional customer service, genuinely made me feel welcome
text: Great location walking distance to Grand Central Station.  The sincerity of the front desk staff  in providing a great customer service experience did not go unnoticed by me. I have long traveled 2-4 nights a week and consequently have seen it all,  The team at the Hampton Inn Grand Central location made me feel like I was coming home.

title: Great value
text: This hotel is very conveniently located in mid-town.  For the price, it is extremely comfortable.  The room was quiet and comfortable.  Decent free breakfast and work out room available.  Closet is a bit small

title: Hotel muy bien ubicado.
text:
Desayuno solo a base de bollería. No tienen restaurante. Desayunas en el Hall del hotel. Solo tienen dos mesas para desayunar. Si no llegas a tiempo y están ocupada te tienes que sentar en el los sillones del Hall.

Las habitaciones son muy antiguas. Gotean todos los grifos del baño.

Reservamos con desayuno incluido y tuvimos que salir a desayunar a la cafetería de enfrente del hotel.

Única ventaja del hotel es que esta bastante céntrico. Por el precio que cobran deberían cuidar mas los desayunos.

title: Da provare !!!!
text: Sono ancora ospite di ques ' albergo che definisco superare le aspettative . Posizione centrale , ottimale per raggiungere con i mezzi qualsiasi destinazone ( stazione a 2 passi ) ! Colazione super e ricordate che New york è cara  se si vuole mangiare discretamente , per cui se la mattina non. desiderate spendere altri soldi e tempo , qui la colazione è evcellente . Il mio primo giorno qui a New york sono caduta , ginocchio un po' gonfio ma in albergo c'è la macchina de ghiaccio e un personale disponibilissimo , inoltre te e caffè sempre a disposizione ! Pulizia ok , anche se non amo la moquette ma gli amercani si . Da provare !!!

title: Nicest, most helpful staff ever!
text: Great warm cookies.  Easy check in and out. Helpful, friendly, knowledgeable staff. Comfy bed.Free breakfast with lots of options. Good location.  Convenient room setup. Would highly recommend.  What else can I say?

title: Lovely staff , I would recommend 👍🏼
text:
I spend my holidays in this hotel , I was there for the marathon with a big group from Italy,and I can recommend this hotel ,first because is in a good position ( very close to the Grand central Station) and second for the amazing  customer service that I had. Thank you very much to Elisabeth and Erika for your help and thank you MR Rivera , my boyfriend really enjoyed the conversation with you while he was waiting me :)
Thanks a lot 
Laura Alfarano

title: Hampton NYC
