text: Was in town for the first time to NYC for the Marathon and this Hampton was in a great location. The experience was very satisfactory as the staff was very helpful and took care of our needs. The place was kept very clean from the room to the breakfast area. They gladly stored our luggage before check I’m so we can se the town.

title: New York...Fantastica!!
text:
Io e il mio compagno abbiamo soggiornato in questo hotel dal 27.10 al 04.11.2018.
L’hotel è in posizione strategica a pochi passi da Grand Central e con una camminata di circa 15 minuti si arriva tranquillamente alla 5th Av.
Il personale dell’hotel è cordiale, sorridente e sempre disponibile ad aiutare il cliente; appena arrivati ci hanno consegnato 2 bottiglie d’acqua e la mappa della città.
Nella hall tutte le mattine erano presenti i sacchetti merenda contenenti acqua, un frutto e due merendine, la sera quando rientravamo vi erano biscotti appena sfornati, thè e caffè.
La nostra camera era al 17° piano, come tutto l’hotel era pulita e confortevole; era ampia sia la zona notte (letto e cuscini comodissimi) sia il bagno, (avevamo la doccia doppia), corredato da phone e set cortesia, (shampoo, balsamo, crema corpo e saponetta), rifornito tutte le volte che lo utilizzavamo.
In camera era presente la macchinetta del caffe e nell’armadio ferro ed asse da stiro; la tv non presentava canali europei.
Abbiamo usufruito della colazione gratuita che comprendeva ogni mattina piatti salati tra cui uova, hamburger/salsicce/bacon, patate arrosto, alimenti dolci (yogurt, cereali, dunuts, waffel, frutta fresca), succhi di frutta latte e caffè.
L’hotel nel piano seminterrato ha anche una palestra con asciugamani, cuffie per la musica e televisori.
Fuori dall’hotel sono presenti negozi, ristoranti, take-away, pizza ad 1 dollaro (per niente male) ed un piccolo supermercato.
Ci siamo trovati benissimo e se mai un giorno torneremo a New York sicuramente soggiorneremo di nuovo qui!

title: Central location
text: First thing what we noticed in hotel was, that the room was very small. For us, it did not matter because we were travelling lighly. There is gym in the downstair if the hotel which is better than average gym at the hotels. That was good thing. Also the location was good.

title: Parfait
text: Très bien localisé, calme, lits très confortables, déjeuner parfait, pas de réfrigérateur dans la chambre et le coût du stationnement élevé.  Parfait pour un séjour entre amis ou en couple.  Ascenseur parfois lent.... propre, j’y retournerai!

title: Fantastic Hotel and Staff
text:
Clean room, comfortable and spacious bed. Excellent Wi-Fi connection.
Reception staff very kind, they even made us a surprise for our 20th Anniversary, THANKS!! :))
Breakfast varied and complete.
Location of the hotel very good just a few minutes from the Grand Central and the metro station!!
Thanks from Irene and Fabrizio from Italy.

title: Fantastic Experience in New York!
text:
Erika is very nice and happy. All the staff is ready to help and to answer at your question. 
The breakfast is complete of what you need. I will stay there again. The hotel si very near to central station, empire state building and other sites.

title: Terrific Staff
text: Recently stayed at this hotel for the NYC Marathon.  We were met initially by a female staff member named Soule at the front desk.   She couldn't have been nicer!  My 2 grandsons, ages 3 and 4 were with us.   She left the desk to go into the kitchen and brought out 3 fresh cooked cookies for them.   We went out that evening and coming back one of my grandsons was asleep in a stroller.   The elevators were being used which was understandable and we were on the 2nd floor so I decided to carry the stroller up.  Soule insisted on carrying the stroller with me and we both carried it up.  She was absolutely terrific.  It continued the next morning when I was taking the 4 year old outside for a walk early.   We met Erika who immediately called him over, gave him crayons and post cards with areas to color.  She too was terrific.   I'm from NY and I'm not used to this kind of sincere service.   Based on that customer service alone, I would definitely come back to this hotel.   Both ladies should be commended, they are an asset to your company.

title: Excelente calidad precio
text: La atención es espectacular, quiero mencionar especialmente a Stephanie, Luis  y a Erika por su ayuda cada vez que las necesitamos y la del resto de personal siempre con una sonrisa. Destaco las galletitas recién hechas que ponían para clientes, mi hija dio buena cuenta de ellas.

title: EVP
text: Great hotel. Very convenient locatiob. Everyone was very helpful and upbeat. The hotel was clean, the room was comfortable, breakfast was good, and the cookies at check in were an added bonus!  I will definitely stay here again.

title: 1st time in New York
text: Superb hotel in a great location only 250 metres from Grand Central Station making daily travel really easy. Friendly, helpful and professional staff. Well appointed room with really comfortable bed with top notch accessories. Great choice of food with only one small irritation in that the restaurant isn't really big enough for the number of guests and there are usually small queues forming at the toaster and waffle maker. Wi-fi is readily available as is a well appointed computer suite with 3 PC's, printer and shredder which proved extremely useful for 'checking-in online' for our return flight. There is also a very nice fitness suite. The hotel has approx. 20 floors but only has 2 lifts which can be very slow at busy times when they are being called at every floor. My family and I would definitely stay here again because the small irritations are far outweighed by there being so many good points. We walked around the local area and felt very safe. There are several good general shops, takeaways and restaurants. Secure baggage storage was offered on our last day as we did not fly until late in the day. I thoroughly recommend this hotel to anyone. You will enjoy your stay and the location.

title: Mycket bra och prisvärt
text:
Vi bodde 3 personer (vuxen+ ungdomar 19 och 15 år)i rum med två queensize bäddar i  5 nätter. 
Bra och prisvärt hotell bara två gator från Grand central station o tunnelbanan som är bästa sättet att ta sig runt på Manhattan. 
Lätt också att ta sig ut på FDR drive om man kör bil från hotellet till tex outlet. Avis biluthyrning närmaste granne. 
Mycket trevlig personal, bra service, bra internet + tv och frukost ingår där det finns våfflor, bagels, toast, äggröra o bacon/korv samt gröt. 
Värt mycket att slippa ta sig ut för att äta frukost på stan, både tidsmässigt o kostnadsmässigt. Kaffe o the finns under dagen. 
Sängarna bra och man sover gott. Liten nackdel med skjutdörr till badrummet men ok vid kortare vistelse. Bra tryck i duschen. 
Hotellet ordnade även bil till flygplatsen, stor SUV för 90 USD + dricks. Mycket bra chaufför. 
Kommer definitivt att använda samma hotell vid nästa besök i NYC.

title: Spot on hotel and staff !
text: We’ve just returned from a weeks stay in the Hampton Inn Grand central and we honestly can’t fault the hotel. The hotel was spotlessly clean, the included breakfast was good but the staff were the best part. We were greeted every time we past a member of staff and they honestly couldn’t do enough for us ( especially Stephanie) Thank you and keep up the good work

title: Prisvärt och trevligt hotell
text: Familjen - två vuxna, ett barn - bodde här sex nätter. Superläge, mitt i smeten men dämpad ljudnivå. Vårt rum låg ändå ut mot gatan. Trevligt och funktionellt rum. Och personalen mycket hjälpsam och vänlig. Standardfrukost ingår vilket är ovanligt i New York. Rekommenderar starkt detta hotell.

title: Great staff -convenient location
text: About a 5 minute walk from Grand Central Station. 2 minutes to the UN. Don't let the construction all around deter you from this great Hampton Inn. In an older building--thus smaller rooms than your typical Hampton Inn, but in return you get solid/soundproof rooms--The typical Hampton Inn/Hilton free breakfast is fine--coffee is really HOT! Ximena was the amazing staff/woman who worked the breakfast rush--she was so pleasant and helpful. She went our of her way to help me with getting the creamer I wanted. She smiled all the time and cleared the tables when sloppy guests did not. Dashanda at the front desk made the entire weekend at the  Hampton Inn an amazing experience. Her vivacious personality, winning smile and knowledge were top notch! Her co-worker, Imelda, was also great and checked us in with professionalism and a smile.We will stay here again. My only suggestion for improvement is that the wi-fi does not work in the basement  where the business center and gym are located. And I could not get a cell signal in the basement. The business center is great with 3 PCs , printer and supplies.The gym was fine. The hotel was filled to capacity with guests and families all over the world---very lively and fun!

title: Good hotel at a great location
text:
We travelled as a group of 8 and all of us came away with a very favourable view of the hotel.

The hotel staff were incredibly friendly and helpful and were always happy to help out with any enquiry.  Whilst the food was not exceptional, it was certainly good enough to fuel yourself up for a day's adventure in Manhattan and of sufficient variety to keep the grumbles away.

The hotel has many strong points, but the gem in its crown is its location.  Perfectly placed for a quick stroll to Grand Central station and a 10 - 15 minute walk to numerous other famous locations.

Overall a credit to the Hampton chain of hotels at a very fair price.

title: Recomendable! Recomendable! Recomendable!
text:
Estuvimos en este hotel la última semana de octubre/18.
Sinceramente quedamos muy conformes, es la segunda vez que nos quedamos en un Hampton Inn ya que la primera vez fue una experiencia super buena.

En resumen:

* UBICACIÓN: Es excelente. A 2 cuadras de la principal estación de metro y buses (grand central). Se llega caminando a varios de los puntos de interes y tiene comercios cerca ante cualquier necesidad.
* PERSONAL: El personal es de lo más amable que hemos visto en hoteles, siempre una sonrisa, siempre atentos a ayudar, siempre con pequeños agasajos para los huéspedes. Fuimos a celebrar 10 años de casados, cuando el personal se enteró nos mandaron a la habitación una ramo de rosas y una tarjeta.
* INSTALACIONES: sin lujos, pero todo impecable, super limpio, completo, moderno y con buen gusto. No se precisa más.
* DESAYUNO: suficiente variedad, rico y en abundancia.

De verdad nos sentimos como en casa, bien atendidos. Dudo se encuentre una mejor propuesta en esta escala de precios (inclusive en escalas superiores de precio el personal no creo sea más amable que este)

title: Amazing customer focused.
text: From the moment my family (2 adults and 2 small children) arrived, we were made to feel so welcome. The team fussed over my girls, which is always a big hit to me, as it shows family friendliness. It made us feel unique and special and not just another business clientele, like many other Hilton's I have stayed at. The facilities are not amazing but necessities are met 100%. I have stayed in various other Hilton's around the world and initially was reluctant to book a hampton inn but I was not let down. As previously stated the customer focus and location here will encourage me to return again and again. If your are fortunate enough to have housekeeper Noima you will not be disappointed, Thank you, Noima. Front desk staff I would like to thank, especially from my 2 small girls but equally my husband and I, is: Salu (duty manager 25th October, 3pm, looks like mulan), Dashaune (for being so bubbly and welcoming to us 4, black girl with plaits) and Erika (for always having a friendly welcoming smile). The breakfast staff, 1 from Ecuador(Sorry didn't get names), another who was small and super sweet and another with a 10 year old son. She had curly hair. Just amazing. Thank you.

title: Séjour très agréable
text:
Hyper bien situé! A 2 pas de la gare,l’hôtel est très sympa tout comme son personnel. Deco un peu désuète mais c’est un détail.
Les chambres sont spacieuses, le lit est grand et confortable.
Petit déjeuner excellent, salé ou sucré.
Café, thé, chocolat chaud 24h/24 (Bon a 1h-2h du matin il n’y a plus forcément tout...)
Des cookies nous attendaient tous les jours quand nous rentrions de balade :-)
Bien décidé à retourner à New York, nous reprendrons le même hôtel!

title: Autumn break
text: stayed for a week in October, very pleasant and helpful staff on reception, rooms very clean and plenty of hot water.Good sized shower. I fairly quiet area for New York, only 5 minute walk to Grand Central station. Breakfast included which was adequate although not sure on the impact on the environment due to all disposable plates and utensils. Hot drinks available all day but flasks occasionally went cold, coffee also in rooms. Would certainly return here.

title: Great Customer Service at the front desk
text: Erika did a great job making us feel comfortable in a big city. She was pleasant and gave us great advice. She made the best cookies and went above and beyond! I would highly recommend staying here and Erika will ensure you are taken care of.

title: New york
text: Tolle Lage nettes Personal und sehr gute verkehrsanbinung times Square in 10minuten zu Fuß erreichbar nette lokale in der Umgebung grand central um der Ecke und am Morgen ein super Frühstück für amerikanische Verhältnisse

title: Incrivelmente ruim
text: Começando do básico: o hotel tem localização apenas mediana, não tem nenhum metro mto perto e está longe das principais atrações de NY.Isso não seria problema se a experiência com a hospedagem fosse boa, o que não foi.Mesmo fazendo o check-in as 15h, tivemos que esperar mais de meia hora para o quarto estar pronto.Logo percebemos que o ralo do banheiro estava entupido e no outro dia, as 10h, avisamos a gerência sobre o problema e fomos informados que até nossa volta estaria resolvido.Voltamos mais de 18h é surpresa: problema não resolvido e membro do staff duvidando de que nós realmente havíamos relatado o problema. Tínhamos reserva no restaurante para as 19h e perdemos pq precisamos esperar a manutenção ir ao quarto consertar. O quarto ficou com um cheiro horrível pelos produtos químicos utilizados e sequer um pedido de desculpas recebemos.A estrutura do hotel é boa, mas o staff é despreparado e debochado, infelizmente.

title: Great hotel , fabulous staff
text: We were really pleased we chose this hotel . Fab location , comfortable , clean rooms well appointed with sockets / usb points. Nice hot showers. Great breakfast to start the day with lots of choice. The staff were so friendly and helpful. Expedia had messed our booking up , with one bed to accommodate 3 of us . The manager sorted us out with an extra room for the 1st night then a room with 2 beds thereafter, knowing how busy they were ,we were delighted.

title: Great stay
text: Very comfortable hotel in one of the best locations you could be right near Grand Central but on 2nd So not noisy but only five minute walk to Grand Central. perfect bass location because you’re kind of in the middle of everything so I walked from the Soho to the hotel very easy nice walk and walked uptown to around 80th easy walk.The room was very quiet comfortable good heater and air-conditioner ( worked well not noisy)very clean with a nice view of 2nd Ave. Breakfast was very very good the lobby was really nice all decorated for Halloween and the staff was very nice and efficient it’s a very very nice hotel they have valet parking for $60 which  sounds expensive but it’s really convenient But it’s not really that expensive for New York. I would definitely return to this hotel 100%

title: NY getaway fine right
text: Erika went above and beyond to get us checked in early after a red eye flight and no sleep for 30+ hrs. We were exhausted and hangry and she made miracles happen. Thank you so much!  We truly appreciate you Erika!

title: Great Hotel
text: Had a fantastic time staying here, compact hotel but facilities were great for a short stay. Convenient location, just outside the main central 15 minute walk away. Ximena was so helpful, special thanks for all the help with breakfast, thank you Ximena 😀

title: Nice Hotel
text: I stayed about a week. Clean and cozy hotel with free open buffet breakfast. Lounge is kept open all day long providing free coffee and tea. Location is convenient. Very friendly staff. Highly recommended for NYC stays as Grand Central is just minutes away.

title: Tolle Lage
text: Gute Lage, nur 2 Straßen von der Grand Central entfernt. Zum Times Square usw. kann man auch problemlos laufen. Zimmer sind ausreichend groß und vor allem sauber. Der Service ist sehr freundlich und hilft bei Problemen gerne. Das Frühstück ist für amerikanische Verhältnisse gut. Der Preis: man ist halt in New York und zahlt entsprechend

title: Small Clean NYC Rooms With A Good Breakfast
text: Traveled to NYC for a festival and shared a room with friends. The rooms are small and pretty much only fit a bed. The bathrooms are regular size though. Basically three people to a room is possible, but it's very tight. The positives are their rooms are clean, the gym is nice and the free breakfast is good. It's a great way to start any morning in NYC. Plus their staff like Ximena is very friendly and welcoming.

title: Quiet hotel in good location
text: Stayed here in October 2018 with a family of four.  Far enough from the major tourist areas to avoid the crowds, but close enough to get their with a short walk or Uber ride.   Room was very clean and comfortable.  Free breakfast - great perk, especially in NYC.  Twenty minute walk to Times Square.   Five minute walk from Grand Central Station.  Staff was very pleasant and polite.   Lots of fun places to eat just around the corner on Third.  Would definitely stay here again.

title: Great staff, great location
text:
Really enjoyed our stay. Stephanie was a rockstar, and the rest of the staff was very courteous as well. 

Perfect location in Midtown. Walk to virtually every attraction. 

Rooms are small, that would be my only complaint. Fabulous stay otherwise.

title: Everything you need
text: This hotel, though compact, with a moderate size lobby and simple clean rooms, has everything you need for a comfortable stay in NY. We appreciated our quiet room, the friendly staff, water coffee and tea throughout most of the day, and a decent daily breakfast. Nothing too fancy, but with all the basics and a good location - just a few blocks to Grand Central Terminal. We would definitely consider staying here again in the future.

title: The staff make this place
text: My son and I stayed at this hotel for 2 nights and it was a joy. The hotel is very clean and the beds are comfy. Loved the endless supply of warm chocolate chip cookies at the reception and the bottles of water.  The staff at this hotel are second to none. Friendly, welcoming and happy! They made our stay for us. Thank you!

title: Muy buen hotel y muy bien ubicado
text: Muy buena ubicación, la habitación limpia y gran vista de la ciudad, el personal de la recepción muy amable (especialmente Stephanie) en general amables todos, incluido el gran trabajo del personal del desayunador, en general todos siempre muy amables y atentos a tus necesidades o consultas; falta un poco mas de variedad en el desayuno, sobre todo si tienes largas estadías te darás cuenta.

title: Bien situé
text: Bien situé, on a eu accès à notre chambre plus tôt que prévu ce que nous avons apprécié. Bon petit déjeuner, par contre pas beaucoup de place assise. Le dernier jour nous avons du déjeuner dans notre chambre.

title: Wonderful Staff, great location and memorable stay
text:
We went to NY for my dad's Birthday and we had a blast! 
The hotel located in the great area, walking distance to many locations and near Grand Central. We were able to walk to times square, UN and Central Park easily.
The room was pretty clean, and had comfortable bed.The free wifi worked just fine in our room. 
there are free tea, coffee or hot cocoa 24/7 with nice cookies. 

The front desk went above and beyond my expectation to make our stay memorable. I stayed in different hotels in times square area in the past few months but this hotel was really different esp comparing the front desk service, I found them exceptionally friendly and welcoming. They did surprise us in the room 30 min after arrival with big cake to welcome my dad and wish him a warm happy birthday. we were so touched by this act and really made our day. 
We had complementary breakfast which was good and Nancy in the kitchen was absolutely awesome. attentive to provide everything for everyone very quickly.
I would like to thank everyone esp. Erika, Rabiga and Shonda  and two other ladies in the front desk which unfortunately dont remember their names. 
I highly recommend this hotel and would stay here in my next visit.

title: Nice Hampton Inn in a good location
text:
I stayed here for business as it was close to where I needed to work.  I have stayed at this hotel several times and the service is very good and the rooms have always been clean.  On a few occasions I have encountered Dashanda at the front desk and she is very friendly.  This time she was working at the desk when I checked in at night and I was surprised to see here at the desk the next morning.  Each time, my interaction with her was very friendly and I hope she is there the next time I stay at this hotel.

The breakfast area is a little on the small size which normally hasn't been an issue but on this last stay the hotel was very busy and it make the breakfast area a little cramped and the staff was doing their best to keep it clean and stocked.

The hotel itself is very quiet but it is located in NYC so you can expect some normal street noise.

title: Good Location, helpful staff
text: It might not seem like it, this hotel is a great location for the price. We stayed three days after our cruise, and were able to take a tour, see a show and go to the 9/11 memorial with pretty much ease. You might not want to walk as far as we did but it wasn't all that much. The lobby isn't much, but I don't spend a lot of time in the lobby anyway. But the young women at the desk were very friendly and helpful. And the bus-man/security man took our bags, tagged and stored them in a friendly and efficient manner. Our rooms were clean and not too dreary, we had a window, but the weather was a little overcast, so it seemed a little less than cheery, (but we weren't in our rooms that much, so not a big deal, it was clean.) The free wifi worked just fine. We didn't take breakfast, but our friends did, and thought it was pretty good.

title: Bien mais chambre peu insonorisée
text: Belle expérience en général et très bon service à la clientèle.  Mon garçon a bien aimé les biscuits à l'entrée. Le déjeuner était correct mais manqué d'organisation et surtout de grille pain. Peu de places pour s'asseoir lors du déjeuner. Gros bémol : insonorisation de la chambre quasi nulle. On entendait tout ce qui se disait dans la chambre à côté...même leur réveil matin nous a réveillé.

title: Finally New York
text:
Hotel in posizione comodissima, a 2 minuti dal Grand Central Terminal dove c'é anche fermata di due linee della metro, 15/20 minuti a piedi da Times Square. Camere non grandi, ma molto pulite, letti comodi. Disponibilità di bevande calde e fredde tutto il giorno, ogni pomeriggio cookies pronti per i clienti, bottigliette di acqua sempre a disposizione. Personale gentile e molto disponibile. Sala computer con possibilità di stampare. Colazione inclusa.
Unica pecca il dover avere il doppio dell'importo sulla carta di credito in quanto al check in viene bloccato l'importo (che poi ti sbloccano al check out e torna disponibile dopo qualche giorno) e al check out ti fanno il movimento effettivo.
Questo é bene saperlo prima per non trovarsi poi in difficoltà sul posto.

title: presque parfait
text:
séjour presque parfait! en effet l'hôtel était conforme à nos attentes:
- localisation: idéale, hôtel situé à 200 m du Grand Central Terminal, il nous a ainsi été très facile de nous déplacer en métro. Nous avons cependant effectué de nombreux trajets à pied car l'hôtel est effectivement au coeur de plusieurs lieux de visites (à 10 minutes de Time Square, à 20 minutes de l'ESB, à 25 minutes de Central Park; ...), nombreux points de restauration à proximité
- chambre:(14 ème étage) propre, lit King Size très confortable, présence de sèche-cheveux, fer et planche à repasser, coffre-for. Fenêtre bien insonorisée donc peu de bruit depuis......... l'extérieur
- personnel: agréables et souriantes, présence d'un bagagiste pour garder vos bagages avant le départ à l'aéroport
-service: le petit- déjeuner gratuit est très convenable (yahourts, fruits frais, beignets, gaufres, céréales, pain de mie et bagel, gâteau citron, oeufs, etc...)
avant 07 heures 30, il y a peu de monde, ensuite la salle est vite pleine
citronnade, bouteilles d'eau et cookies maison délicieux à l'accueil, thé et café en libre service

le seul moins: nous avions une porte communicante avec la chambre voisine donc vous entendez les conversations de vos voisins et ils entendents les votres. Pas bien agréable lorsque ces dernières rentraient tard la nuit et que vous êtes réveillés par le bruit de porte; on avait l'impression qu'elles rentraient dans notr chambre. 

conclusion: je conseille néanmoins cet hôtel. En cas d'un éventuel prochain séjour, je prendrais le même hôtel en demandant une chambre sans porte communicante.

title: Amazing staff
text: Spent the weekend in NYC at a hidden gem of a hotel. The staff welcomed us and took every effort to make our weekend perfect. The greeted us with warm friendly smiles, offered us water in the lobby and gave us great directions to get around town. Pulled out a map and helped us with subway and walking directions. The room was spacious, clean and comfortable. This hotel is in a quiet section of midtown but close to Grand Central, theaters and dining.Late afternoon- flavored water and cookies and asked about our day. Twice the stowed our luggage with a smile and wished us well on our trip home.

title: Situation parfaite, prestations au top!
text:
Nous avons séjourné au HAMPTON INN en juillet 2018 et c'était un séjour magique!
Belle hôtel, très bien situé, proche gare et à 5 min de Times Squares le paradis!
L'accueil de l'hôtel est parfait, bouteille d'eau sur demande, déjeuner copieux, petits cookies tout chaud et citronnade en retour de journée! Personnel très sympathique et souriante! Je recommande ++++
Je cherche à joindre l'hôtel par mail pour une facture, avez-vous l'adresse email à me communiquer svp.
Merci.

title: Eine unvergessliche Zeit
text:
Von der Lage ein relativ zentral, jedoch zugleich ruhig gelegenes Hotel mit der Grand Central Station in unmittelbarer Nähe und somit alle wichtigen Sehenswürdigkeiten in Kürze auch mit der Subway erreichbar.

Das Personal war stets sehr bemüht und hilfsbereit, um einem den Aufenthalt so angenehm wie möglich zu machen. 
Auch die Zimmer sind ausreichend groß und das Bad sauber.

Das Frühstück ist zwar typisch amerikanisch, jedoch gibt es eine genügende Auswahl an süßem, sowie pikantem Essen. Empfehlen würden wir zwischen 06.00 und 07.00 Uhr frühstücken zu gehen, um einen Andrang im Speisesaal zu umgehen.

Für uns war es ein unvergesslicher Aufenthalt in dieser wundervollen Metropole und dieses Hotel mit seinem Personal, hat einen großen Teil dazu beigetragen.

title: Excelente experiencia
text: Muy buen hotel, habitaciones amplias, cómodas, muy limpias, un buen desayuno, el personal excelente especialmente Erica. Cerca de la Estación Grand Central desde la cual se llega fácilmente a todos los puntos de la ciudad. Lo recomiendo ampliamente y espero volver a alojarme en el hotel

title: Super gelegen und sehr freundlich und gutes Preis Leistungsverhältnis
text: Das Hotel hat ja bereits sehr gute Bewertungen, diese kann ich nur bestätigen, der Service ist sehr aufmerksam und hilfsbereit, das Frühstück mit Obst, abwechselnden warmen Eiern, Speck, Würstchen und immer Bratkartoffeln. Es ist erstaunlich ruhig obwohl es mitten im Zentrum an der E 43 zwischen 3rd und 2nd Street liegt.

title: service/comminication issues
text:
King size bed only available up to the 12th floor.

Room and fixtures both need some update.  1) Position of the toilet paper was awkward, which was next to the toilet instead of underneath the sink. 2)  wall paper in the bathroom were peeling

No wifi in the basement.

There was some miscommunication issue and lack of leadership during my previous stay.  Hopefully the next one would be more satisfying.

title: Lo recomiendo ampliamente
text: Este hotel tiene una gran cantidad de ventajas: una gran ubicación, habitaciones cómodas, un muy buen desayuno, la verdad que vale la pena 100%. Lo único que complicó un poco mi estadía era que había una obra en construcción muy cerca, pero no depende de ellos y no baja para nada la calificación de este alojamiento. El personal es muy atento, las habitaciones estaban muy cuidadas, en la recepción se ofrece café a toda hora, galletas y aguas saborizadas, son detalles positivos. El precio es muy razonable en comparación con los otros alojamientos de Manhattan. Recomiendo especialmente el desayuno, sin dudas volveré en algún momento

title: In the heart of Manhattan
text: Located near to the Chrysler building, this Hamptons is walking distance to most of the prominent places like Times Square etc. The rooms are obviously small and good for 3 pax. The staff are awesome. Energetic and ready to help. 5 star for the team. Else a typical Hampton. Value for money and good location.

title: Birthday!!
text: My stay was great thanks to my wonderful host Erika and Rabige treated me and my sister great 👍🏾 😁. The room was nice and clean, the bed felt like I was sleeping on clouds. Great view of the city 🌃 . Plus the shower 🚿 was amazing favorite part nothing like a great shower.

title: Good location, small rooms
text: The hotel shows a good location, close to grand Central station.  The rooms are very small and clean. Breakfast gives you the mains you need. Breakfast room is also small and a bit crowded. Friendly Staff at receptIon.

title: Amazing stay!
text: The staff was super friendly from check i to to check out, the rooms were clean, beds were comfortable and contiental breakast was decent. The rooms were updated. The hotel was in a good area.I'd definately stay here again.

title: Muy buena ubicación
text: El hotel tiene muy buena ubicación, sin llegar a ser céntrico. Las habitaciones son correctas, tienen secador, plancha, caja fuerte, pero no hay nevera. En recepción suele haber agua embotellada, limonada, cookies, etc. gratis. La única pega sería el desayuno, quizás algo limitado.

title: Estadia en NYC
text: Estimados:                     Hace unos días fuimos huéspedes de este hotel y debo manifestarles que nuestra estadía fue agradable. Destaco sí,  la gentileza y amabilidad de las señoras Erika, Nancy y Michelle quienes tuvieron un gesto muy especial. Lucila, Elías y Elías Jr.

title: Awesome!
text: Friendly and helpful staff. Clean and decent size rooms. Nice complimentary breakfast, also tea, coffee or hot cocoa 24/7. When I have to stay in NYC for work I have many options, but I always choose this hotel.

title: First Rate!
text: This hotel has a winning attitude that extends from the front desk to the top floor. And it all seems to start with Erika, guest services rock star. Her friendly nature and willingness to extend every courtesy to the hotel's guests is a remarkable attribute. The hotel is very clean, the rooms are comfortable and quiet (a nice bonus in Manhattan). Just two blocks from the UN or Grand Central Station, it's an easy walk.  During my short stay, I was beyond impressed with the service, the staff's friendliness and accommodating nature.

title: Friendliness and Service Extraordinaire...
text: What a great experience at the Hampton Inn Manhattan Grand Central with my daughter.  The staff were excellent (especially Erika, Rabiga and Shonda).  Not only did they provide superior service but they were friendly and helpful.  The room was cool, the bedding was comfy and we were close to everything we came to Manhattan for.  We will definitely be back!!!

title: Great staff
text: I got to the city late and it was the only hotel that allowed me to check in at the time!! The staff were amazing especially Sapunte!!! She was so attentive, great personality and she had great customer service skills.  Employees like her is what makes you go back to a business!!! Thank you very much!!! The rest of the staff were awesome too!!!

title: Great NYC hotel!
text: Stayed this Hampton Inn location over the weekend. The hotel is in a great location, the front desk, cleaning  and breakfast staff were wonderful! I will definitely be staying here on my next trip to the city and will definitely be recommending this hotel two friends and family.

title: Perfect hitel
text:
I was extremely impressed with this hotel for many reasons.  It was in the perfect location as it was in a relatively quiet street so no noise late at night. 

There was a good choice for breakfast each mornjng and the types of egg and sausage offered each day varied.   The breakfast was a great way to set you up for the day and keep you going until afternoon. 

What pleasantly surprised me was the little things such as the free tea and coffee whenever you wanted from the self service area and the refreshing water located at reception.  

All staff were thoroughly helpful and offered bottles of water for you take with you for your day ahead.  

I really enjoyed my stay here and would highly recommend to anyone visiting New York

title: Wonderful staff
text: This was by far the best experience I've ever had at a hotel. The staff was exceptional. Rabiga and Erika were the best. They decorated my room for my birthday. They made me feel like family. Wonderful ladies. The complimentary breakfast was always delicious. I have already recommended this hotel to everyone I have talked to. I hope to be back

title: Good value for money. Buena relación costo/beneficio.
text:
The hotel is a good value for money choice.  Rooms are clean and comfortable although some are small.  Breakfast is included in the rate, which is something unusual in NYC and if you do not have time for breakfast or are planning to skip lunch, you can take a complimentary bag with a bottle of water, an apple and a couple of additional items.  The staff is very helpful and friendly.  The location is very good, two blocks away form Grand Central Station and about five blocks from 5th Avenue.

El hotel es una muy buena alternativa por su relación costo/beneficio. Las habitaciones son limpias y confortables aunque algunas son chicas. El desayuno está incluido en el precio, lo que es poco usual en NYC y si no se tiene tiempo para el desayuno, ofrece gratis una manzana, un agua y un par de otras cosas. El personal es muy servicial y atento. La ubicación es muy buena, a dos cuadras de Grand Central Station y a unas cinco de 5th Avenue.

title: Ótimo custo beneficio
text: ótimo localização - 2 quadras da estação central café da manhã - Tipico americano, mas satisfaz as necessidades.Quarto - compacto, porém muito organizado e limpoBanheiro - Compacto, possui chuveiro, banheira mas,não possui boxRecepção - Atendentes excelentes e dispostas a ajudarInternet - a conexão cai as vezes, mas é só fazer o login novamente que funciona.Academia - Possui esteiras e um cross over que resolve bemLan House - Possui 2 computadores e impressora, mas não utilizei o serviço

title: highly recommend
text: great hotel  and location,  1 1/2 block walk to grand central station, many restaurants nearby, 1 mile walk to broadway, helpful and courteous staff, excellent value, breakfast very good with  cereal, waffles, eggs, sausage, oatmeal, bagels, muffins, pastries.

title: Muy buena estancia en Manhattan.
text:
Hemos estado muy cómodos en este hotel. Todo muy limpio y las camas muy cómodas para un buen descanso. El personal nos atendió de maravilla, siempre dispuestos a ayudar con mucha amabilidad. El desayuno nos pareció correcto para empezar las jornadas intensas.
La ubicación del hotel es inmejorable, cerca de todo pero a la vez en una zona tranquila para descansar.
Nos gustó el detalle de las botellitas de agua y también las galletas cookies, limonada y café.
Sin duda volveremos.

title: Ottima soluzione
text: Ottimo hotel in ottima posizione, buona colazione abbastanza varia. Caffè tutto il giorno e biscotti poi se hai bisogno chiedi alla reception e ti aiutano qualsiasi cosa ti serva. Acqua ne davano ogni volta che la chiedevi, grande gentilezza delle ragazze alla reception. In caso di bisogno i bagagli vengono tenuti in hotel fino alla partenza in modo da dare la possibilità di girare liberi per la città. Camera estremamente pulita e sempre completa di tutto grazie alla nostra cameriera del piano Nora. Quando torno son certo che ritorno qui e lo consiglio molto. La camera era comoda e non sentivo gran rumore, forse perché tornavo solo per dormirci la notte e poi sveglia presto. Grazie di tutto e a presto...

title: Pleasant hotel near all the action with friendly staff
text: My daughters and I visited NYC for the US Open and stayed here for one night. We arrived early into the city around 9am on our train in grand central station. We were happy that the hotel was 3 blocks away as we knew we’d be doing a lot of travel through there. Upon arrival we were greeted by a very friendly staff. I told them we were checking in and they explained no rooms would be ready until later that day but they would gladly hold our luggage. The girl behind the desk was so impressed that my daughters only had one backpack each because she said most women need one bag for shoes, one for clothes and one for makeup. Lol. She also informed us that we were welcome to partake in the complimentary breakfast and use the bathrooms and gym if we wanted. We did grab some coffee and fruit but headed out for a bagel. When we finally got back to the hotel around 4pm to check in, we wee again greeted with smiles and friendliness by a different staff member. She retrieved our bags and directed us to the 14th floor. She also explained about free cookies and water bottles for guests. And then gave me a personalized bottle of water with my name on it. A little bit over the top behavior while doing so, but truly appreciated by me as it was nice to be treated so well. We hopped on the elevator, which had no issues as I read in other reviews and got to our floor pretty quick. Our room was around the corner and we were satisfied how clean the hallways were and especially our room. It’s a nice sized room for the city. Not really small at all. 2 double beds and an ok view of the city, mostly apartments though. The bathroom was extremely clean, only issue was the shower drain was slow to go down. But other than that it was fine. We called immediately for extra towels, sheets and blankets and they came fairly quick. After showers and relaxing for an hour we headed back out to the city. Got back around midnight and good to know you need your room card to enter the hotel after 11pm. Back in our room we slept well on the beds. Thought they were pretty comfortable. Next morning we went down to breakfast which was crowded but a good amount of seating. The staff tries to keep up with demand. Food was good for a free breakfast with waffle maker, eggs, breakfast meats, etc. When we left for the day for the US Open we asked where we could leave our bags and they said we could leave them there for free until midnight. This was great because luggage storage places charge $10 a bag. After a long day at the open we came back, got our bags quickly and headed for our train. It was a good hotel and exactly what we needed for what we’re doing. I highly suggest staying here.

title: non ci tornerei
text: lavori in corso presso l'hotel ,mattina sveglia presto.locali insufficienti per la colazione la mattina era impossibile fare colazione.assenza di frigo bar in camera.condizionatore rumorosoposizione interessante

title: Nice place to stay in NYC
text: Nice newer building in a very convenient, yet quiet location. Friendly staff greets you with a smile every day, a good hot breakfast at a fair price, I would definitely recommend this Hotel. Hampton does not disappoint.

title: Very friendly and accomodating staff
text: Rooms are typical NYC small, but the place is very clean (both room and common areas.)  To a person. every staff member greeted me with a smile and front desk was especially good with an early check-in request and making sure I was able to work while I waited.  Typical Hampton breakfast.  Price was great for the city.  Overall very pleased

title: Piacevole soggiorno
text:
L'hotel si trova in un'ottima posizione, comoda per la Grand Central Station. La nostra camera era confortevole, con letti comodi e una bella vista sul Chrysler Building. Abbiamo apprezzato la professionalità e cortesia del personale alla reception, e soprattutto la colazione compresa, ricca e varia. 
Inoltre trovare biscotti caldi appena sfornati, al rientro dai nostri giri per Manhattan era una vera coccola, così come anche l'acqua sempre a disposizione.
L'unica pecca è stata la pulizia quotidiana del bagno, che veniva fatta in modo un po' superficiale (mentre al nostro arrivo devo dire che sia la camera che il bagno erano molto puliti).
Ci torneremmo volentieri.

title: Excellent
text: The attention and the service received was excellent. The supremely friendly staff. Excellent location. The hotel is located near the central train station which facilitates mobility. The girls that are in the reception are excellent they help you in everything you need.

title: Friendly Place
text: the staff at the hotel was very helpful and friendly.  That on top of a nice, clean hotel in a great location - no brainer.  i would definitely stay here again.  The rooms a decent size for a NYC hotel so worth the cost.

title: Excellent .
text: We found this Hotel excellent. The location is ideal for exploring NYC. Staff make you feel very welcome and they worked tirelessly to make our stay memorable and comfortable. The complimentary breakfast was very welcome. Well Done and

title: Bestes Hotel für Sightseeingurlaub!
text:
Das Hotel ist sehr zentral gelegen - ca. 5 min zu Fuß zur Grand Central. Trotzdem ist es nachts sehr ruhig und man kann gut schlafen

Ausstattung hat mir auch sehr gut gefallen. Modern, aber schlicht. Dennoch alles was man braucht. Man hatte sogar ein Bügelbrett und Bügeleisen im Zimmer. Das Bett war riesig (1,80x2,10) und sehr sehr gemütlich.
Sauberkeit war auch überhaupt kein Problem. Das Zimmer wurde täglich geputzt und auch überall sonst war es sehr sehr sauber. 

Frühstück: typisch amerikanisch. Wenig gesundes, dafür der däftig. Nicht grade mein Fall, weil ich Georgiens gerne etwas gesundes esse, jedoch habe auch ich was gefunden. 

Service: top!!! Die Mitarbeiter sind alle sehr nett. Es gibt rund um die Uhr Kaffee, Tee, Kakao, zitronenwasser, normales Wasser und cookies umsonst. Wenn man eine Frage hat wird einem sehr freundlich weiter geholfen. 

Alles in allem war es ein sehr schöner Urlaub. Ich würde dieses Hotel jedem empfehlen und jeder Zeit wieder zurück kommen.

title: Very convenient location
text: We met friends here. They stayed several nights while we stayed only one. The main reason for choosing this property was its close proximity to Grand Central Station. The rooms were lovely, staff courteous and helpful, and the breakfast nice.

title: New York Vacation
text: Vacationing in NY and stayed at the Hamptons Inn at 43rd and Grand Central. The stay was wonderful. This hotel offers free wi-fi, delicious breakfast, free coffee and it is close to Grand Central Station, walking distance to Time Square, and Rockefeller Center.  I also love the added security of the hotel in that they lock the doors after 11:00 pm so you will need your room key to access the hotel. The location was simply perfect for us.  Thank you Hampton Inn for a wonderful visit.

title: New York Experience
text: Even though most taxi drivers that we met do not know about this hotel, they should.  For any business at the U.N. it is ideally situated.Plus the complimentary breakfast (superb) is almost reason enough to stay here.  Rooms are understandably small, but efficient and staff are friendly and helpful.

title: Great Experience
text: The two things that make this hotel are the staff and the location.  I cannot say enough good things about the staff and how they went above and beyond to help out, all the while with a smile and positive aura.  My family and I were only here for 1 night, but would return again.  Thanks again to the wonderful staff!

title: Buena ubicación
text: La ubicación es excelente y la limpieza también. Sin embargo, las habitaciones son pequeñas y el armario diminuto. El desayuno no corresponde con el precio que se paga (platos de papel, cubiertos de plástico y poca variedad).

title: Good place to stay in Manhattan
text: This hotel is in a good location, the rooms are clean, somewhat small but that is to be expected in Manhattan, and the staff are friendly. The breakfast is great, plenty of food and friendly staff. Good value.

title: CONFERMATO
text:
Di ritorno dopo 2 anni in mezzo la struttura conferma quanto detto: a Manhattan, per quanto pagato, non troverete di meglio.
I punti di forza: posizione, pulizia, buona colazione, wifi gratis.
Prima scelta.

title: Comfy stay - good value
text: Small room but very comfy and quiet, great quality linen and the pillows were amazing , good location and I very much enjoyed the buffet breakfast in the mornings , was a very nice touch of luxury after quite a while on the road. Best value for money I could find in Manhattan. The staff were friendly and helpful. Would recommend this hotel

title: Ottimo per visitare New York
text: Soggiornato 3 notti in questo hotel con 2 ragazzi adolescenti e siamo stati benissimo, ottima la posizione ed il prezzo, nel centro di Manhattan ad un costo veramente contenuto, colazione inclusa con scelta tra salato dolce, macchina per waffle apprezzatissima , caffè acqua e spuntino a disposizione tutto il giorno.. camere non modernissime ma sufficientemente ampie( 2 letti queen)e con ottimi prodotti per il bagno. Per visitare NY perfetto!

title: Good value for the price
text: Practical hotel, clean, good price for New York standard. Location is convenient (good public transports) but not charming at all. Rooms are clean and staff is efficient. Complimentary breakfast is a plus, even though it could be improved (very busy at early mornings which mad it impossible to reach for some of the items.

title: My Manhattan Experience
text: Great place to stay. Centrally located yet, quiet and peaceful. Getting around is so easy and hotel staff are most courteous. I certainly would recommend this place for discerning travellers who want a great place to stay in.

title: The Best!
text: Dashanda, at the Front Desk, was the Best! Everybody else was awesome, as well. We had a fantastic time. Free breakfast, clean room, great location with quick access to Grand Central Station and Not jam packed with tourists. Walk out the front door, look up, and Boom! There's the Legendary Chrysler Building. Too cool. They also provide little Brown-bag fruit and snack sacks, in the early morning, in case you are in a hurry to get somewhere. Details, details, details. We had a fantastic trip. Didn't want to leave, Man! Thanks

title: Una gradevole sorpresa per la mia famiglia
text: Lo staff eccezionale e competente, camera un pò piccola ma veramente comfortevole , colazione molto buona, eccezionale trovare sempre caffè, acqua fresca con cetrioli o agrumi e dei cookkies dopo una lunga giornata per tutta NY. Il prezzo e la location sono eccezionali considerando i prezzi altissimi e a volte davvero esagerati per qualsiasi cosa  a NY.

title: Comodo ed economico
text: Siamo stati in questo hotel in famiglia (2 adulti e 2 bambini) per 5 notti, confortati dalle buone recensioni. A due passi dalla fermata della metro Grand Central, è risultata una scelta vincente per visitare New York comodamente.Hotel che offre la colazione ed il cestino da asporto per la merenda....inimmaginabile a Manhattan dove tutto è carissimo. La stanza ampia e pulita, forse l'arredamento non sarà dei più moderni, ma posso dire che siamo stati benissimo e la pulizia era eccellente

title: Parfait!
text:
Nous avons passé 4 nuits début mais 2018. 

L'emplacement est parfait, juste à côté du grand central station, à environ 15/20 minutes à pied de times square. 
Nous avions une chambre de 4 personnes. Beaucoup d'espace, bonne literie, propre, calme, seul bémol la taille du lit, trop petit même pour un adulte et un enfant de 7 ans. 
Le petit déjeuner est très bon. Le personnel très accueillant.

title: Hospedagem inesperada
text: Fiquei hospedada por uma noite apenas, pois houve atraso no voo e perdi a conexão para o Brasil. Fiz a reserva pelo Booking.com no aeroporto e me dirigi ao Hotel, onde fui muito bem recebida pela atendente apesar do horário tardio. Solicitei late checkout e fui prontamente atendida. Quarto limpo e silencioso, ótima rouparia, banheiro com box. Bom café da manhã. Localização perfeita, há apenas alguns passos da Grand Central. Ótima experiência de hospedagem!

title: Muito bom
text: Com uma ótima localização perto de todo o movimento nova-iorquino e do metrô, quarto bem confortável, limpo e o café da manhã estilo americano com uma boa variedade, além de água, café, cookies disponíveis durante 24 horas e também máquina de gelo me deixaram muito satisfeito com a hospedagem. Com certeza voltaria e recomendaria a quem quer ficar no Grand Central!

title: Excelente opção
text:
Fiquei hospedada em agosto de 2018, em quarto duplo com duas camas de casal. A localização do hotel é fenomenal! Da pra fazer muita coisa a pé, diversos restaurantes e pontos turísticos próximos, inclusive o grand central que fica a dois quarteirões. O quarto é excelente, não tenho o que reclamar. Sempre muito limpo, camas confortáveis, chuveiro forte.
As funcionárias da recepção são muito simpáticas e sempre dispostas a ajudar, inclusive para quem tem dificuldade em falar inglês.
O café da manhã é estilo americano, mas até que varia um pouco. Se comparado a outros hotéis americanos, eh excelente!
Na recepção sempre tem água saborizada super gelada e uns cookies deliciosos. Além de café (que é delicioso)!!!
Recomendo muito! Quando voltar a NYC me hospedarei la novamente!

title: Good Location and Reasonable Amenities
text: I would recommend this hotel based on the location, i.e. Grand Central Terminal, the amenities such as a free breakfast, and for the help who are helpful and courteous.  One inconvenience was the inability to check in at arrival time which, I want to make clear, was BEFORE designated check-in time of 3:00, but it's a busy place and NYC afterall.

title: Great stay at Hampton Inn Manhatten
text: Front desk was awesome! They checked two very tired travelers who just rode all night on a bus from DC in at 0600 and allowed us to have the greatest weekend ever in NYC.  Central to all the downtown sites and close to the subway and not too far from the Bus Authority.  It is a typically superb Hilton property with all the accouterments.  Front Desk helpful in every way and although they were going through some renovations while we were there all clutter and confusion kept to a minimum.  The service is top notch I cannot say enough about the front desk service.

title: Outstanding Service
text: Great location. A walk to the UN, Grand Central and most midtown East locations. Free breakfast  was as expected. Great check in experience. Erika at the front desk is a gem! Every employee I interacted with during my stay made me feel welcome. The hotel is nice, but the staff is what makes it special.

title: Decepcionante hotel
text: La verdad, habiendo pagado más de 200 € por noche , el hotel decepciona. Sólo se salva la localización y la amabilidad de todo el personal, en especial de Erika. Habitación pequeña con baño correcto y caja de seguridad. El desayuno era muy básico, demasiado, y no estaba todo lo limpio que uno desea pues, al ser de tamaño muy reducido, siempre estaba lleno de gente.

title: Muy buena opcion en Manhattan
text: A pasos de la Estacion Central, la ONU, y las bocas de subte, a 15 minutos a pie de Times Square, y al lado de una oficina de Avis, lo que puede resultar muy conveniente,  buena opcion por precio y calidad, muy buena la atencion en recepcion, en especial de Erika, Las habitaciones son pequenas pero funcionales, a pedido, nos facilitaron una heladera. El desayuno es bueno, pero quizas no muy a tono con los gustos argentinos

title: Great location
text: This is in a great location one block off 42nd street and the Chrysler Building. Comes with free breakfast bar which is rare for the area. Very good choice especially for families. The 42nd St/Grand Central terminal is also a block and a half away which will pretty much take you anywhere in the city.

title: Prima prijs kwaliteit
text:
Prima schoon hotel. Gunstige ligging! Op loopafstand van Times Square. Dichtbij grand central, makkelijk ivm metro.
Ontbijt prima, alles aanwezig.  Vers fruit, sappen. 
Vriendelijk personeel / behulpzaam.

title: Great value - Stay at Hampton Inn Manhattan Grand Central 06/08 - 08/08
text:
I am not usually one to write a review but I do feel compelled to write one based on the royal treatment I received during my short stay, especially by a staff on duty- Rabiga. 

I had a rescheduled flight and had to spend an extra day. Needless to say the tension it caused me was quite palpable and the staff went out of their way to make me feel welcome. 

The simple gestures of professional courtesy and genuine concern to help made me feel at home and I would definitely be returning anytime I am in New York. 

Joy Meregini

title: Muy bien
text: Las habitaciones con dos camas dobles son válidas para 3 personas, para 4 un poco justo. Camas muy cómodas, buenas almohadas, aire acondicionado funciona muy bien, bien situado cerca de Grand Central, baño bien, buenos amenities, presión del agua excelente, personal muy amable y servicial. Hay caja fuerte y plancha y cafés pero no nevera. Desayuno correcto, algo de fruta, gofres, cereales, yogures, bollería... en el lobby siempre hay cookies y te, limonada... como puntos negativos lo fuerte que ponen el aire acondicionado en el desayuno por la mañana y que se tarda en bajar en los ascensores por la mañana. El resto muy bien.

title: Un hotel que cumple
text: Estuve con mis dos hijas y marido por 4 días , es un hotel que cumple perfecto para dormir . Está ubicado bastante central en Manhattan , en un lugar seguro a dos cuadras de la estación de trenes y a 15 minutos caminando de times square . Un desayuno correcto , buenas camas y personal amable

title: Buena ubicación, muy buen desayuno y habitaciones muy cómodas
text: Muy cómodo para viaje en pareja, no muy recomendado para familias numerosas, el desayuno es muy bueno! tiene un concepto reciclable, la ubicación esta a pocas cuadras de las mejores atracciones de NYC, locales de comida rápida muy cerca... no se arrepentirá.

title: Très bien situé
text:
Nous y avons passé 1 Semaine. L'hotel est très bien situé près de la gare centrale et toutes ses lignes de métro. La chambre était propre et correcte , la literie est tres bonne.
L'equipe est très accueillante et tres serviable.
Seul bémol le petit-déjeuner : tous les jours les mêmes choses et la salle trop exiguë

title: Great location, free breakfast, helpful staff
text: If you are going to New York for a few days or a week, you can't beat the combination of location and free breakfast.  The staff are super friendly and helpful.  The room was clean and recently updated.  The hotel is about a 4 minute walk to Grand Central Station, which has a great food court.  It's also within walking distance to Times Square and all the shopping on Fifth Avenue.  For a great variety of dining options, check out Ninth Avenue. The only drawback was that the breakfast room was a bit small during the high season and tables were scarce, and as there was only one person staffing the breakfast room, some items went a little longer than necessary to be refilled.

title: Velmi spokojeni - úžasný personál
text:
Hotely jsou v NY na každém kroku, ale zde návštěvu bezproblému zopakujeme. Přijeli jsme první den dopoledne, kdy jsme již NEMĚLI nárok na snídani. Paní recepční se hned postaraly, aby nám ještě udělali sólo snídani jenom pro nás (vajíčka, párky, palačinky). Check-in byl na 15:00, ale oba pokoje nám dali už kolem 11:00.
Pokoje jsou menší, ale příjemné a dostačující. My jsme měli pokoj ve 20 patře z 21 s výhledem na Chrysler Building. 
Na recepci je 24/7 domácí limonáda v kuchyňce si můžete kdykoliv udělat kávu / čaj.

Hotel se nachází cca 3 minuty chůze od Grand Central Terminal. V blízkosti hotelu je vše potřebné. Nakupovat jsme chodili do Morton Williams Supermarket cca 10 min. chůze, ale menší obchody jsou i blíže. Jeden tip, pro všechny kteří se zde ubytují - cca  max. 1 minutu chůze směrem Grand Central je pizza 99 Cetns. Tu určitě nevynechejte - jeden velký klínek stojí 99c a dochucujete si sami dle potřeby. Výborné.

Celkově jsme byli velmi spokojeni.

title: מלון מצוין לחופשה במנהטן
text:
הצוות, המיקום, החדר, המחיר יחסית - מרוצים מאד מהבחירה, יצאנו עם טעם של עוד.
הצוות: עזרו בכל דבר, אדיבים מאד
המיקום: גישה קרובה לרכבת תחתית, מרחק הליכה מ Times square
החדר: מספיק גדול להסתובב בנוחיות, נקי ומטופח.

title: Erika and her colleagues are wonderful
text: Good breakfast and great location for UN meetings This is the fourth time in a row that i have used this hotel Particularly helpful staff - i especially commend Erika - biscuits are terrific and all day coffee

title: Great place and location
text:
The rooms are very nice.  The location of the hotel is close to many of the NYC attractions.  We walked to Times Square in about 30 minutes.  Breakfast is included and that is a savings. Overall very nice.

Deshanda and the front desk was great to work with...In the NYC fast paced environment we as guests come in after fighting traffic, crowds,etc don’t always take time to appreciate the small things.  She is funny, welcoming and helpful…  
And help us guests to also smile and laugh.

title: Was the worst stay we have ever had.... and over the Macy's Day Fireworks....
text: My family stayed at this hotel for the macy's day fireworks and were going to stay for a week. We checked in. One of the elevators wasn't working. They said this happens a lot. So we were waiting a bit to get to our room on the 18th floor. We got to our room, Immediately put the Do not disturb sign on the door, we do this at EVERY hotel we go to. and it stays there til we check out. we ask for fresh towels when we need them, we clean the room as we need it to be to our standard, I don't want housekeepers going through our things which we have had done before, we have had electronics and things come up missing before, hence the reason the DND was on the door. We left to eat, and came back, the other elevator stopped worked and the one that was messed up before was very slow and our keys weren't working on the door. we had to go down to the desk to get our keys taken care of.... they gave us warm cookies, water and new keys. The next day, we went to breakfast went back up to our room and yet again our keys were having problems. We had to go back down to the desk and tell her this was a problem. She gave us new keys again and we got ready to leave for the day. We put the Do Not Disturb sign on the Door and went to leave. The front desk agent agent wanted to know if her engineer could go in the room to look at the door. I told her yes, But only he was authorized in the room. I made a point to say that OUT LOUD. we can back to the hotel. Again there was only 1 elevator working again and the other was REALLY SLOW AND THERE WAS A LINE, we get up to our room, and our KEY DOESN'T WORK. we have to go get new keys again. When we get into our room, housekeeping had been in our room. they had moved all of our luggage, put all of our prescription medications back in our medication bags, in the wrong bags (which mind you should have NEVER BEEN TOUCHED) they moved my laptop and camera equipment off of the bed to make the bed putting all of that on top of a really high cabinet. When I call down to the front desk, she argues with me telling me she checked with the housekeeper and the housekeeper told her the DND sign was on the suitcase when she went in the room. The engineer had been in the room before them. She continued to call me a lier and that her staff was right and that what I said didn't matter because what her staff said flew. I had to start taking videos everyday that we left after that of the DND being in the door along with one of my kids phones in it showing dates and times everytime we left the hotel. And everytime we came back to the hotel they had to make us new keys and there were a few times they had to let us in with a master key because even the keys they gave us didn't work. We ended up checking out of the hotel 3 days early after all of the headache. I WILL NEVER GO BACK TO THIS PLACE AND I DON'T RECOMMEND IT TO ANYONE ELSE. I HAVE NOT GOTTEN AN APOLOGY FROM THEM. All I got was arguments that they were right and my entire family and the family (who we didn't even know that was in the room next to us) was wrong

title: Hampton a New York
text: Hotel con pregi, a partire dal rapporto qualità/prezzo. Posizione perfetta, a pochi passi dal Grand Central Terminal, Times Square e Nazioni Unite. Ottima scelta per visitare New York, anche o soprattutto se si viaggia in famiglia

title: Good sleep, close to subways
text: My daughter and I stayed 3 nights for a girls weekend. The front desk put me in a quiet room at my request and were very friendly as we passed plus held our luggage. The lobby offers iced water and a sofa with good wifi. We liked our room and the breakfast started our days perfectly. We would stay again.

title: Très très bien
text:
Localisation idyllique en midtown, pour de très bons marcheurs l’ile pourrait s’envisager à pied! Nous n’avons pris le métro que 3-4 fois sur une semaine. Moult restaurants aux alentours. Un accueil qui frôle la perfection par sa gentillesse, sa disponibilité, pour chacun de ses membres. Des petits plaisirs très appréciables : boissons chaudes et froides, coockies, bouteilles d’eau à l’acceuil. 
Que dire de plus, tellement de choses, resumables en un « bravo à cette équipe souriante, en toute circonstance » et merci car vous avez contribué au bilan bien plus qu’agreable de notre séjour.
Hope to see u again
Paul

title: Spark
text: The rooms  were clean. The service was great. The rooms were a good size. The breakfast was good. Warm cookies welcomed us home each day. The staff was very helpful. The stay exceeded our expectations! We will stay with them again.

title: Great location, small rooms
text: Great location - sites and subways all close.  Very small and dark rooms.  Bedside lights not bright enough, a common occurrence at hotels trying to cut costs at the expense of your eyesight.  Staff very helpful.  But key card failed on two occasions.  Very frustrating since there are only two, slow elevators.

title: Enjoying our stay
text: Great hotel tucked away in the city! The staff has been very welcoming and accommodating. The hotel is clean.  The breakfast was good.  And the kids and husband always go straight for the cookies when we get back from an outing!

title: Great location & friendly staff!
text: We thoroughly enjoyed our stay and will definitely stay at the Hampton Inn Manhattan Grand Central the next time we are visiting NYC!  Quiet hotel within walking distance of Grand Central Station.  Very friendly and helpful staff.

title: Loved the hotel
text: I absolutely loved the hotel and it’s staff. Such friendly, professional, and caring individuals that work here. They are always ready to go the extra mile for you. The room was perfect, first and foremost cleanliness was top notch, bed was comfy. I would definitely stay at The Hampton Inn Manhattan Grand Central my next trip into the city.

title: Great location
text: We, two adults and two children, 12 and 14, stayed here for 4 nights. The staff were very helpful and friendly. The room was very small, two double beds, and the bathroom had a sliding door which didn’t close properly so little privacy. Breakfast was fine. Best thing was the location which is 5 mins walk to Grand Central, 15 mins to Times Square and about 30 mins walk to Central Park. For New York, the hotel was relatively quiet as well. Good value.

title: Love the friendly staff!!!!
text: All of the ladies at the front desk go above and beyond when it comes to being friendly and helpful! I've stayed 4 times and I'll be back! I would go back just to see them:) The breakfast is top notch and all of the staff there are so helpful too! I would highly recommend! Just save me a room. Anthony Fletcher

title: Friendly and completely ineffective staff
text:
Biggest issue is standing in line each time my key doesn't open the door.  Clearly there is something wrong with the mechanism, yet each time I return (with one exception when it worked) I get a new key, or two new keys, or someone to accompany me to my room and marvel at the fact that the door doesn't open.  Maintenance has been up twice.  Bottom line is that the friendly staff have no issue at all seeing a guest in line 3 or 4 times per day waiting to ask for help to get into his room.

When I booked I got a lovely message saying I could choose my room and get a digital key on my phone.  I've done this at other Hilton properties and kind of like the perk that one gets as a gold card holder with them.  This time my room was changed, I could no longer get a room with a king sized bed (sorry folks, I am quite tall and the only beds long enough are King, otherwise I sleep diagonally or with feet hanging over - like now!).  Ahh, and the digital key has never arrived.  I asked and they offered yet another physical key.

In sum, terribly frustrating to not be bale to enter my room.  No other options offered at all - like maybe changing rooms?? fixing the door mechanism (which, by the way, lights up green and makes an audible noise - yet the handle swings without engaging or opening anything).
I am not one to raise my voice or to be rude yet yesterday I was very rude (no raised voice) as I can no longer deal with the sweet smile and the" I am so sorry that happened again".
Whether business or pleasure, unless you want your day ruined by offers that do not actually come true and wasting 15 to 20 minutes of your time each time you just want in your room - look for any other hotel.
Hilton, you've just lost a gold card member by promising much more than you can deliver.
Frustrated and bothered in NYC.

title: Rooms fine, but poor service at front desk
text: SLOW check in. Hilton offers early check in on line, BUT IT DOES NOT SPEED UP THE CHECK IN PROCESS WHEN YOU ARRIVE AT HOTEL. Checked in on line saturday, then had to wait till 330 on sunday for room. Even thoung i came by at 1:30 and front desk ssid just a short wait. Feather free room not ready as reserved either. Almost cancelled and went elsewhere.

title: A Recommander sans hésiter !
text:
Nous avons passé une semaine en famille (4 personnes) dans cet hôtel. 
Rien à redire au niveau prix/prestation:
-localisation au top :situé a 5 minutes à pieds de Gran Central Terminal. Nous sommes dans les premiers à descendre des navettes en venant de JFK :-).
-Le personnel est souriant, tjrs disponible et accueillant. Des boissons et délicieux cookies sont a disposition tte la journée.
Salle Internet avec imprimante pour imprimer les boarding du retour très pratique.
-les chambres sont climatisées et très propre.
-le petit dejeuner est varié et copieux ( manque peut etre un peu de charcuterie )
A reserver sans Hésiter :-) 🇫🇷🇱🇷❤

title: Family vacay
text: The staff, the hotel, location --all  was perfect.  The staff went above and beyond for any of our requests.  Dashonda had a huge smile, always encouraging words, and that wonderful bottle of water for us when we came and went.  (It was extremely hot the week we were in NYC. )  The free breakfast is more than adequate. they even have breakfast bags if you are in a hurry!     The location is perfect.  Two blocks from Grand Central station and plenty of eating places within walking distance.   We will definitely stay here again when coming into NYC.

title: Pamela G.
text: Staff were friendly, we were welcomed with warm cookies and flavored water. Our rooms were clean and bed was comfortable. Train station and bus stop within close walking distance. They served either sausage or bacon each day, scrambled eggs or omelets. On the weekend served hash browns. You could make waffles, Had a variety of juices, fruit and yogurt. The staff were all nice there was not one negative employee. Very; professional and well ran establishment!!!

title: Great location, welcoming staff, wonderful breakfast
text: We have stayed in this hotel several times over the last few years. Our most recent stay was this past week-end. Each time we were very happy with our stay. The staff welcomes you with a genuine,warm smile (Thank you Erika!). This time we were also welcomed by freshly made iced tea and warm cookies. The rooms are consistently clean and comfortable. There is a rich selection for breakfast and tea/coffee is always available throughout the day. We also love the location. It is close enough to walk to Grand Central, Time Square and the Musicals, but far enough from the noise of the streets. We love that we have found a nice place like this to go back to each time we visit NYC and recommend this hotel without reservations.

title: COMODO MA LA COLAZIONE.....
text: A New York in hotel, normalmente, ci vai per dormire e fare colazione. Qui le camere sono ok e l'hotel è in posizione ottima per i servizi e il metro. Ma la colazione è davvero un disastro o quasi. A rimini in hotel di 2 stelle ti trattano meglio. Se poi hai la sfortuna di soggiornare nel weekend è meglio rinunciare e uscire a cercare qualcosa all'esterno. Pochi posti a sedere, sporco, confusione, tutto, o quasi, confezionato, qualità dei prodotti di bassissimo livello. Gli albergatori di New York sono davvero degli approfittatori: paghi 200 dollari una notte e ti offrono una colazione che a loro costera' si e no 3 dollari. Davvero scandaloso

title: Great Place to stay in NYC
text: This hotel was very nice.  Staff are friendly and helpful.  There is a decent continental breakfast that is part of your stay.  Nothing exciting, but it works.  The room was clean and the bed comfy.  After spending the day sightseeing in the city it was a welcome relief.  My son especially appreciated the warm cookies they put out in the lobby along with complimentary water.  They also have complimentary tea and coffee all day.  The business center was great and the computers were running easily.  I could print off our flight tickets easily.  The location is perfect.  They have a little courtyard out front with tables and chairs to lounge around in.  It is near Grand Central Terminal where you can easily catch the subway to be on your way.  It is also up the street from the United Nations.  The hotel is down a side street so the noise level was minimal.  That included the construction noise 2 doors down.  We loved our stay here.

title: Fine location
text:
This hotel is very nice; staff is friendly and helpfull. 
Espescially Erika helped us with a smile every time.
Breakfast is ok to start your day in New York City
Its located very close to Central Station and from there you can take de subway.

title: Una de los mejores hoteles que he visitado
text: Grandísima elección, magnífica ubicación y buen servicio. El desayuno muy completo. Todo el hotel muy limpio y con todos los servicios para pasar una semana más que agradable. Hay que destacar el trato dado por Erika en recepción, nos ha ayudado con la mejor predisposición posible y siempre con una sonrisa. UN AUTÉNTICO PLACER. Espero volver

title: Verygood hotel.  The room attendant : Seneba have prepared room in advance.
text:
非常好的酒店。 位置很便利，大堂有自助照相，很喜人。
一楼行政酒廊配早晚餐，很方便。
另外，对希尔顿会员很优待， 会员提出的合理要求，酒店都会尽量满足。

title: 4 de julio
text: Excelente ubicacion para ver los fuegos artificiales de Macys el 4 de julio.A 6 minutos del East River.Terminal Grand Central a minutos.Al hacer el check inn el caballero fue poco amable.Excelente desayuno.

title: Friendliest staff
text: The location is great, The room and bathroom are good, I have  stayed for work and the staff was extremelly kind with me! They have helped me in the business center and with a late check out! Thanks Rabiga and Imelda!

title: Bel hôtel très bien situé
text:
Les chambres ne sont pas énormes mais l'espace est amplement suffisant.  Nous y avons séjourné pendant 6 nuits au début juillet. L'accueil est impeccable et le personnel très sympathique.
Les chambres sont très propres et la litterie est excellente.
Le petit déjeuner est plutôt complet avec un peu de tout. Les assiettes sont en carton et les couverts en plastique mais on s'y fait. La qualité des préparations (œufs, saucisses, pâtisserie, gâteaux, fruits, ...) est correcte sans plus. Il y a beaucoup de monde si vous vous levez un peu tard, il vaut mieux y aller avant 8h. Le buffet est régulièrement rechargé
La situation à 4 min de Gran Central est idéale. Toutes les lignes de métro y passent, ce qui permet de parcourir la ville sans trop changer de voies, un vrai plus.
Seul petit point négatif, il n'y a pas de vue sur la ville. Si votre agence vous demande un supplément pour ça, refusez car ça n'en vaut vraiment pas la peine.
Dernier point très positif (surtout lorsqu'il fait très chaud), vous pouvez demander autant de bouteilles d'eau que vous en souhaitez et il y a du café et du thé à disposition toute la journée et à volonté !

title: Lage gut, Preis-Leistungs-Verhältnis na ja ...
text:
Zimmer befand sich in der 21. Etage. Bei den umgebenden Häusern kam eher Kellercharakter auf. Zimmer war relativ klein, Bad ebenfalls, Klimaanlage im Zimmer nervig laut. Das Hotel könnte mal wieder ein Komplettrenovierung vertragen. 
Frühstück typisch amerikanisch einfach. 
Hervorzuheben ist die Lage. Nahe Grand Central und damit verkehrsgünstig und nicht weit zu den Attraktionen. Trotz der Lage würden wir dieses Hotel nicht noch einmal buchen.

title: Non le manca nulla
text:
Siamo stati in questo hotel per sei notti  e devo dire che siamo stati davvero bene fin dal primo memento siamo stati accolti con un sorriso dalla ragazza della reception che devo dire che sono stati tutti davvero gentili sia le ragazze della cucina al mattino sia il personale all’ingresso,forniscono acqua e sacchetto per la merenda al mattino prima di partire per le grandi camminate e quando si torna si trova sempre acqua fresca con limone o arancia a disposizione di tutti in più nella sala colazione caffè the camomilla sempre a disposizione .
La camera sempre in ordine e pulita con prodotti neutrogena per lavarsi sempre riforniti tutte le mattine. Presente la cassaforte e la macchinetta per caffè noi eravamo all ottavo piano e riuscivamo a vedere il craisler.
Colazione non molto varia ma con molte cose soprattutto salate come uova hamburger Beacon 
La posizione e comoda per visitare New York sia in metro per la vicinanza a Central station sia a piedi a20 minuti da time Square.
Lo consiglio assolutamente !!

title: Mi tercera visita y iría siempre a este hotel
text: Todo el equipo de personas hacen un hotel un hogar, les agradezco a cada uno la cordial bienvenida y despedida que te hacen sentir mas que un cliente, voy a ir lo mas pronto posible ya que se disfruta mucho gracias a ellos

title: It was an enjoyable trip
text: This Hotel offers excellent cost-benefit. An extended continental breakfast. The Hotel's staffs are very friendly and helpful. The Hotel is close to the United Nations, and very closely to the Grand Central station, so, you can go from there to somewhere by subway.

title: Rude Greeter/bellman
text: On the 3rd night of stay I awoke to no hot water. It was ice cold. I was on vacation so no big deal. I went on had breakfast about an hour and a half later i tried again. Still no hot water. I went down to ask if it was a normal thing thinking they just ran out. I had a very friendly matiness man who talked to me and told me he was working on boilers. I said oh perfect thankyou and went to walk to elevator as the receptionist stops me and said next time just call down. I explained to her that I couldn't get a dial tone on the phone so she told me how and we laughed and I jokingly said I wouldn't of came down in my pjs if I figured it out. We both laughed again and the greeter jumped in and said very rudely

title: Best value, friendliest staff, decent rooms
text: I have stayed here for work consistently for the past 4-5 years.  The staff could not be more attentive and friendly.  It's like a home away from home -- to the extent a Hampton Inn can be.  The rooms are typically NYC small, but comfortable, quiet, cool, and clean.  Easy 2-block walk to Grand Central.

title: Great times in NYC
text: Fun Times in NYC.  There were 6 couples staying at your hotel.  We all enjoyed our stay. The staff was friendly and helpful and the location was walkable to all your points.  I will be returning next year!

title: vacanza
text: Ho soggiornato in qs hotel una settimana con la mia famiglia che dire .....siamo stati benissimo camera quadrupla spaziosa e pulita, bagno fornito di prodotti Neutrogena, colazione buona e varia! Lo consiglio vivamente!

title: The Best Little Hampton Inn in Manhattan
text: This hotel happens to be the perfect location for me, being just a block-and-a-half from Grand Central Terminal.  But the reason I keep coming back here is the wonderful staff.  They are cheerful, helpful, and thoughtful... just all-stars!  The hotel rooms are smallish, but nice and always clean.  I cannot recommend this place enough for those looking for a mid-range hotel with free breakfast and wi-fi.

title: Friendly staff, nice hotel
text:
At the reception they are friendly and helpful. Our room was 1005, on the 10th floor, in front, we did not suffer from street noise. Quiet room.
Breakfast, you can make waffles yourself, there are donuts, slices of bread, eggbread, sausages, bacon, potatoes, milk, yoghurt, muesli, really basic and American.
The places are limited and the tables are not cleaned up quickly, so that many places are unavailable at times.
This hotel is definitely recommended in terms of quality / price.

Aan de receptie is men vriendelijk en behulpzaam. Onze kamer was 1005, op de 10e verdieping, vooraan, we hadden geen last van straatlawaai. Rustige kamer.
Ontbijt, je kan zelf wafels bakken, er zijn donuts, sneetjes grof brood, eierkoek, worstjes, spek, aardappeltjes, melk, yoghurt, muesli, wel echt basic en Amerikaans.
