De plaatsen zijn beperkt en de tafels worden niet snel opgeruimd/opgekuist zodat soms vele plaatsen onbeschikbaar zijn. 
Dit hotel is wat betreft de kwaliteit/prijs zeker aan te bevelen.

At the reception they are friendly and helpful. Our room was 1005, on the 10th floor, in front, we did not suffer from street noise. Quiet room.
Breakfast, you can make waffles yourself, there are donuts, slices of bread, eggbread, sausages, bacon, potatoes, milk, yoghurt, muesli, really basic and American.
The places are limited and the tables are not cleaned up quickly, so that many places are unavailable at times.
This hotel is definitely recommended in terms of quality / price.

title: Great location
text:
Hotel is in a great location very close to Grand Central station - within two blocks.
Rooms are quite small but typical for a city. Clean and equipped with everything you need.
Complimentary breakfast was good and staff very friendly and helpful.
Would stay again and recommend

title: clean and friendly staff
text: very clean and modern room. multiple outlets for charging, for a nyc hotel i was amazed how much storage there was. bathroom was modern and perfect size. staff was super friendly, even giving me alot of extra water when asked!  would stay here again!

title: Great location
text: We just returned from a 5 day stay at this very nice hotel in Midtown Manhattan. The hotel is very clean and comfortable. Like all New York hotels, the rooms are small but are well equipped with king bed, desk, iron, etc. Bathrooms have showers, no tub, which I prefer. I had birthday during our stay and the hotel staff decorated our room and provided snacks, this was very nice. The breakfast every morning had a something for everyone, both hot and cold options. There is a business center and fitness room. The location is ideal, a long block from Grand Central Station and very close to the U.N. Building. It was very quiet at night. There are a number of restaurants within a couple of blocks for dinner after a long day of sightseeing. Every employee here was very friendly and helpful. I would definitely stay here again!

title: Good Find
text: We were fortunate to find this hidden gem conveniently located near Grand Central on a quiet street.  Front desk staff were very friendly and welcoming.  Room was comfortable and large by NYC standards.  My only complaint is that the breakfast room was terribly understaffed.  Trash was overflowing from the receptacles, and the coffee and certain breakfast items ran out and weren’t being refilled fast enough. Otherwise, it was a great stay.

title: Clean, near subway and with bfast
text:
Hotel is near to grand central station (just 2block away). Room is clean. For the price I paid is pretty reasonable and it comes with breakfast and hotel provides free hot beverages. 
Staff is friendly too.

title: Great Stay in NYC
text: This is a perfect location - 2 blocks east of Grand Central.  The hotel is small and tall - just 8 rooms per floor, but meticulously maintained and nicely appointed.  Rooms are tight, but on par with NYC hotels.  The staff are all professional and friendly.  I would count this among my favorite go-to hotels in NYC!

title: Everything OK
text: All good in this very well located hotel. Staff was awesome...always there to help and with a great smile. Great Breakfast and they even gave you a Goddie Bag to go. Everything in the room was nice and neat.

title: Ubicación, instalaciones, limpieza y atención. No se puede pedir mas
text:
La ubicación es muy buena, a pocos metros de Grand Central pero en una calle tranquila y sin ruidos. El hotel está muy bien y muy limpio. El desayuno es excepcional, variado y rico. El personal, en general, muy amable y los señores de al lado de recepción que te ayudan con las maletas son encantadores. Cogimos la habitación con cama extra (no sé cómo son las demás) así que hablo de ella: era amplia, el baño con todo lo necesario incluido secador. Tenían plancha en la habitación para la ropa, no faltaba detalle. El aire acondicionado es muy bueno y funcional.
Tiene café, té y zumos todo el día a gusto. Wifi gratis. 
Como única pega: la iluminación de la habitación, era escasa.

title: Great Hospitality and customer service!
text:
I stay at Hampton Inn Grand Central every time I am in NYC due to his location. The hosts are very friendly and helpful. The rooms are small but very clean and include Hilton standard amenities (no fridge though...)
I highly recommend this hotel.

title: Voltando a NY
text: Ótimo hotel, muito bem localizado em rua calma de pouco trânsito, muito comércio em volta e perto das atrações, café da manhã impecável, faltou frigobar no quarto, atendimento atencioso e simpático, voltaremos!

title: Fully functional hotel in a great location
text: The hotel packs all the standard amenities in a narrow Manhattan footprint. The staff were especially pleasant and helpful. The room was comfortable, the balcony allowed for plenty of fresh air. Midtown location was another plus.

title: Best hotel ever
text: The staff was fantastic. I actually appreciate the room. We were 4 people and the room was nice for us. No too much privacy, but was nice and neat. At the front desk everybody was super nice and friendly. Breakfast was nice too. The service was decent and she was working very hard to have everything under control and help everyone. Thank you so much to everyone to make us feel comfy

title: “Security Deposit”??
text:
First, kudos to the excellent housekeeping staff. The room was beyond spotless. The housekeeping staff was also very friendly. Unfortunately I can’t say the same about the front desk staff. In fact, if I were basing this review solely on the front desk – at check in as well check out – the hotel but rate no better than a two.

Upon checking in, the somewhat robotic front desk clerk did not greet me or acknowledge me other than asking for credit card and ID. She then immediately told me that a $25/day hold would be put on my credit card for a “security deposit.” I asked why, and she answered, “It’s what we do.” So that was strange. It was only as I was walking away with the room key that she “welcomed” me as a Hilton Honors member and gave me a warm bottle of water with sticky remnants where a label had once been. 

The check out experience was equally odd and unfriendly. I said I was checking out and placed by room key folder on the counter. The woman working the desk did not look up for a very long time, and finally glanced at me and said, “You’re all set” and went back to whatever she was doing. No “How was your stay?” No “Thank you for staying with us” or “Have a good trip.” No offer of a receipt. 

I know that Hampton Inn is Hilton budget chain, but one would expect basic courtesy from the front desk. The mysterious “security deposit” should also be disclosed when reserving. 

The room size was fine; the location convenient. But I will go back to staying at the better and friendlier Hilton Garden Inns in the future.

title: Good overall package
text: The hotel provided everything that I look for - a clean, well-maintained room, friendly and helpful staff, good internet connection that doesn't come at an eye-watering price, and a decent gym. The breakfast buffet was a bonus, but I only used it once during my four days to grab a banana and a yogurt. I'd certainly have visited the buffet more often if they had a protein bar/smoothie/powder option and a high bran cereal in their selection (I stopped eating Froot Loops a long time ago!). The front desk staff were helpful with my internet connection and directions. I felt like I could have asked for just about anything and would have been taken care of by them.

title: Convenient and comfortable
text: From the moment we walked in, our experience was delightful. The staff seemed to go out of their way to be helpful. The room was great, the breakfast selection was much larger than anticipated, and it was quite pleasant to have beverages available all the time. Plus, they had cookies in the afternoon!

title: Awesome location and great stafff
text:
Nice hotel in great spot to get to all the tourist spots in NYC.  Only a 5 minute walk to central station that can get you everywhere! 
Staff was awesome and beds super comfy.  Small rooms but good enough for just sleeping anyway!

title: Excelente opción
text: Muy bien ubicado . Excelente atención de todo el personal. Preocupación de todos ellos  para satisfacer al huésped. Compromiso e interés del personal en resolverte las inquietudes y dudas que van surgiendo

title: Buena opción en Manhattan
text: Es un hotel bien ubicado, limpio y funcional. Sino sin lujos ni pretensiones pero con personal muy amable que se esmera por que uno la pase bien.  Lo único criticable no sólo de este hotel sino de la cadena, es que los desayunos se sirven en platos desechables, muy poco sustentable.

title: Great location, friendly staff
text: The staff was very friendly and the location was excellent, just two blocks from Grand Central Station and close to many attractions and restaurants.  The only negative was the hard beds, but bearable.

title: Excelente atención
text: Estuvimos alojados con mi esposa algunos dias en este hotel. Super bien ubicado y con un desayuno muy completo y con todo delicioso y fresco. Ademas, cafe gratis todo el dia. El personal es de lo más amable y atento a resolver los problemas que puedan surgir, y todo con una sonrisa. Mención especial oara Erica quien con su actitud extraordinariamente positiva y su sonrisa, hace salir el sol para el huesped en media lluvia. Y, tambien mamá Imelda, quien resuelve todo de manera eficiente y super amable.

title: Perfect Location
text: We mostly appreciated the location of the hotel in the centre of Manhattan, very close to the Grand Central Terminal. Most of the places in Manhattan were reachable by foot for us and it was safe to hang around at night as well. The staff in the hotel was very nice and friendly, the receptionists were professional and very helpful as they helped us with everything we asked for. The only thing we were dissatisfied with was the plastic dish the breakfast was served from. However, we could fully recommend the stay at this hotel.

title: Excellent Stay!
text: We were 4 ladies, enjoying a long weekend in NYC! This hotel exceeded our expectations! The staff was friendly and helpful and always in a kind and happy mood and willing to answer our questions about the city! We felt very welcome! The room was clean and we enjoyed breakfast and the complimentary tea, coffee and juice available 24/7. The location was great, and we were able to walk or take the subway from Grand Central Station to all of our destinations. We would all stay here again!

title: Holiday of a lifetime
text:
Perfect location for everything to see and do in NYC. Staff are excellent, breakfast was amazing - the waffles and bagels were the perfect start to the day.  The 99 cents pizza across the road was life changing.
Only 5 mins walk to grand central station and 15 to Times Square.
Could not recommend it enough. Perfect for families. Thank you!! From the Juggins family.

title: Good hotel
text: The location is perfect, breakfast is good, staff are friendly and helpful. Few minutes walk to Grand Central station and is easy to move around New York. Response from room service is fast, but due to the standard check out policy, we were unable to delay our check out time.

title: Friendly front desk
text:
The staff at the front desk are very firendly and helpful, especially Dashanda !
I also like the breakfast here, simple but it changes everyday, and includes hot items/meat. I'll definitely be back at this hotel!

title: Loved it!
text: the location was awesome, the property was neat and tidy, the staff were very caring. NYC rooms are on the smaller side, but they made good use of the space. The breakfast was really good, we stayed over Memorial Day weekend and they served breakfast later than usual, which was really nice.

title: Perfect experience
text: The location was great. It is just over 3 blocks from Grand Central. So even though I have mobility problems, I could walk from the subway station. The staff is superb—offering us free bottles of water and even coming out from their work station to open the door for us. Breakfast was wonderful—quite a variety of food.

title: Best treatment ever!
text: From the minute we walked in the hotel all the staff were super nice and helpful. We were never treated as good as in here. Especially Erika who also makes the best chocolate chip cookies, every day you have fresh baked cookies. You also have coffee and bottles of water 24/7. The hotel is very clean and the rooms are big. Breakfast is amazing and the location is perfect. We stayed for 3 nights and we will definitely going to come back every time we will visit NYC. Very very recommended hotel!

title: Best Birthday Ever
text: This hotel is awesome.  Bonna, Michelle, Erika, and Rosalba made my birthday special.  I have never been to a hotel where the staff sang happy birthday and presented birthday goodies.  Every day I was greeted with a smile.  The hotel is clean, the breakfast is nice, the rooms are cozy, and the staff is top notch.

title: Super Lage und alle sehr freundlich
text: Die Lage ist super - man kann sehr viel zu Fuß erreichen und über die Central Station ist man auch mit vielen Subway Linien sehr gut angebunden. Das Personal ist außergewöhnlich freundlich und fröhlich. Check-In und Check-Out war super schnell erledigt. Die Zimmer sind - typisch für New York - nicht sonderlich groß, allerdings sehr gepflegt und sauber - vor allem auch das Bad. Wir hatten ein King Zimmer im 7. Stock mit Blick zur Straße. Weiter oben ist sicherlich besser, um bei geöffnetem Fenster den Straßenlärm nicht zu hören. Erfreulicherweise gab es auch einen Safe im Zimmer. Als Frühstück (von 6-10 Uhr) gibt es ein klassisches Hampton Inn Frühstück - es ist also alles da, was man braucht. Auch die Anzahl der Sitzplätze im Frühstücksbereich ist gut - zwar immer gut besucht, aber man findet immer einen Platz. Kaffee/Tee gibt es den ganzen Tag kostenlos. Business Center und Fitness Raum sind im Keller untergebracht. Preis-/Leistungsverhältnis ist für New York gut.

title: Great Customer Service and Awesome Location
text: The staff at this hotel--especially Erika, whose nametag said "happy day"--were consistently top notch, always offering a friendly hello when coming and going.The breakfast choices (cheese omelets, scrambled eggs, oatmeal, sausage links/ham/bacon, granola, bagels, yogurt, fruit, pastries, etc ) were consistently great--this was so much more than just a simple muffin and coffee continental breakfast. This location was generally quiet and a bit off the beaten track; it was also only two blocks away from Grand Central Terminal, which served as a great spot to catch a number of different subway lines and a bite to eat in the large food court. Our room was comfortable and the bathroom was well maintained. One final plus: chocolate chip cookies were served at various times each day, and it was nice treat to have one after a busy day of sightseeing. If I travel to NYC again, I would definitely stay at this hotel--it's a great value and a great location!

title: Excellent choice
text:
The hotel is very good, very well located and offers a wonderful hot breakfast.  The rooms are nice with good mattress, pillows and shower.  But, the best of all is the staff.  I travel a lot and never got such a nice personal.  Happy, kind and helpful people.  Congratulations and thank you for making our stay even better  Oh, and not to forget, they offer the best cookie in town.   
Patricia Fraga - Rio de Janeiro - Brasil

title: Trip to New York
text: The staff were very pleasant and professional. In particular, Erika...she had the best attitude...helpful, attentive, humorous and friendly.  Our room was clean, a little small (but to be expected for NYC).  Breakfast was ok, coffee was hot and fresh 24/7. Location was excellent. Enjoyed our stay, and will definitely stay there again when we come back in July.

title: מלון פשוט ונחמד
text: למי שמגיע לטייל במנהטן ולא רוצה לקרוע את הכיס. החדר נקי ופונקציונלי, הצוות חביב.ארוחת בוקר פשוטה. זה שהמלון קרוב מאוד לתחנת הגרנד סנטרל, מוסיף מאוד לנוחיות. וגם לשדרה החמישית. נתנו לנו את החדר בבוקר...הרבה לפני הצ'ק אין והשתדלו לעזור שנהעה מרוצים.

title: Ottimo Hotel
text:
Ottimo hotel con possibilità di avere la colazione (non frequente a New York) col vantaggio di ottimizzare i tempi.
Posizione centrale e vicino alla Grand Station, quindi ottimo per visitare a piedi il centro di Manhattan o accedere alla SubWay.
Camera pulita e confortevole, cassaforte e wifi gratuito in camera.
Servizio cordiale e attento, su richiesta forniscono bottigliette di acqua e ogni pomeriggio nella reception sono disponibili gratuitamente spuntini e bevande.
Colazione soddisfacente anche se poco varia nei diversi giorni.
Rapporto qualità prezzo buono per Manhattan.

title: Great Location, Amazing Staff
text: Our king room was a little small (though almost large by NYC standards), but quiet and immaculate with a very comfortable bed.  The location is great (two blocks to Grand Central), and the staff perhaps the best in NYC!  Extremely helpful and very kind.  Plus, they'll bake you chocolate chip cookies!  The breakfast is quite good for hotel breakfasts and includes a wide array of hot and cold items along with fresh fruit and bakery.  Very good coffee too.  This was our first stay at the Hampton Inn, as our "regular hotel" no longer exists, and after such a good experience, this will be our new go-to base for visits to Manhattan.

title: Good location and attentive, friendly staff
text: I wanted a centrally located hotel which was reasonably priced, if there is such a thing in NYC.  This hotel was better than I expected.  The staff went out of their way to make me feel welcome.  They immediately responded to any requests, i.e. sending Tim up to help us connect to Wi-Fi and sending an engineer up to help us adjust the a/c.  The complimentary breakfast was terrific and was fully stocked until 10 am.  In fact one of the staff members came around at 9:50 am to let everyone know that breakfast would close in 10 minutes.  The front desk staff, Deshana, Erika, Soule were so friendly and helpful with any requests.  I would definitely stay here again.

title: Very attentive staff
text: We selected the hotel because of location and high reviews. The staff is very attentive and wanting to please. The price was not great but good enough. The only complaint was d when i needed to change the rearrange i could not do it online. I had to call and even then I wasn’t sure it was done correctly. All turned out fine in the end.

title: Great Location Near Grand Central
text:
We chose this hotel for its value (about $100 less than Times Square hotels!!) and proximity to Grand Central. It is an easy walk from Grand Central (about 2.5 blocks). The street is very quiet. It is only about 1 mile walk to Times Square and we did it several times in one day. We enjoyed being able to grab a quick bite to eat at Grand Central ...so many great choices!! The great subway connections to other parts of Manhattan were perfect. The neighborhood felt safe.  

The staff was incredibly nice and welcoming. I'm not sure I have ever stayed anywhere with nicer staff. We arrived early and the staff was happy to store our luggage until we could check-in later. We stayed in a room with 1 King and it was perfect. The breakfast was up to Hampton standards with plenty of offerings. 

I would definitely stay here again!!

title: Booo
text: I stayed at hotel back in December during the holiday time and it was good & bad! for the first time in the country  for a person like me with a strong accent the manager was mean rolled her eyes at me . I didn’t like that for my first night . My next day met 2 front desk agents named Kayleene and Shanque. Kayleene was so sweet she tried to understand me by using google to make me feel better . There was also a young lady doing the over night I think Kylia . Kylia kept me company when I couldn’t sleep late night we drink tea together as if we were friends not strangers .These ladies made my stay very welcoming and very at home as if I wasn’t even in a hotel .Treated me like a regular person and not just a guest they had to make happy . They helped me with finding diner , WiFi and helped with giving me directions for my next day . I had issues in my room with the ac had to keep calling them at the desk and those ladies had me taken care of with  complementary Warm cookies Timothy delivered to my room door while the engineer came up to fix the vent . The breakfast were awesome- made the best of the breakfast, need more food . coffee taste no good , My room key not working to open door . On my 4 day I wanted to speak with the manager -someone in charge just to let them know of my problems during my stay . I was told the manager wasn’t around and it felt like they didn’t even care to speak with me or know what was wrong. A supervisor took my name and telephone number telling me that she will try to pass it to manager . I still haven’t heard from her . On my check out day Kayleene was there to take care of me . I pay for my stay to check out. I told her the manager never talked to me and kayleene got the manager to come and fixed my problem . Now I’m very disappointed i come back to NY to stay at hotel this month,  I found out my lovely agents aren’t their . Need to bring them back So nice and caring Everyone else that’s working there doesn’t do a good job with making me feel genuinely welcomed or important . The manager and supervisor was rude unprofessional So sad because I liked it there

title: Estadia perfeita
text: Quarto limpo e muito confortável com cama king-size. Banheiro moderno com chuveiro excelente. Café da manhã tipo americano incluído na diária. Hotel perto da Grand Central Terminal. Recomendo e voltaria a me hospedar com certeza.

title: Buen Hotel.
text:
Un Hotel cerca a todo.Excelente trato del personal.
No todos hablan Español.Agradecimiento especial a Erika y a un Sr.que labora en el Hotel y esta cerca a Recepción y nos ayudo mucho.

Las habitaciones no son tan grandes pero se está cómodo en ellas,mi Madre tiene 78 Años y lo paso genial.
Puedes pedir agua embotellada en la Recepción ya que es Cortesía del Hotel.
Lo único malo si se puede decir así es que el lugar para tomar los alimentos es muy pequeño.El primer día no pudimos desayunar.
Recomendado 100%

title: Prisvärt med bra läge
text:
Vi var tre generationer som bodde i tre rum på detta hotell i 5 nätter och alla var nöjda med vistelsen. Läget är lugnt men ändå centralt med många restauranger i närheten och 5 min att gå till tunnelbanan vid Grand Central. Rummen är hyggligt stora för att vara New York med sköna sängar och bra badrum. Ett plus är också att frukost ingår, kanske inte den mest välsorterade buffe men fullt tillräcklig.
Det enda jag har att klaga på är incheckningen som var väldigt rörig, kanske beroende på att vi hade tre rum på samma bokning. Vi var tydliga med att vi ville dela upp betalningen med var sitt kreditkort per rum men trots det sattes mitt kreditkort upp på två rum varav det ena debiterades redan vid incheckningen. Nåja efter många turer till receptionen ordnade det upp sig till slut.
Sammanfattningsvis en 4-stjärnig upplevelse på ett prisvärt 3-stjärnigt hotell.

title: Good Midtown EAST Location
text: The hotel is a short walk to Grand Central and about a 20 minute walk to the Empire State Building. In fact, the walk to Grand Central will take you to the entrance of Grand Central Market - which is not to be missed.  We stayed here for two nights and found the rooms clean although an update would be a nice improvement.  Bedding was adequate [ prefer firmer pillows].  The complimentary breakfast is simple - head for the waffle station.  We enjoyed a meal at a Japanese restaurant, Sakagura, in the basement of the building next door.  Good value for the area.

title: Great stay
text: Great stay in NYC. The hotel is clean and they maintain the rooms well. Breakfast is simple, nice and complementary. Get there early because it gets crowded especially on weekends. Coffee and tea are always available.

title: Horrific experience
text: No vent fans so when blow drying hair fire alarm went off due to steam.  The mgr on duty and her boss, Elizabeth, have to be the most unprofessional ppl I have ever interacted with.  Absolutely no customer service skills, blatant liars, and have no business interacting with guests.  Their extreme rudeness overshadowed the kindness of other employees.  The breakfast is pretty standard, the rooms as well with the except of a tiny bathroom.  We asked for and were given city view.  It was a view of the apt complex windows next door where we could see the atrocious living conditions of some of the tenants in full view of the window.  The air was ok and the location to other activities was awesome.  I will never return nor recommend due to the handling of the fire alarm.  A group of 8 professional women accused of

title: Nice Hotel and Friendly Staff
text: The hotel is tucked down a quiet street in New York, which can be rare for many hotels. I did make sure to get a back facing room just in case, but I noticed it didn't matter. The hotel is convenient to many New York locations - easy walking distance to transportation as well. The front desk staff were very friendly and always smiling!!  The room was clean and the rate was okay for a NYC hotel - though still a bit high in my opinion. There were two issues however.  The pillows were like marshmallows and shaped like them as well - one wasn't enough and two were too much. Also, ATT phone reception didn't work nor did the phone work with the Wifi from the room.  I heard another guest complain as well. I had to go to the lobby to get reception.

title: Excelente
text: Nos recibió Luis Rivera de una forma muy agradable. Las muchachas de recepción fueron muy atentas. El hotel está muy limpio. Las habitaciones son muy acogedoras. El desayuno estuvo delicioso. De seguro volvemos a visitarlo.

title: Come Monthly to NYC this is Where I Stay
text: This is a great place to stay in Manhattan. Walking distance to Broadway, Times Square, etc. But most importantly is the front desk staff. They are wonderful, pleasant, and very friendly. I’m sure people stay more frequently than I do but they always treat me like family. Rooms are clean too. I highly recommend this hotel if you are staying in Manhattan. If you want good cellular signal I recommend the 10th floor or higher. Had some troubles with the lower floors in the past.

title: Great Experience
text: The service was great. Everyone was so nice and friendly and very helpful. The breakfast was delicious and very satisfying.The rooms were very nice and clean. I will definitely be staying there again.

title: Another Great Stay at the Hampton Grand Central
text: Had another great stay at the Hampton Inn Grand Central.  The location is excellent and the service is great, as well as a great value.  Lovely and energetic employees such as Lashunda and Erika, make staying their refreshing.

title: Great location and service
text: Great location and service.   Complementary room Internet as well as complementary daily breakfast. Everything from fresh fruit, yogurt, granola, cereal, waffles, eggs,  variety of meat dishes, coffee tea and  juice. Walking distance to Grand Central Station.

title: Efficiency and Kindness
text:
After an initial misunderstanding regarding our reservation, which was immediately solved, we enjoyed our stay in this confortable hotel. 
We would like to emphasize the cordial and helpful treatment from the front desk staff.

title: Great value in midtown Manhattan
text:
Stayed here for a week on business - the hotel was great!

It is good value in midtown Manhattan (everything's relative, right?), Has comfortable well set up rooms, WIFI was perfect, as were the cleanliness and toiletries.

What really makes this hotel standout, however was the great service by all staff members - all cheerful and helpful at all times.

I will definitely be back and hope they can maintain this level of service.

title: A lot to like...and one thing that got in the way
text:
Reception staff were wonderful. They took a slightly ordinary proposition and made it shine. They were welcoming, professional and courteous. A credit to the brand. The rooms were fine with really comfy beds. 

The let down was the breakfast. For north of $300 a night, I wanted more to look forward to than paper plates, plastic cutlery, make-your-own waffles and lukewarm eggs. How about fresh fruit and someone making fresh omlettes to order? Oh...and some freshly brewed coffee would be nice. 

Other than that, the hotel is a good place to stay. Located close to plenty of places where you can get a good breakfast too.

title: Superó Nuestras Expectativas!!!
text:
Fue una excelente sorpresa la nuestra estadía en el hotel, pues superó nuestras expectativas. Toda la atención brindada por el equipo, principalmente de la Recepcionista Erika, que siempre estuvo pendiente de todo. El desayuno muy bueno para el estilo del hotel, siempre reponiendo los ítems a tiempo y todo muy limpio.
La ubicación es fantastica, pues tenemos todo a la distancia de una caminada de 20 min, o se puede ir a la estación central, que está a 2 cuadras, y tomar un metro o hasta un tren para ir a cualquier parte.
Seguramente volviendo a Nueva York nos quedaremos en el Hampton Inn Grand Central.

title: NYC close to Grand Central Station
text: Clean, well appointed rooms. They were small, but we didn't come to NYC to stay in our room.  2 blocks to Grand Central to get anywhere and 4 blocks to the UN.  The staff was awesome!  Always friendly and helpful beyond belief.

title: "Hidden" Gem
text: Very friendly staff.  Great location 2 blocks from Grand Central Station, a major transit hub.  Very clean.  Free (excellent) breakfast.  Lots of good restaurants nearby.  This is all you need to know.  This is the place to stay for a reasonable (for NYC) price.

title: Amazing Service
text: We went to New York to celebrate a birthday. This was our first time staying at the Hampton Grand Central. The food was delicious with an ample selection. We can stay anywhere, but staff like Erika and Nancy are only here! Thank you for such great, caring service!! You made our trip very special.

title: This was a very pleasant surprise for a New York hotel.
text: We had a very pleasant stay at the Hampton Inn.  The staff was especially helpful.  We especially enjoyed the energy and positive attitude of Erica at the front desk....and at breakfast in the morning. She enjoys her work and it shows in how she greets and deals with the Hampton's guest.

title: Will always stay here :)
text:
A friend and I took a group of 10 youth to New York City to attend the United Nations youth assembly. We stayed at this hotel because of its close proximity to the United Nations building. The group of 10 were 17 year olds and are very responsible…not partying teens so it’s not that kind of hotel. 
First of all, the location is perfect. It’s about five minutes from Grand Central Station and about a 10 to 15 minute walk to Times Square. So, it’s not right in the middle of the craziness, but it’s very close. There are restaurants a block away if you want a quick local bite. Including a local favorite, Shake Shack, as well as a delicious $.99 per slice pizza place. 
This hotel is not huge, the rooms are not huge. However, they are very comfortable. We had four people in ours and it was just fine. The rate includes a daily buffet breakfast. The breakfast includes fruit, yogurt, bagels, sweets, scrambled eggs, bacon/sausage, cereal, fresh made waffles etc. Coffee, tea and hot chocolate are available 24 hours, as is bottled water. Every Single time we left the hotel, we were greeted with “have a great day”, by the front desk staff, with smiles. And upon arrival back to the hotel, “welcome back“. In the afternoon, we would all look forward to the fresh baked cookies in the jar at the front desk. All in all a super affordable hotel where they treat you like you’re paying a lot more.

title: Good value for money. Buena relación costo/beneficio
text:
The hotel is a very good value for money choice.  Rooms are clean and comfortable although some are small.  Breakfast is included in the rate, which is something unusual in NYC and if you do not have time for breakfast or are planning to skip lunch, you can take a complimentary bag with a bottle of water, an apple and a couple of additional items.  The staff is very helpful and friendly.  The location is very good, two blocks away from Grand Central Station and about five blocks from 5th Avenue.

El hotel es una muy buena alternativa por su relación costo/beneficio.  Las habitaciones son limpias y confortables aunque algunas son chicas.  El desayuno está incluido en el precio, lo que es poco usual en NYC y si no se tiene tiempo para el desayuno, ofrece gratis una manzana, un agua y un par de otras cosas.  El personal es muy servicial y atento.  La ubicación es muy buena, a dos cuadras de Grand Central Station y a unas cinco de 5th Avenue.

title: Hotel where staff cares
text:
I travelled with friends to visit NYC for the first time. I loved the location. Staff were always helpful. Facilities were adequate and useful. The noise was surprisingly absent.
The only thing I would suggest to add are some more options for breakfast. Some ham, cheese and vegetables for people who are used to less sweet breakfast choices.

title: полное барахло, больше ни ногой
text: тиснули с карты за лишние сутки 269 долларов, сначала пытались морозиться, потом просто стали ставить номер на удержание, позорят сеть Хилтон. полное барахло. качество номеров и пищи посредственное. символов не хватает, поэтому все, что еще можно добавить, это - барахло барахло барахло барахло барахло

title: Great location near Grand Central
text: Great location near Grand Central.  Rooms were very clean and comfortable.  Staff were excellent.  Breakfast was good but the breakfast area was often busy. Not much traffic on this block of 43rd, which is great if you want to escape the hustle and bustle of the city.

title: I'd give this 3 1/2 if I could.....
text:
The hotel room itself is fine, though small  (it is mid town Manhattan, right? !). This is not a grand hotel so the amenities such as a bar, restaurant, 24 hour food service are non-existant  Room on 10th floor was very clean, window that actually opened, very comfy bed. Staff were very friendly and helpful.
The only real issue I had was the price - my one night stay came to $380.00 - which included $50 NY City taxes, and a $25.00 supplemental fee for exactly what, I'm not sure.  The lady cking in  infront of me got a room for $135.00 for 5 nights...when I questioned the receptionist  how could I get that rate, she said you have to book thru a 3rd party.  I always thought booking directly with the hotel was the best way to go - lesson learned.
Bottom line - if u can score a room here for less than (or around ) $200.00 and don't need alot of frills, it's a nice place to stay.

title: Wonderful Stay
text: Really a great place, had a bit of a view of the Chrysler building which was cool.  Next to Grand Central very easy to jump on the subway and go anywhere, And the staff treated us like family.  And the price is amazing since you get free breakfast too (and I mean real breakfast, not here’s a bagel and some cold coffee 😊)

title: Amazing Stay at Hampton Inn Grand Central
text:
If you need to do business in or around the United Nations, this hotel is the place for you.  We had a large group of 7 attending a conference at the U.N. and this hotel was a few minutes walk from the site.

Friendly, organized staff assisted us during our stay and the continental breakfast and coffee/tea/cocoa all day allowed us to save money.

This was definitely our home away from home during our 8 day stay.  We will be using this hotel again in the future and highly recommend it to anyone who wants a friendly atmosphere, clean, comfortable rooms and a hotel within walking distance of the U.N. and Grand Central.

title: Great hotel at a great price
text: Wonderful hotel with reasonably sizes rooms, good bed (not too firm, not too soft,) and friendly staff. Biggest surprise: fast elevators. Free breakfast was pretty standard, nothing out of the ordinary. They held my bag for 4 hours after I left, when I tried to tip them they refused. Would highly recommend.

title: Great staff. Clean room. Not eco Friendly!
text: Reception staff wonderful..the girl from Kazakstan is like sunshine. Rooms are great and clean. Breakfast ok but for a European it uses a shocking amount of paper and plastic. Much is not even recyclable.

title: Business travel
text: Hotel is perfect for someone who wants a clean room with a bed with outstanding friendly staff. They really do what they can to make it a great experience which in NY is not always the case. This is my go to hotel for my quick trips to the city

title: Long weekend trip to NYC
text:
Perfect location 2-3 blocks from grand central station 
The room was a bit small but I guess that’s normal in Manhattan 
very good accommodations , 24 hr coffee  which is defiantly needed 
Nice and very polite staff 
Defiantly would go back

title: Hotel muy bien comunicado
text: Me alojé en este hotel durante 5 días por un viaje de negocios. La impresión general fue buena: habitación limpia, cama muy cómoda, baño completo, wifi que funciona correctamente, personal muy amable y desayuno incluido en el precio aceptable (no es nada del otro mundo, pero es un detalle no muy común y que viene bien en una ciudad como New York). La ubicación está muy bien, a 5 minutos andando de Gran Central Terminal, desde donde puedes ir fácilmente a todos los sitios. Yo pagué $300/noche, y aunque soy consciente de que en New York es un precio normal para un hotel, me pareció excesivo para una habitación tan pequeña. En cualquier caso, sí es un sitio que recomendaría.

title: Bom
text: Fiquei hospedada em Janeiro de 2018 com minha família. Escolhi este hotel porque precisava de 2 quartos (2 adultos e 3 jovens de 15,18 e 19 anos) e achei este com preço bom e também porque o café da manhã estava incluído. Achei os quartos um pouco apertados e as camas de casal pequenas,de tamanho padrão. Pontos positivos: Staff atencioso e simpático, cookies e água de graça na recepção, café da manhã bom, preço justo e boa localização, perto da Grand Central Station e ao lado da locadora Avis, para quem for alugar carro. Pontos negativos: barulho no corredor dá para ouvir; café da manhã, dependendo do horário, fica tumultuado; elevadores demorados.

title: Pour sa situation près des transports
text:
Nous avons reçu, mes amies et moi, un accueil sympathique de la part de tout le personnel du Hampton. L’hotel est près du grand central terminal, ce qui facilite grandement les déplacements. Le seul hic, il n’est pas très visible à cause des travaux autour et des échafaudages.
 Les chambres sont assez petites mais bien équipées côté wifi. Et j’ai bien apprécié la possibilité de faire un café le matin.
En tout temps, bouteilles d’eauou Limonade et biscuits disponibles dans le hall. Je trouve que c’est une charmante attention.
Le personnel est aimable et serviable à toute heure.
Merci Hampton Inn

title: PARFAIT, je recommande !!!!
text:
Nous avons séjourné à sept personnes sur 2 chambres durant 7 nuits
Ayant l’habitude des hôtels à Manhattan, croyez moi cet hôtel est parfait à tout point de vu
- Personnel d’une grande gentillesse ainsi qu’une immense patience pour vous faire présenter les services et répondre à vos questions.
- Chambre très propre ou le ménage et le changement du linge de maison changé tous les jours
- Petit déjeuner parfait avec ses gaufres, yaourt, saucisses, pain, baguel, fromage… et j’en passe, un buffet idéal pour pratiquer de longues marches et se remplir l’estomac.
- TOP du TOP et rare à Manhattan, l'hôtel est très très calme
Beaucoup de petites attentions "clients", fontaine citronné et cookies à l’accueil.
Nous avons rencontré un petit souci avec un amis (Handicapé), le personnel à très vite remédié à la situation, je félicite grandement l’ensemble des agents de cet établissement.
En conclusion, idéal pour passer ses vacances à New York, tout est réuni pour passer un séjour PARFAIT. J’y retournerai lors de mes prochaines visites professionnelle et loisirs

title: Vacances en famille
text: Nous sommes resté 6 jours  dans cet hôtel, chambre relativement propre, il ne faut pas regarder les coins. Les chambres sont assez petites mais en rapport avec la vie a new york,Décoration des chambres vieillottes . Le petit déjeuné est très moyen, pas de lait chaud car la machine était cassée, et elle n’a pas été réparé pendant tout notre séjour. Le personnel est assez gentil .Bien situé à 5 minutes du métro.

title: Best front desk staff ever!
text: Breakfast and internet are the worst I’ve ever experienced and my room never got made up but their front desk staff are wonderful and helpful people! They brought a fridge to my room right away when requested and towels when my room didn’t get made up.

title: Buona scelta.
text: Non aggiungo nulla di più di quanto già scritto sulla posizione comoda per muoversi a piedi verso Grand Central Station e Times square. Mi soffermo sulla gentilezza del personale, sempre pronto per dare indicazioni, sulla colazione abbondante, sulla pulizia dell'ambiente e la disponibilità di portare un eventuale take away nella sala delle colazioni. Inoltre è impagabile la possibilità di farsi una bevanda calda (nel nostro caso un tè) alla sera tornati da una lunga giornata. Direi sicuramente da consigliare.

title: Nice place great Location!
text: This place is well located in just some minutes you get to the Grand Central Terminal, the Time Square and other main places... The breakfast included in our booking was delicious and the staff very helpful and friendly. Thank you!

title: Très bien
text:
Hôtel choisi car avec trois enfants de 3 à 8 ans nous avons eu beaucoup de mal à trouver quelque chose de correct sur papier sans avoir un budget de fou (première fois a NY).

La chambre que nous avions au 16e donnait sur les autres immeubles. Vue bof mais très calme une fois la fenêtre fermée (elle ouvre un peu question d'aérer..).

La chambre est petite mais au standard de la ville. 

Très très propre, nous y avons passé 6 nuits à 5. Très peu d'espace en général mais suffisamment pour y rester le temps nécessaire.

Nous laissions chaque jour 2$ en tips avec un petit ''Thank u'' et nous avions une chambre impeccablement bien rangée, propre.

Douche de base mais correcte. Baignoire très basse mais pratique pour les enfants. Cela reste ''basique'' mais propre et pas mal fichu. Seul bémol pour la chambre, nous avions une porte donnant sur la chambre d'à côté (chambres communicantes). Du coup, on entendait un peu les autres parler. Au final, pas très dérangeant.

Petit-déjeuner correct et de base : gauffres à faire soi-même, pâtisseries américaines, céréales, oeufs chauds,...rien de folichon mais bon. Peut-être trop américain pour certains..?

Je conseille d'y aller entre 6-7h.

Toujours possible de se faire un café gratuit la journée (+ eau citronnée..). Petits cookies proposés à chaque entrée dans l'hôtel. Mes filles appréciaient.

Point important : aucune surprise lors du paiement. J'ai payé le montant écrit lors de la réservation.

Personnel ultra sympa.
Situation très bonne (vous êtes à 5 min à pieds de Grand Central, carrefour du métro, ce aui est pratique).

Du coup, bien placé niveau restaurant, pharmacy etc (bien peu décentré donc moins cher er plus calme).

Quartier pas trop malfamé.

Aucun regret.

title: Saule Rocks!
text: The staff here is very friendly and accomodating.  Kudos to Saule for showing how customer service should be; inspiring her staff by leading by example.  Also, great location to Grand Central!  Well suited for families

title: Manhattan, goede prijs kwaliteit verhouding.
text:
Proper, kamers prima, vriendelijke service, goede ligging, goede bedden. 
De ontbijt ruimte is een beetje te klein, en het is een typisch Amerikaans ontbijt. Geen chocokoeken dus.. maar laat dit u niet tegenhouden.

title: Gute Lage, kleine Zimmer, und - na ja - eine Art Frühstück
text:
Alles in allem kann man in das Hotel gehen, Lage gut, Zimmer ok aber klein, Frühstück inklusive aber mäßig. Das Hampton Inn wird jedoch sicher nicht unser Favorit in NYC.

ZIMMER
Wir hatten ein King-Zimmer. Das Bett war gut, das Zimmer war sauber. Der Raum war ziemlich klein, geschätzt mit Bad ca. 14-15 qm, auch in Manhattan gibt es oft grössere Zimmer in der Kategorie. Der Schrank war sehr klein, wir konnten die Koffer kaum ausräumen, fanden aber auch für die beiden mittelgroßen Trolleys kaum Platz im Zimmer, Die Dusche war gut und gross. Die Kaffeemaschine war unten im Regal unter dem Waschbecken im Bad, das ist natürlich nichts. Gut: Man konnte das Fenster öffnen, allerdings hatte es keine gute Lärmdämmung, wenn es geschlossen war.

PERSONAL
Sehr freundlich und hilfsbereit.

FRÜHSTÜCK
Das beste was man über das Frühstück sagen kann war, es gab eines und es war im Preis inbegriffen. Wir waren 5 Tage im Hotel und unterm Strich war das Frühstück weder von Auswahl noch in der Qualität auch nur halbwegs empfehlenswert. Auch im Vergleich zu anderen Hampton Inns war es unterdurchschnittlich. Es gab z.B. nie Bacon zum Ei, nie Cornflakes, kein fertig zubereitetes Obst (z.B. Melone, Trauben oder Ananas). Dass alles Plastik und Pappe ist war klar, aber auch beim Plastikgeschirr gibt es Unterschiede (ja!) und das hier Verwendete war kaum zu gebrauchen. An einem Tag gab es nicht mal die Plastikmesser, waren aus (so sorry), und man versuche mal, einen Bagel mit einem Löffel zu bestreichen. Die Auswahl an Brot / Gebäck und Joghurt war nicht gut. Ich kann die positiven Kommentare hier nicht nachvollziehen, klar unter dem Durchschnitt vergleichbarer Restaurants, auch in Manhattan.

LAGE
Eine der ganz guten Lagen in Manhattan. Ca. 5 min. / 400m Fußweg zur Subway 42 St und zur Grand Central Station. Ca. 10 min. Fußweg zur 5th Ave und zum Bryant Park. Ca. 25 min. zur Südostecke vom Central Park.

ZUSAMMENFASSUNG
Man kann durchaus in das Hotel gehen, vor allem aufgrund der Lage, und es ist recht günstig. Die geringe Zimmergrösse führt aber schnell zu einem beengten Aufenthalt und das Frühstück empfanden wir als komplett einfallslos und von mässiger Qualität.

title: 很好的体验
text: 一切都很好，如果房间内有冰箱会更好。大厅内有咖啡热巧茶，早餐从6点开始10点结束。酒店隔壁就是安飞士租车，租车很方便。

title: New York City Vacation
text: Highly recommend this hotel. Staff so nice, helpful and professional. Good location for sightseeing - much within walking distance. Lots of restaurants close by. Rooms are compact, typical of cities, but nice and well equipped. Beds very comfortable.

title: Our new New York City "home"
text: Fantastic place to stay and GO.  We were treated with nothing but kindness with a smile.  The entire staff aims to make your stay as enjoyable as possible.  We were able to walk to the UN, Times Square and Penn Station.  To top it all off they have a fabulous breakfast that is delicious and plentiful.  Can't say enough good things about this place!

title: Great location, quiet, reasonable sized rooms for Manhattan
text:
Best attributes:
Location- subway proximity- 2 blocks to Grand Central and from there we went all over Manhattan and to Brooklyn.  This was a main factor in choosing this hotel as we wanted to be able to get anywhere very quickly.  All the major lines have stops around 42nd Street.
Quiet- only 8 rooms/floor and in the mid part of a block on a fairly quiet street
Staff- very helpful, stored our bags when we arrived and before we left, arranged transportation for us to the airport, always friendly
Value- for the size of room and location this property was a very good value, good beds and WiFi

title: Great stay over Easter long weekend!
text: Excellent location and the staff were great! Great selection at breakfast. Good WiFi. The bed was very comfortable. No complaints at all (except that I probably ate too many cookies!). I’d definitely stay again.

title: Convenient Location, amazingly friendly staff
text: Maybe because of its proximity to the United Nations, the staff at this hotel is remarkably friendly and efficient. They take pride in "welcoming to all." I remarked on the array of lapel pins a registration clerk was wearing and she BEAMED that they were gifts, literally, from around the world -- people connected to the UN who had stayed at the hotel. But the friendliness extends to the folks in the breakfast room. I use the fitness center, which, for a small space, packs a lot of equipment in, including free weights, machines and yoga mats. My only complaint is no refrigerator in the room, but you can't have everything! The staff -- and the proximity to my company's NY office -- and the affordable rates keep me coming back.

title: Amazing staff! Highly recommend this hotel!
text: My daughter and I arrived at the Hampton Inn Manhattan Grand Central after a travel day consisting of one disaster after another.  Our flight had been rerouted, we had a terrible experience at the airport, and were basically gouged by the taxi driver who took us to the hotel.  We arrived frustrated and haggard.  We were greeted by the most upbeat, welcoming person--Dashanda Cheatham.  Ms. Cheatham was so kind, listened to our horrible story, and was able to find us an upgraded room with a balcony.  Her service was top notch! She remembered us later that night when we returned from sightseeing and greeted us again.  I have stayed in NYC a number of times, but I have never had such amazing service.  Also, the room is very comfortable, the breakfast was yummy, and this hotel is convenient to EVERYTHING in Manhattan.  Thank you, Ms. Cheatham and Hampton Inn!

title: New York Trip
text: Room was nice. Breakfast was good and had a nice variety of things offered. Nice location. Located about 15-20 minutes from the Times Square area. Could easily walk to it or walk to Grand Central Station and take the subway.

title: good location but.........
text: Easy to explore New York. Staff very friendly and helpful. Plastic cutlery and plates and dishes to use at breakfast was its downfall, made you feel cheap, tacky and uncomfortable!! A big shame. Does not take much for proper cutlery , plates and dishes!

title: Great location
text: Very near the Grand Central Terminal with easy access to the subway. Lots of groceries nearby and it's possible to do a lot of things on foot from the hotel. Nice to have cookies in the reception and coffee served all day long! The room is small though, but it was clean and comfortable.

title: Very Good Value for Money
text: The staff were very courteous, the breakfast provided a variety from which to choose. The room were well kept and the location was very central to my needs. I would stay at this hotel gain in the future.

title: Ótimo atendimento
text: A ideia deles é fazer o cliente feliz e conseguem. As moças da recepção são muito simpáticas. Café/chocolate quente e chá disponíveis o dia todo, e às vezes cookies também, ajuda muito naqueles momentos em que você não quer jantar. O café da manhã é tipo americano, mas surpreendeu positivamente. Apesar do hotel ser compacto o quarto tinha um bom tamanho.

title: Bad experience
text: The rooms need refurbishing, breakfast was really awful, probably the worst thing of the whole experience. You have to wait a long time for the elevators to come which can make you late to meetings. Staff are nice and helpful. Location is okay.

title: Una de las Gratas Sorpresas de New York
text: Nos alojamos desde finales del mes de Marzo hasta el día 2 de Abril, y sinceramente lo único que podemos decir simplemente Gracias. Las personas que forman parte del hotel, hacen que su estadía allí es como estar en su casa, desde las personas que te reciben con una sonrisa en recepción hasta la amabilidad de las personas que ordenan la habitación y todo el personal que está siempre presente y brindando ayuda. Por otro lado también es muy importante destacar la ubicación del hotel ya que te permite estar cerca de todo y a su vez lejos del ruido muchas veces molesto de los lugares propios de zonas transitadas. Muy lindas las instalaciones y excelente desayuno para comenzar el día de un viajero dispuesto a recorrer mucho.

title: Wonderful weekend stay
text: We arrived Friday afternoon.  I received a call that morning with a problem with my credit card.  It took several phone calls, and Des was patient and wonderful to replace my reservation and add a new card.  We stayed two nights.  We were greeted with a friendly smile when we arrived and each time we came in and out.  The room and bathroom were clean.  We enjoyed the breakfast and eating area each morning.  The team members were quick to replace items.  We would come here again!

title: Would stay again!
text: We were mandated this hotel for a business trip, sometimes that does not work in our favor but this time it did!!!  Great location, accommodating staff, clean facility.  Anything we asked they were able to help from bottles of water, directions and ordering us a car for our return trip to the airport.

title: Surprisingly great stay for a much smaller Hotel than I am used to.
text: My company recently downgraded our travel accommodations, and I  was initially dismayed to be placed in this location, but was incredibly surprised by the superb level of customer service. The manager on duty Ms. Imelda was extremely helpful,  and very professional throughout my entire stay. The front desk staff was very attentive, and welcoming from the moment I arrived. In hindsight I can see the allure of a smaller Hotel, the service is a lot more personal, and thorough. I would have no problem staying here again.

title: Small, Average, Clean
text: Stayed 4 nights in tiny room, you can barely walk around the king bed.  The room was clean and in good shape.  No frills, no fridge, hard bed, no bar/restaurant, small lobby. Very friendly front desk staff in this out of the way, generally quiet hotel.  Expected more for the price.

title: Great stay
text: Located only within 5 minutes walk to the Grand Central subway lines 4,5,6,7 , this Hampton Inn is the perfect place to stay in NYC. Generally more affordable than other hotels, very quiet with typical Hampton breakfast. Clean rooms, friendly staff I will certainly return!!!

title: Excelente servicio, magnífica tarifa Weekender
text: Nos quedamos 3 noches, en fin de semana, con un excelente precio, un hotel sencillo en la recepción, pero con personal muy amable, servicial y dispuesto a ayudar, excelente la limpieza, los cuartos un poco chicos pero con todo lo necesario, desayuno incluido con diversas opciones para escoger, a 2 cuadras de Grand Central, a 2 de Naciones Unidas, magnífica ubicación, pero destaca sobre todo el personal de recepción.

title: capodanno a new york
text: ottimo hotel personale gentilissimo biscotti caldi the caffe eccellente a tutte le ore dal pomeriggio alla notte buona prima colazione camere calde confortevoli dopo le giornate al gelo di new york per non parlare della comodita 10 minuti dalla quinta 15 minuti a piedi e sei a time square cosa chiedere di piu

title: Fijn centraal gelegen Hotel
text: We verbleven 4 nachten in een voor mindervaliden aangepast kamer (904). Helaas wel met een bad, maar met een los geleverd douchestoeltje kon onze mindervalide zoon toch lekker onder de douche. Kamer was ruim en zeer schoon, ruime badkamer, goede bedden. Airco en verwarming stil en goed te regelen. Koffie mogelijkheid en koelkastje op de kamer. Kledingkast erg ondiep en onpraktisch mede door de kluis in de kast. Gordijnen waren een minpuntje voor de uitstraling. Eén leek helemaal gekrompen en gerimpeld onderaan. Kamer was rustig (voor New Yorkse begrippen), hoe hoger de etage van de kamer, hoe minder straat geluid. Personeel achter de balie en in de kleine eetzaal uiterst vriendelijk en behulpzaam. Snelle liften, goede WiFi, altijd koffie, water en koekjes beschikbaar. Ligging is lekker centraal, en grote centrale station met veel metrolijnen ligt op loopafstand. Wij hebben veel te voet gedaan vanaf het hotel, alleen naar 9/11 memorial hebben we met de metro gedaan. Boven de grond zie je uiteraard meer van deze gave, maar drukke stad.

title: Great value/location
text:
We just returned from a long weekend stay at this hotel and were very satisfied with what we found.  Very friendly front staff, free hot breakfast and take away one if you have an early departure, clean room, convenient location.  Good range of dining choices within easy walk, close to the Airport shuttle bus stop on 41st and many subway lines at Grand Central.
Hotel is on a "smaller" side street so less noisy at night, but trash seems to be collected overnight in this area.  Had a forward facing room on the second floor, but other than the occasional truck, it was pretty quiet.

title: Excellent
text:
Great service at front desk, good breakfast, good central location. Easy to navigate, friendly staff, clean rooms. 
Good basic fitness facility. Have stayed here multiple times. Would jphighly recommend!

title: Great small hotel !
text: I like this hotel, it is in a great location, yet it is quiet and easy to access. There are only 8 rooms per floor, the rooms are always clean, there is a coffee maker in the room, and the staff is friendly. You can easily access the heart of Manhattan for work or fun.

title: Nice hotel – great rate
text:
The Hampton Inn Manhattan Grand Central is a medium sized hotel and is located about 2 blocks directly east of Grand Central Terminal on the corner of Second Avenue and East 43rd Street.  It is also located about 2 blocks directly west of the United Nations complex.  

I stayed here with my wife for 3 nights in mid-January and thought the hotel was nice and the room rate was great. We booked under “The Long Weekender” program which reduces the nightly rate to $99 if you stay at least 3 nights.   The rate included a free breakfast which was OK (nothing special). I did not like their coffee but there was a Dunkin Donuts about 100 yards away so I went there every morning for a better cup. The front desk staff were VERY friendly and welcomed me every time I walked by. This was probably the friendliest front desk staff that I have experienced. Our room on the 12th floor had a terrible view of the ugly building across the street (on 43rd street). The room noise was below average as I heard some hallway noise when the people next to us arrived after midnight.  The on-line pictures of the fitness room looked good but I did not have time to check it out. There is no need to use the fitness room when you are walking about 10 miles a day to see all the NYC attractions. The rooms were clean and the décor was newer.

Overall I enjoyed staying at this nice hotel and recommend it.  It is in a decent location close to Grand Central Station and the United Nations complex. The only negative is that there was a lot of trash on this street near the front entrance (more than other nearby streets).

title: SRO Masquerading as Hotel
text: We are Hilton Diamond members and were appalled to find that Hilton lends the Hampton brand to this facility, which bore more resemblance to an SRO than a hotel.  The king-bedded room is miniscule in size and the bathroom (more akin to a water closet) has a sliding door that provides full view of the interior from either side even when closed.  Our Diamond "upgrade" consisted of a "city-view" room on the top floor, which, in fact, had no view at all.  Frankly, we would have much preferred a bit more breathing space than the "city view."  Although we were granted a late checkout at 2 PM, we were locked out of our room at 1:30 PM when we returned to gather our belongings.  When we called the front desk, we were asked to return to retrieve new keys and, only when we objected, did the staff agree to have the keys brought to us.  We have stayed at many other hotels in NYC at different price points but this hotel truly takes the cake for highest price paid per square foot.  Never again!

title: Zeer aardige staff, maar....
text: Goede ligging, vlak bij Grand Central, erg aardige en hulpvaardige medewerker en schoon. Echter: misschien heb ik pech, maar een week in een kamer waar je de gesprekken van de buren letterlijk kunt verstaan is niet fijn. Tussen mijn kamer en die ernaast zit een deur, waarschijnlijk kan die open gemaakt worden waardoor en een grote kamer ontstaat. Maar dit betekent wel dat het zeer en zeer gehorig is. Letterlijk de telefoongesprekken van de buurman volgen (om 2 uur in de nacht) of het gebabbel van jonge meiden. Voor meer dan 300 euro per nacht.... Naast een karig ontbijt, er zijn betere opties. Kortom, als je hier al boekt, zorg dat je dus niet zo'n kamer aan de achterkant hebt.

title: Accueil chaleureux, bon rapport qualité/prix
text:
Hotel à proximité de la gare de Grand Central (5 petites minutes à pieds)
Nous étions dans cet hôtel du 20 au 23 décembre 2017 pendant les fêtes.
L'accueil fait par les hôtesses Rabiqa et Imelda était très chaleureux, tout le personnel en général était très sympathique et avenant. L'hôtel est simple mais propre et fonctionnel.
Nous avions une chambre au 18 ème étage, rien de transcendant mais la chambre était confortable, propre et surtout au calme.
Le petit déjeuner était conforme aux standards du groupe Hamptonn Inn et nous avions tous les jours de la place.  

Si je devais trouver des points négatifs je dirais que la chambre est un peu petite pour 3 personnes (comme toutes les chambres à New york) et aussi le manque de restaurants à proximité directe de l'hôtel).

Nous reviendrons très probablement dans cet hôtel quand nous reviendrons à New York.

title: Séjour à New york
text: Parfait hôtel ... personnel extrêmement sympa et serviable. A deux pas de la gare grand central donc idéalement situé à New York. Rien à redire parfait et un grand merci à la personne en charge du ménage qui systématiquement remettait tous les doudous de ma fille sur le lit :-)

title: Bad experience
text:
Unfortunately this hotel is physically set up so that if you actually want to sleep there, you likely won't be able to.  Rooms have connecting doors and EVERY word, TV show, and snore of your next room neighbor is amplified right into your room. 
The staff is friendly and the location is good but as a Diamond member who stays in Hilton hotels on a very regular basis, it is highly unlikely I'll stay here again unless as a last resort.  Wish it wasn't so.

title: Girls weekend
text: The staff greeted us when we arrived at the front desk like we were old friends.  If we needed anything just ask.  Our rooms were clean and comfortable.  We were close in walking distance to a lot of attractions.  Easy to get a cab. A great experience.

title: Excellent 3 Day Business Trip Hotel Experience
text: My colleagues and I travel almost weekly and stay at all different chain hotels. I chose this Hampton, because I prefer the brand when traveling with my family (3 young boys). My colleagues’ choice tends to lean more to higher end brands. With that said, the comfort of the room, attention to detail for our comfort from housekeeping and restaurant staff was second to none. By far though, the reason for the Highest of ratings was the front desk staff, Erica and Soule. They made us feel so special and welcome and went OUT of their way to call us by name, provide local recommendations and make us feel like we were home. Thank you for the amazing experience, we will be back next month!

title: Our new favorite NY hotel
text: We were delighted with this hotel.  The location is so central to shows, restaurants and subways/trains.  The room was quiet, clean and well appointed.  The hotel staff goes out of their way to make you feel welcome and answer your questions.  Only negative was the crowd in the breakfast room and the slow elevators.  But, the service and the location outway those.

title: Tutto quello che serve con un rapporto qualità-prezzo ottimo!
text:
Non sarà un grand hotel, con fronzoli e superlusso, ma c'è tutto quello di cui mediamente un turista ha bisogno: comodità, posizione, pulizia, COLAZIONE, wifi, cortesia..
Sarete vicini al cuore pulsante della città ma fuori dal caos di TS e comunque comodi arrivando con la metro dall'aeroporto.
Il tutto ad un prezzo contenuto per gli standard di NY.
Consigliato

title: excellent location and staff
text:
I made a last minute reservation. The staff was super friendly when I checked in. Facility is great, pretty new, the room is a bit small but very clean and everything in room is very new. The bed is firm and very comfortable. A plus is they have breakfast.

Location is of course great, easy to get to everything. Will definitely stay there again.

title: Un hôtel idéalement situé et aux prestations idéales
text:
La chambre était très agréable : vaste, à la déco soignée et sobre, le lit double très grand, très plaisant après une bonne journée. La salle de bain a tout le confort (la douche est immense), très propre.
Les services proposés par l'hôtel comme le petit-déjeuner (servi de 6h à 10h à quantités égales quelle que soit l'heure), les bouteilles, cookies ou limonade offerts à l'accueil, le sourire du personnel, les ascenseurs pour les étages élevés, sont de sérieux avantages !

title: Surprisingly good!
text: The money here is well spent! The staff is fiendishly courteous and they go out of their way to accommodate you. I saw reception staff go to the kitchen to help out with breakfast and the amount of teamwork is commendable!

title: Great Place to stay
text: I have stayed in several Hampton Inns in Manhattan.  While they were all nice, this was my favorite.  The room was a bit small (expected for Manhattan) but neat, functional, and very clean.  The bathroom was also spotless and appeared to be recently redone.  It had a nice sized shower with a nice shower head. This hotel had the friendliest, most helpful and efficient front desk staff I can remember (Erika and Imelda, to mention two).  I will definitely look to stay there again.

title: Très bonne adresse
text: Chambre très calme et très propre. Petite (mais on est à NY!). On cherche encore la "vue sur la ville" ;-) Personnel très souriant et serviable. Petit-déjeuner gratuit (et ça, ça vaut ***). Hôtel bien situé (Midtown et East Side)

title: Great price, friendly staff, awesome location!
text:
This is my second stay at this hotel. The location is awesome (it is located just a block or so away from Grand Central station). The staff are very polite, friendly and welcoming, they wished us a good day every time we left the hotel and greeted us every time time we returned which was a nice personal touch.
The rooms are clean, the beds are large and comfortable, and the bathrooms offer everything you could want.
This hotel is excellent value for money and I would recomend it to anyone wishing to visit the city.

title: Great location and friendly staff
text:
Good location. The staff is really friendly. You can take hot chocolate, tea and coffee all day. pretty good when it is winter. The breakfast is great.
The room was small. Not bad but We have stayed in the Hampton Inn Times Square 2 weeks before and the room was great there

title: Can't recommend this hotel highly enough
text:
Stayed with husband and 3 month old baby for 4 nights a week before Christmas. Great location with nearby eateries, convenience stores and within walking distance of many major sites. 

Reasonably priced with fantastic and varied free hot and cold buffet breakfast. Free hot drinks all day and amazing homemade cookies which went fast! 

Rooms clean and adequate and hotel well maintained. The best part of the stay were the super friendly and helpful staff who really went out of their way to chat and always spoke to us as we left or returned.

A special mention to the lovely Dashanda and the fabulous Hispanic lady (think her name was possibly Nancy?) who provided endless breakfast supplies under major pressure at busy times and whose mother had the same name as my daughter (Rosa) and was always cheerful and smiling.  Would definitely return to this hotel!

title: Great trip to nyc
text: Brilliant hotel staff couldn’t do enough for us. Breakfast was perfect enough for everyone each morning. Free tea coffee water cookies every day. Rooms were cleaned daily and the whole hotel was spotless. Good location walking distance to most places. I’ve stayed in many hotels over the years and I have never had staff so friendly and welcoming. I will be back to this hotel hopefully sooner than later 😊

title: Such a friendly hotel!
text: In the midst of downtown NYC you don't necessarily expect the friendly reception you receive at the Hampton Inn Manhattan Grand Central.  From check in to check out, everyone we encountered during our stay just could not have been nicer.  The hotel was clean, well kept and well located.  But it was the staff's friendly and happy approach to their job that stood out to us.  Thank you for a great stay!  We would definitely return.

title: A Blessing to My Family
text: January 18, 2018 I traveled from Birmingham, Alabama to NYC with my daughter to find an apartment for her. As a recent college grad, she had just landed a job and was excited to start her new life in NYC. Our apartment-hunting experience became very frustrating and the process took far longer than anticipated. Erica Green and the entire staff at the Hampton Inn Manhattan Grand Central were there every day to cheer us on and help us through our difficult days. They became more than friends, they became family. The hotel was clean, the staff was courteous, breakfast delicious and it was always like coming home at the end of the day. After 3 weeks, it was hard to say "Good-bye", but everyone celebrated with us as we finally moved Kit to her new apartment. Thank you to everyone at Hampton Inn Manhattan Grand Central. You are the best and we miss you! When it is time for the rest of the family to visit, we will definitely be back to stay with you!

title: Convenient location, comfortable stay.
text: Excellent location, 5 minute walk from Grand Central. Hot drinks, water available through out the day, and sometimes warm cookies. Breakfast was OK - hot food, donuts, waffles, cereal, fruits and yogurts, juices. King size bed was amazing. Quiet room. Housemaids did an excellent job, thank you! Feather pillows were too hard for me, I asked for softer pillows and they gave me foam pillows straight away, I slept so well! I highly recommend this hotel as a base to explore NY. We bought a weekly Subway pass for $30 and was able to go and explore around NY easily. Check in and check out was very smooth!

title: It was amazing ♥️♥️
text: entire hotel was really clean and nice .it was good.The room was really clean and the employees were really kind and nice.  They helped our family have a good trip in New York. I recommend you to stay in this hotel.

title: FANTASTIC
text: Imilda and her staff were absolutely incredible they were always extremely friendly and helpful! The hotel is one block from grand central terminal so you can get virtually anywhere from there! I’ve never stayed in a hotel where the staff of been so friendly even after we had checked out! I will be coming back in May with my family this time and will definitely be staying here since it was super affordable and clean! They really made everyone I came with feel like home!

title: Un lugar acogedor
text: Yo recomiendo este hotel, las habitaciones tienen el tamaño suficiente tiene calefacción y la cama es muy cómoda desayuno para todo gusto y el personal atiende de maravilla. Si quieren que les llegue algo por amazon no lo duden yo volveré sin duda alguna.

title: Good stay in NYC - Low Cost with Quality
text:
Good stay, the hotel was nice and the staff amazing, very polite crew and Robigas was the best.
The only thing I really miss was a frigobar and room service, but it´s about the price, right? :) - Good cost is key in NYC

title: Recomendable opción en NY
text:
El hotel es muy agradable, y la ubicación, para mi gusto ideal, alejado del bullicio de Time Square pero muy cerca de Grand Central Terminal para tener opciones de distintas líneas de metro.  Para los que se animen más se puede ir caminando a muchos de los atractivos turísticos y disfrutar de las calles de NY.
Un plus del hotel es que durante todo el día hay disponible café y agua caliente para hacerse te o chocolate (también hay cafetera con café en la habitación). Y algunos días nos encontramos con limonada bien fresca en la recepción, junto a unas cookies caseras.  También arman como unas viandas con banana, barra de cereal, algún bollo y una manzana que se pueden retirar sin cargo.  Parte del lugar que se usa para el desayuno se encuentra abierto y hay mesas y sillas que uno puede utilizar si lleva comida de rotisería para almorzar o cenar en el hotel, no tiene mucha capacidad pero es una alternativa.
La habitación normal, la media del tamaño de los hoteles de NY. Nos tocó en el piso 10, pero no sentimos ruido. No tienen heladera pero la pueden agregar si la solicitan y hay disponible, eso hicimos nosotros. El desayuno incluido bastante completo: huevos revueltos, salchichas, panceta, panes, unos bollos rellenos, wafles, cereales, queso philadelphia, frutas cortadas, yogures, leche, bananas, manzanas.  Todos los días lo mismo.
Las instalaciones bien también. Tiene gimnasio y una oficina con computadoras e impresora. El hotel es tranquilo, no tiene lujos, pero nos resultó muy cómodo.  Recomendable.

title: Buon hotel in centro
text: Buon hotel in posizione centrale, molto vicino alle UN se siete lì per lavoro, e super convenientemente vicino a Grant Central, in una strada relativamente tranquilla per Manhattan. Molto vicino anche al Chrysler building. Personale molto gentile e accogliente, pulizia ok, buona colazione (fantastiche le omelettes al formaggio!). Un hotel decisamente valido a prezzi ragionevoli nel cuore di Manhattan!

title: Great accommodation and friendly staff.
text: Great accommodation, very comfortable and quiet, with a friendly staff.  After spending 13 hours flight to reach NYC, it was such a pleasant surprise to meet Ms. Robigo, front desk lady, who provided us with not only a super friendly greetings but also hands-on help to get connected internet and early check-in. Other staff were also friendly and welcoming as we made our way back from a long cold day in the city. The hotel is quite and well maintained. We would definitely stay here again!

title: Excelente experiencia!
text: El hotel esta bastante bien, leí muchos comentarios de que las habitaciones eran pequeñas, al menos la mía estaba de un excelente tamaño, todo limpio y en buenas condiciones, las camas y almohadas increíbles, el servicio excelente en especial de paule y rabiga de frontdesk y de nancy del comedor

title: Big League Tours
text: Hotel was just fine, no complaints at all. The breakfast in the morning was very good and the rooms were great. The only thing that wasn’t great is that the elevators were very slow, but other than that I was totally satisfied.

title: Nice value for mid town Manhattan
text: Hotel is located in mid town so it is close to many attractions and convenient for business travel.  The room is on the small side, but it was a good value for New York city.  The staff at the hotel was very friendly and helpful.

title: Pleasant stay, great location
text:
This turned out to be a great choice for us. We were here for three nights in February, and it was perfect for our needs. It was very well located for the business we had to do, in midtown between Second and Third Avenues, with cabs readily available. And I always like to stay in a place with a lot of international guests - not only do I enjoy that for its own sake, but for some reason it seems a sure sign that the hotel will give us a quality experience. 

The room was very nice. It was on the small side, but clean, very comfortable, and well serviced from day to day. My husband and I both slept as well as we sleep at home - a rare experience in a hotel. We were on the 16th floor and, because it was on a minor crosstown street, the street noise was not too bad. The bathroom was modern and in great condition. A refrigerator might have been nice, but isn't essential for our purposes. 

We also appreciated that the window opened a little bit - just enough to let in fresh air as needed, not enough to be a security issue. That's not always the case in hotels, and it is great to have.

The breakfast buffet was generous: you could have anything from yogurt, toast, bagel, cereal to waffles, eggs, and sausage, according to your preferences. Specific items ran a little low sometimes, but only briefly - the staff was really hustling to keep up. Plus, there's coffee and tea all day, which is a boon for those of us who are caffeine addicts.

The desk crew was friendly and efficient. We didn't have a lot of questions, but they helped us where we needed it - recommending a good deli around the corner, and advising us about getting cabs back to Penn Station on our last day.

The only drawback - and this wasn't a big problem - is that there are only two elevators. At peak times, when everyone is coming to and from breakfast or checking out, and the cleaning staff is moving, there could be a bit of a wait. The rest of the time, no problem.

We would definitely put the Hampton Inn Grand Central at the top of our list for our next trip to New York.

title: Friendly and helpful staff, great location
text: Good for getting around Manhattan and to everywhere else - via Grand Central access to MTA, Amtrak, east-side subways, shuttle to west-side subways, food court, and upscale fresh market.  Rooms small but well furnished, new bath facilities.  It is in the heart of the greatest city in the world.  The staff is particularly good - friendly, caring, and knowledgeable,

title: Cozy Comfort w Choc Chip Cookies!
text: Attended a meeting around the corner and was happy to find this friendly hotel. Wifi and hot breakfast with fresh fruit and warm cookies at night made for a homey experience. Small drawback: No onsite bar or restaurant and not much info for nearby dining. Overall affordable and pleasant.

title: Girls weekend
text: This was a great place to stay !!  Very nice and friendly staff !!! Loves the warm cookies they give you at check in .  They were very accommodating when I need some really foam pillows very the feather pillows they had on the bed .  I am allergic to the feathers.  The breakfast buffet was good but was not very well stocked with the amount of people that came down for breakfast around 9 am,  it seems like there was some really hungry breakfast eaters and it took about 15 minutes for someone to realize that they needed to put more food out .   I would definitely stay there again !!

title: Awesome staff!!
text:
1st time NYC, Jan 31-Feb4, 2 kids-13 & 7.
This is by far the best hotel I have ever stayed in. They have the most friendliest, gracious, most attentive staff I have ever met.
